original: aśeṣacidacidvastuviśeṣiṇe śeṣaśāyine /
analyzed: aśeṣa cit acit vastu viśeṣiṇe śeṣa śāyine

original: nirmalānantakalyāṇanidhaye viṣṇave namaḥ //(1) (2)
paraṃ brahmaivājñaṃ bhramaparigataṃ saṃsarati tatparopādhyālīḍhaṃ vivaśamaśubhasyāspadam iti /
analyzed: param brahma eva ajñam bhrama parigatam saṃsarati tat para upādhi ālīḍham vivaśam aśubhasya āspadam iti

original: śrutinyāyāpetaṃ jagati vitataṃ mohanam idaṃ tamo yenāpāstaṃ sa hi vijayate yāmunamuniḥ //(2) (3)
analyzed: śruti nyāya apetam jagati vitatam mohanam idam tamaḥ yena apāstam sa hi vijayate yāmuna muniḥ

original: aśeṣajagaddhitānuśāsanaśrutinikaraśirasi samadhigato 'yam arthaḥ jīvaparamātmayāthātmyajñānapūrvakavarṇāśramadharmetikartavyatākaparamapuruṣacaraṇayugaladhyānārcanapraṇāmādir
analyzed: aśeṣa jagat hita anuśāsana śruti nikara śirasi samadhigataḥ yam arthaḥ jīva paramātma yāthātmya jñāna pūrvaka varṇa āśrama dharma itikartavyatāka paramapuruṣa caraṇa yugala dhyāna arcana praṇāma ādiḥ

original: atyarthapriyas tatprāptiphalaḥ / (4)
asya jīvātmano 'nādyavidyāsaṃcitapuṇyapāparūpakarmapravāhahetukabrahmādisuranaratiryaksthāvarātmakacaturvidhadehapraveśakṛtatattadabhimānajanitāvarjanīyabhavabhayavidhvaṃsanāya
analyzed: asya jīvātmanaḥ na adya vidyā saṃcita puṇya pāpa rūpa karma pravāha hetuka brahma ādi sura nara tiryak sthāvara ātmaka caturvidha deha praveśa kṛta tad tad abhimāna janita a varjanīya bhava bhaya vidhvaṃsanāya

original: dehātiriktātmasvarūpatatsvabhāvatadantarayāmiparamātmasvarūpatatsvabhāvatadupāsanatatphalabhūtātmasvarūpāvirbhāvapūrvakānavadhikātiśayānandabrahmānubhavajñāpane
pravṛttaṃ hi vedāntavākyajātam,
analyzed: pravṛttam hi vedānta vākya jātam

original: tat tvam asi /
analyzed: tat tvam asi

original: ayam ātmā brahma /
analyzed: ayam ātmā brahma

original: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ ntaraḥ yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sarva bhūta antarātmā apahata pāpmā divyaḥ devaḥ ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ

original: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena /
analyzed: tam etam veda anuvacanena brāhmaṇāḥ vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasā anāśakena

original: brahmavid āpnoti param /
analyzed: brahma vid āpnoti param

original: tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādikam / (5)
analyzed: tam evam vidvān amṛtaḥ iha bhavati na anyaḥ panthāḥ ayanāya vidyate iti ādikam

original: jīvātmanaḥ svarūpaṃ devamanuṣyādiprakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣarūpanānāvidhabhedarahitaṃ jñānānandaikaguṇaṃ,
analyzed: jīvātmanaḥ svarūpam deva manuṣya ādi prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣa rūpa nānāvidha bheda rahitam jñāna ānanda eka guṇam

original: tasyaitasya karmakṛtadevādibhede 'padhvaste svarūpabhedo vācām agocaraḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ,
analyzed: tasya etasya karma kṛta deva ādi bhede padhvaste sva rūpa bhedaḥ vācām agocaraḥ sva saṃvedyaḥ

original: jñānasvarūpam ity etāvad eva nirdeśyam /
analyzed: jñāna svarūpam iti etāvat eva nirdeśyam

original: tac ca sarveṣām ātmanāṃ samānam / (6)
analyzed: tat ca sarveṣām ātmanām samānam

original: evaṃvidhacidacidātmakaprapañcasyodbhavasthitipralayasaṃsāranirvartanaikahetubhūtaḥ
analyzed: evaṃvidha cit acit ātmaka prapañcasya udbhava sthiti pralaya saṃsāra nirvartana eka hetu bhūtaḥ

original: samastaheyapratyanīkānantakalyāṇatayā ca svetarasamastavastuvilakṣaṇasvarūpo 'navadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaḥ
analyzed: samasta heya pratyanīka ananta kalyāṇa tayā ca sva itara samasta vastu vilakṣaṇa svarūpaḥ na vadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaḥ

original: sarvātmaparabrahmaparajyotiḥparatattvaparamātmasadādiśabdabhedair nikhilavedāntavedyo
analyzed: sarva ātma para brahma para jyotiḥ para tattva paramātma sat ādi śabda bhedaiḥ nikhila vedānta vedyaḥ

original: bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ puruṣottama ity antaryāmisvarūpam /
analyzed: bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ puruṣottamaḥ iti antaryāmi svarūpam

original: asya ca vaibhavapratipādanaparāḥ śrutayaḥ svetarasamastacidacidvastujātāntarātmatayā
analyzed: asya ca vaibhava pratipādana parāḥ śrutayaḥ sva itara samasta cit acit vastu jāta antarātma tayā

original: nikhilaniyamanaṃ tacchaktitadaṃśatadvibhūtitadrūpataccharīratattanuprabhṛtibhiḥ śabdais
analyzed: nikhila niyamanam tad śakti tad aṃśa tad vibhūti tad rūpa tad śarīra tad tanu prabhṛtibhiḥ śabdaiḥ

original: tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena ca pratipādayanti / (7)
analyzed: tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca pratipādayanti

original: tasya vaibhavapratipādanaparāṇām eṣāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyādīnāṃ vivaraṇe pravṛttāḥ kecana nirviśeṣajñānamātram eva brahma,
analyzed: tasya vaibhava pratipādana parāṇām eṣām sāmānādhikaraṇya ādīnām vivaraṇe pravṛttāḥ kecana nirviśeṣa jñāna mātram eva brahma

original: tac ca nityamuktasvaprakāśasvabhāvam api tat tvam asy ādisāmānādhikaraṇyāvagatajīvāikyaṃ,
analyzed: tat ca nitya mukta sva prakāśa svabhāvam api tat tvam asi ādi sāmānādhikaraṇya avagata jīva aikyam

original: brahmaivājñaṃ badhyate mucyate ca,
analyzed: brahma eva ajñam badhyate mucyate ca

original: nirviśeṣacinmātrātirekeśvareśitavyādyanantavikalparūpaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jaganmithyā,

original: kaścid baddhaḥ,
analyzed: kaścid baddhaḥ

original: itaḥ pūrvaṃ kecana muktā ity ayam artho mithyā /

original: ekam eva śarīraṃ jīvavan nirjīvānītarāṇi,
analyzed: ekam eva śarīram jīvavat nirjīvāni itarāṇi

original: taccharīraṃ kim iti na vyavasthitam,
analyzed: tat śarīram kim iti na vyavasthitam

original: ācāryo jñānasyopadeṣṭā mithyā śāstraṃ ca mithyā śāstrapramātā ca mithyā śāstrajanyaṃ jñānaṃ ca mithyā etat sarvaṃ mithyābhūtenaiva śāstreṇāvagamyata  #
analyzed: ācāryaḥ jñānasya upadeṣṭā mithyā śāstram ca mithyā śāstra pramātā ca mithyā śāstra janyam jñānam ca mithyā etat sarvam mithyā bhūtena eva śāstreṇa avagamyata

original: iti varṇayanti / (8)
analyzed: iti varṇayanti

original: apare tv apahatapāpmatvādisamastakalyāṇaguṇopetam api brahmaitenaivāikyāvabodhena
analyzed: apare tu apahata pāpma tva ādi samasta kalyāṇa guṇa upetam api brahma etena eva aikya avabodhena

original: kenacid upādhiviśeṣeṇa saṃbaddhaṃ badhyate mucyate ca nānāvidhamalarūpapariṇāmāspadaṃ ceti vyavasthitāḥ / (9)
analyzed: kenacid upādhi viśeṣeṇa saṃbaddham badhyate mucyate ca nānāvidha mala rūpa pariṇāma āspadam ca iti vyavasthitāḥ

analyzed: anye punar aikya avabodha yāthātmyam varṇayantaḥ svābhāvika niratiśaya aparimita udāra guṇa sāgaram

original: brahmaiva suranaratiryaksthāvaranārakisvargyapavargicetaneṣu svabhāvato vilakṣaṇam
analyzed: brahmā eva sura nara tiryak sthāvara nāraki svargi apavargi cetaneṣu svabhāvataḥ vilakṣaṇam

analyzed: avilakṣaṇam ca viyat ādi nānāvidha mala rūpa pariṇāma āspadam ca iti pratyavatiṣṭhante

original: tatra prathamapakṣasya śrutyarthaparyālocanaparā duṣparihārān doṣān udāharanti /
analyzed: tatra prathama pakṣasya śruti artha paryālocana parāḥ duṣparihārān doṣān udāharanti

original: prakṛtaparāmarśitacchabdāvagatasvasaṃkalpakṛtajagadudayavibhavavilayādayas tad+aikṣata
analyzed: prakṛta parāmarśi tad śabda avagata sva saṃkalpa kṛta jagat udaya vibhava vilaya ādayaḥ tadā aikṣata

original: bahu syāṃ prajāyeyetyārabhya sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhā
analyzed: bahu syām prajāyeya iti ārabhya sat mūlāḥ somya imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sat āyatanāḥ sat pratiṣṭhā

original: ityādibhiḥ padaiḥ pratipāditās tatsaṃbandhitayā prakaraṇāntaranirdiṣṭāḥ
analyzed: ityādibhiḥ padaiḥ pratipāditāḥ tad saṃbandhi tayā prakaraṇa antara nirdiṣṭāḥ

original: sarvajñatāsarvaśaktitvasarveśvaratvasarvaprakāratvasamābhyadhikanivṛttisatyakāmatvasatyasaṃkalpatvasarvāvabhāsakatvādyanavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇā

original: atha syāt upakrame 'py ekavijñānena sarvavijñānamukhena kāraṇasyaiva satyatāṃ pratijñāya
analyzed: atha syāt upakrame pi eka vijñānena sarva vijñāna mukhena kāraṇasya eva satya tām pratijñāya

original: tasya kāraṇabhūtasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ satyatāṃ vikārajātasyāsatyatāṃ mṛddṛṣṭāntena darśayitvā
analyzed: tasya kāraṇa bhūtasya eva brahmaṇaḥ satya tām vikāra jātasya asatya tām mṛd dṛṣṭāntena darśayitvā

original: satyabhūtasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam iti sajātīyavijātīyanikhilabhedanirasanena

original: nirviśeṣataiva pratipāditā /
analyzed: nirviśeṣa tā eva pratipāditā

analyzed: etat śodhakāni prakaraṇa antara gata vākyāni api satyam jñānam anantam brahma

original: niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ nirguṇaṃ,
analyzed: niṣkalam niṣkriyam nirguṇam

original: na caikākāratābodhane padānāṃ paryāyatā /
analyzed: na ca eka ākāra tā bodhane padānām paryāya tā

analyzed: eka tve pi vastunaḥ sarva viśeṣa pratyanīka tā upasthāpanena sarva padānām arthavat tvāt iti

original: naitad evam /
analyzed: na etat evam

original: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya mithyātve sarvasya jñātavyasyābhāvān na setsyati /
analyzed: eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam sarvasya mithyātve sarvasya jñātavyasya abhāvāt na setsyati

original: satyatvamithyātvayor ekatāprasaktir vā /
analyzed: satya tva mithyātvayoḥ eka tā prasaktiḥ vā

original: api tv ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya tadātmakatvenaiva satyatve sidhyati / (13)
analyzed: api tu eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam sarvasya tad ātmaka tvena eva satya tve sidhyati

original: ayam arthaḥ śvetaketuṃ pratyāha stabdho 'sy uta tam ādeśam aprākṣya iti paripūrṇa iva lakṣyase tān ācāryān prati tam apy ādeśaṃ pṛṣṭavān asīti
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ śvetaketum pratyāha stabdhaḥ si uta tam ādeśam a prākṣyaḥ iti paripūrṇaḥ iva lakṣyase tān ācāryān prati tam api ādeśam pṛṣṭavān asi iti

original: ādiśyate 'nenety ādeśaḥ /
analyzed: ādiśyate nena iti ādeśaḥ

original: ādeṣaḥ praśāsanam /
analyzed: ādeṣaḥ praśāsanam

original: etasya vā akṣarasya gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhata ity ādibhir aikyarthyāt /
analyzed: etasya vai akṣarasya gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ iti ādibhiḥ aikyarthyāt

original: tathā ca mānavaṃ vacaḥ praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣām ityādi /
analyzed: tathā ca mānavam vacaḥ praśāsitāram sarveṣām ityādi

original: atrāpy ekam eveti jagadupādānatāṃ pratipādyādvitīyapadenādhiṣṭhātaranivāraṇād asyaivādhiṣṭhātṛtvam api pratipādyate /
analyzed: atra api ekam eva iti jagat upādānatām pratipādya advitīya padena adhiṣṭhātara nivāraṇāt asya eva adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam api pratipādyate

original: atas taṃ praśāsitāraṃ jagadupādānabhūtam api pṛṣṭavān asi yena śrutena matena vijñātenāśrutam amatam avijñānaṃ śrutaṃ mataṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīty  #
analyzed: atas tam praśāsitāram jagat upādāna bhūtam api pṛṣṭavān asi yena śrutena matena vijñātena a śrutam amatam avijñānam śrutam matam vijñātam bhavati iti

original: uktaṃ syāt /
analyzed: uktam syāt

original: nikhilajagadudayavibhavavilayādikāraṇabhūtaṃ sarvajñatvasatyakāmatvasatyasaṃkalpatvaparimitodāraguṇagaṇasāgaraṃ kiṃ brahmāpi tvayā śrutam iti  #
analyzed: nikhila jagat udaya vibhava vilaya ādi kāraṇa bhūtam sarvajña tva satya kāma tva satya saṃkalpa tva parimita udāra guṇa gaṇa sāgaram kim brahma api tvayā śrutam iti

original: hārdo bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: hārdaḥ bhāvaḥ

original: tasya nikhilakāraṇatayā kāraṇam eva nānāsaṃsthānaviśeṣasaṃsthitaṃ kāryam ity ucyata
analyzed: tasya nikhila kāraṇa tayā kāraṇam eva nānā saṃsthāna viśeṣa saṃsthitam kāryam iti ucyata

original: iti kāraṇabhūtasūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīrakabrahmavijñānena kārrabhūtam akhilaṃ jagad
analyzed: iti kāraṇa bhūta sūkṣma cit acit vastu śarīraka brahma vijñānena kārra bhūtam akhilam jagat

original: vijñātaṃ bhavatīti hṛdi nidhāya yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavaty amataṃ matam avijñātaṃ
analyzed: vijñātam bhavati iti hṛdi nidhāya yena a śrutam śrutam bhavati a matam matam a vijñātam

original: vijñātaṃ syād iti putraṃ prati pṛṣṭavān pitā /
analyzed: vijñātam syāt iti putram prati pṛṣṭavān pitā

original: tad etatsakalasya vastujātasyaikakāraṇatvaṃ pitṛhṛdi nihitam ajānan putraḥ parasparavilakṣaṇeṣu
analyzed: tat etat sakalasya vastu jātasya eka kāraṇa tvam pitṛ hṛdi nihitam a jānan putraḥ paraspara vilakṣaṇeṣu

original: vastuṣv anyasya jñānena tadanyavijñānasyāghaṭamānatāṃ buddhvā paricodayati kathaṃ
analyzed: vastuṣu anyasya jñānena tad anya vijñānasya aghaṭamāna tām buddhvā paricodayati katham

original: nu bagavaḥ sa ādeśa iti / (14)
analyzed: nu bagavaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ iti

original: paricoditaḥ punas tad eva hṛdi nihitaṃ jñānānandāmalatvaikasvarūpam aparicchedyamāhātmyaṃ
analyzed: paricoditaḥ punar tat eva hṛdi nihitam jñāna ānanda amala tva eka svarūpam a paricchedya māhātmyam

original: satyasaṃkalpatvamiśrair anavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇair juṣṭam avikārasvarūpaṃ
analyzed: satya saṃkalpa tva miśraiḥ anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaiḥ juṣṭam a vikāra svarūpam

original: paraṃ brahmaiva nāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīraṃ svalīlāyai svasaṃkalpenānantavicitrasthiratrasasvarūpajagatsaṃsthānaṃ
analyzed: param brahma eva nāma rūpa vibhāga anarha sūkṣma cit acit vastu śarīram sva līlāyai sva saṃkalpena ananta vicitra sthira trasa svarūpa jagat saṃsthānam

original: svāṃśenāvasthitam iti / (15)
analyzed: sva aṃśena avasthitam iti

original: tajjñānenāsya nikhilasya jñātatāṃ bruvaṃl lokadṛṣṭaṃ kāryakāraṇayor ananyatvaṃ darśayituṃ
analyzed: tad jñānena asya nikhilasya jñāta tām bruvan loka dṛṣṭam kārya kāraṇayoḥ ananya tvam darśayitum

original: dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syād vācārambhaṇaṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā somya ekena mṛd piṇḍena sarvam mṛd mayam vijñātam syāt vācā ārambhaṇam

original: vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam iti /
analyzed: vikāraḥ nāmadheyam mṛttikā iti eva satyam iti

original: ekam eva mṛddravyaṃ svaikadeśena nānāvyavahārāspadatvāya ghaṭaśarāvādinānāsaṃsthānāvasthārūpavikārāpannaṃ
analyzed: ekam eva mṛd dravyam sva eka deśena nānā vyavahāra āspada tvāya ghaṭa śarāva ādi nānā saṃsthāna avasthā rūpa vikāra āpannam

original: nānānāmadheyam api mṛttikāsaṃsthānaviśeṣatvān mṛddravyam evettham avasthitaṃ na vastvantaram iti /
analyzed: nānā nāmadheyam api mṛttikā saṃsthāna viśeṣa tvāt mṛd dravyam eva ittham avasthitam na vastu antaram iti

original: yathā mṛtpiṇḍavijñānena tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣarūpam ghaṭaśarāvādi sarvaṃ jñātam eva bhavatītyarthaḥ / (16)
analyzed: yathā mṛd piṇḍa vijñānena tad saṃsthāna viśeṣa rūpam ghaṭa śarāva ādi sarvam jñātam eva bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: tataḥ kṛtsnasya jagato brahmaikakāraṇatām ajānan putraḥ pṛcchati bhagavāṃs tv eva me tad bravītv iti /
analyzed: tatas kṛtsnasya jagataḥ brahma eka kāraṇatām a jānan putraḥ pṛcchati bhagavān tu eva me tat bravītu iti

original: tataḥ sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti brahmaiva sarvakāraṇam ity upadiśan sa hovāca sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam iti /
analyzed: tatas sarvajñam sarva śakti brahma eva sarva kāraṇam iti upadiśan sa ha uvāca sat eva somya idam agre āsīt ekam eva advitīyam iti

original: atredam iti jagan nirdiṣṭam /
analyzed: atra idam iti jagat nirdiṣṭam

original: agra iti ca sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvakālaḥ /
analyzed: agre iti ca sṛṣṭeḥ pūrva kālaḥ

original: tasmin kāle jagataḥ sadātmakatāṃ sad eveti pratipādya,
analyzed: tasmin kāle jagataḥ sat ātmaka tām sat eva iti pratipādya

original: tatsṛṣṭikāle 'py aviśiṣṭam iti kṛtvaikam eveti sadāpannasya jagatas tadānīm avibhaktanāmarūpatāṃ
analyzed: tad sṛṣṭi kāle pi a viśiṣṭam iti kṛtvā ekam eva iti sat āpannasya jagataḥ tadānīm avibhakta nāma rūpa tām

original: pratipādya tatpratipādanenaiva sato jagadupādānatvaṃ pratipāditam iti svavyatiriktanimittakāraṇam
analyzed: pratipādya tad pratipādanena eva sataḥ jagat upādānatvam pratipāditam iti sva vyatirikta nimitta kāraṇam

original: advitīyapadena pratiṣiddham / (17)
analyzed: a dvitīya padena pratiṣiddham

original: tam ādeśam prākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatītyādāv eva praśāstitaiva jagadupādānam iti hṛdi nihitam idānīm abhivyaktam /
analyzed: tam ādeśam prākṣyaḥ yena aśrutam śrutam bhavati ityādau eva praśāsti tā eva jagat upādānam iti hṛdi nihitam idānīm abhivyaktam

original: svayam eva jagadupādānaṃ jagannimittaṃ ca sat tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti /
analyzed: svayam eva jagat upādānam jagat nimittam ca sat tat aikṣata bahu syām prajāyeya iti

original: tad etacchabdavācyaṃ paraṃ brahma sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti satyasaṅkalpam avāptasamastakāmam
analyzed: tat etad śabda vācyam param brahma sarvajñam sarva śakti satya saṅkalpam avāpta samasta kāmam

original: api līlārthaṃ vicitrānantacidacinmiśrajagadrūpeṇāham eva bahu syāṃ tadarthaṃ prajāyeyeti
analyzed: api līlā artham vicitra ananta cit acit miśra jagat rūpeṇa aham eva bahu syām tad artham prajāyeya iti

original: svayam eva saṃkalpya svāṃśaikadeśād eva viyadādibhūtāni sṛṣṭvā punar api saiva sacchabdābhihitā
analyzed: svayam eva saṃkalpya sva aṃśa eka deśāt eva viyat ādi bhūtāni sṛṣṭvā punar api sā eva sat śabda abhihitā

original: parā devataivam aikṣata hantāham imās tisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti /
analyzed: parā devatā evam aikṣata hanta aham imāḥ tisraḥ devatāḥ anena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti

original: anena jīvenātmaneti jīvasya brahmātmakatvaṃ pratipādya brahmātmajīvānupraveśād eva
analyzed: anena jīvena ātmanā iti jīvasya brahma ātmaka tvam pratipādya brahma ātma jīva anupraveśāt eva

original: kṛtsnasyācidvastunaḥ padārthatvam evaṃbhūtasyaiva sarvasya vastuno nāmabhāktvam iti ca darśayati /
analyzed: kṛtsnasya acit vastunaḥ padārtha tvam evaṃbhūtasya eva sarvasya vastunaḥ nāma bhāktvam iti ca darśayati

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati jīvātmā tu brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakāratvād brahmātmakaḥ /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati jīvātmā tu brahmaṇaḥ śarīra tayā prakāra tvāt brahma ātmakaḥ

original: yasyātmā śarīram iti śrutyantarāt /
analyzed: yasya ātmā śarīram iti śruti antarāt

original: evaṃbhūtasya jīvasya śarīratayā prakārabhūtāni devamanuṣyādisaṃsthānāni vastūnīti brahmātmakāni tāni sarvāṇi /
analyzed: evaṃbhūtasya jīvasya śarīra tayā prakāra bhūtāni deva manuṣya ādi saṃsthānāni vastūni iti brahma ātmakāni tāni sarvāṇi

original: ato devo manuṣyo rākṣasaḥ paśur mṛgaḥ pakṣī vṛkṣo latā kāṣṭhaṃ śilā tṛṇaṃ ghaṭaḥ
analyzed: atas devaḥ manuṣyaḥ rākṣasaḥ paśuḥ mṛgaḥ pakṣī vṛkṣaḥ latā kāṣṭham śilā tṛṇam ghaṭaḥ

original: paṭa ityādayaḥ sarve prakṛtipratyayayogenābhidhāyakatayā prasiddhāḥ śabdā loke tattadvācyatayā
analyzed: paṭaḥ ityādayaḥ sarve prakṛti pratyaya yogena abhidhāyaka tayā prasiddhāḥ śabdāḥ loke tad tad vācya tayā

original: pratīyamānatattatsaṃsthānavastumukhena tadabhimānijīvatadantaryāmiparamātmaparyantasaṃghātasyaiva vācakā iti / (18)
analyzed: pratīyamāna tad tad saṃsthāna vastu mukhena tad abhimāni jīva tad antaryāmi paramātma paryanta saṃghātasya eva vācakāḥ iti

original: evaṃ samastacidacidātmakaprapañcasya sadupādānatāsannimittatāsadādhāratāsanniyamyatāsaccheṣatādi
analyzed: evam samasta cit acit ātmaka prapañcasya sat upādāna tā asat nimitta tā asat ādhāra tā asat niyamya tā asat śeṣa tā ādi

original: sarvaṃ ca sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhā ityādinā vistareṇa
analyzed: sarvam ca sat mūlāḥ somya imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sat āyatanāḥ sat pratiṣṭhāḥ ityādinā vistareṇa

original: pratipādya kāryakāraṇabhāvādimukhenāitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyam iti kṛtsnasya
analyzed: pratipādya kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi mukhena aitadātmyam idam sarvam tat satyam iti kṛtsnasya

original: jagato brahmātmakatvam eva satyam iti pratipādya kṛtsnasya jagataḥ sa evātmā kṛtsnaṃ
analyzed: jagataḥ brahma ātmaka tvam eva satyam iti pratipādya kṛtsnasya jagataḥ saḥ eva ātmā kṛtsnam

original: jagat tasya śarīraṃ tasmāt tvaṃśabdavācyam api jīvaprakāraṃ brahmaiveti sarvasya
analyzed: jagat tasya śarīram tasmāt tvam śabda vācyam api jīva prakāram brahma eva iti sarvasya

original: brahmātmakatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ tat tvam asīti jīvaviśeṣa upasaṃhṛtam / (19)
analyzed: brahma ātmaka tvam pratijñātam tat tvam asi iti jīva viśeṣaḥ upasaṃhṛtam

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati

original: aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvam iti cetanācetanaprapañcam idaṃ sarvam iti nirdiśya tasya prapañcasyaiṣa ātmeti pratipāditaḥ,
analyzed: aitadātmyam idam sarvam iti cetana acetana prapañcam idam sarvam iti nirdiśya tasya prapañcasya eṣaḥ ātmā iti pratipāditaḥ

original: prapañcoddeśena brahmātmakatvaṃ patipāditam ityarthaḥ /
tad idaṃ brahmātmakatvaṃ kim ātmaśarīrabhāvenota svarūpeṇeti vivecanīyam /
analyzed: tat idam brahma ātmaka tvam kim ātma śarīra bhāvena uta svarūpeṇa iti vivecanīyam

original: svarūpeṇa ced brahmaṇaḥ satyasaṅkalpādyaḥ tad aikṣata bahu syaṃ prajāyeyety upakramāvagatā bādhitā bhavanti /
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa ced brahmaṇaḥ satya saṅkalpa ādyaḥ tat aikṣata bahu syam prajāyeya iti upakrama avagatāḥ bādhitāḥ bhavanti

original: śarīrātmabhāvena ca tad ātmakatvaṃ śrutyantarād viśeṣato 'vagatam antaḥpraviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: śarīra ātma bhāvena ca tat ātmaka tvam śruti antarāt viśeṣataḥ vagatam antar praviṣṭaḥ

original: śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmeti praśāsitṛtvarūpātmatvena sarveṣāṃ janānām antaḥpraviṣṭo
analyzed: śāstā janānām sarva ātmā iti praśāsitṛ tva rūpa ātma tvena sarveṣām janānām antar praviṣṭaḥ

original: 'taḥ sarvātmā sarveṣāṃ janānām ātmā sarvaṃ cāsya śarīram iti viśeṣato jñāyate brahmātmakatvam /
analyzed: tasmāt sarva ātmā sarveṣām janānām ātmā sarvam ca asya śarīram iti viśeṣataḥ jñāyate brahma ātmaka tvam

original: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛta iti ca /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ ntaraḥ yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ iti ca

original: atrāpy anena jīvenātmanetīdam eva jñāyata iti pūrvam evoktam /
analyzed: atra api anena jīvena ātmanā iti idam eva jñāyate iti pūrvam eva uktam

original: ataḥ sarvasya cidacidvastuno brahmaśarīratvāt sarvaprakāraṃ sarvaśabdair brahmaivābhidhīyata iti tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena jīvaśarīratayā  #
analyzed: atas sarvasya cit acit vastunaḥ brahma śarīra tvāt sarva prakāram sarva śabdaiḥ brahma eva abhidhīyate iti tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena jīva śarīra tayā

original: jīvaprakāraṃ brahmaivābhihitam / (20)
analyzed: jīva prakāram brahma eva abhihitam

original: evam abhihite saty ayam artho jñāyate tvam iti yaḥ pūrvaṃ dehasyādhiṣṭhātṛtayā pratītaḥ sa paramātmaśarīratayā paramātmaprakārabhūtaḥ paramātmaparyantaḥ
analyzed: evam abhihite sati ayam arthaḥ jñāyate tvam iti yaḥ pūrvam dehasya adhiṣṭhātṛ tayā pratītaḥ sa paramātma śarīra tayā paramātma prakāra bhūtaḥ paramātma paryantaḥ

original: atas tvam iti śabdas tvatprakāraviśiṣṭaṃ tvadantaryāmiṇam evācaṣṭa iti /
analyzed: atas tvam iti śabdaḥ tvad prakāra viśiṣṭam tvad antaryāmiṇam eva ācaṣṭe iti

original: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti brahmātmakatayaiva jīvasya śarīriṇaḥ
analyzed: anena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti brahma ātmaka tayā eva jīvasya śarīriṇaḥ

original: svanāmabhāktvāt tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapravṛttayor dvayor api padayor brahmaiva vācyam /
analyzed: sva nāma bhāk tvāt tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇya pravṛttayoḥ dvayoḥ api padayoḥ brahmā eva vācyam

original: tatra ca tatpadaṃ jagatkāraṇabhūtaṃ sakalakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraṃ nirvadyaṃ nirvikāram ācaṣṭe /
analyzed: tatra ca tat padam jagat kāraṇa bhūtam sakala kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ākaram nirvadyam nirvikāram ācaṣṭe

original: tvam iti ca tad eva brahma jīvāntaryāmirūpeṇa saśarīraprakāraviśiṣṭam ācaṣṭe /
analyzed: tvam iti ca tat eva brahma jīva antaryāmi rūpeṇa sa śarīra prakāra viśiṣṭam ācaṣṭe

original: tad evaṃ pravṛttinimittabhedenaikasmin brahmaṇy eva tat tvam iti dvayoḥ padayor vṛttir uktā /
analyzed: tat evam pravṛtti nimitta bhedena ekasmin brahmaṇi eva tat tvam iti dvayoḥ padayoḥ vṛttiḥ uktā

original: brahmaṇo niravadyaṃ nirvikāraṃ sakalakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaratvaṃ jagatkāraṇatvaṃ cābādhitam / (21)
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ niravadyam nirvikāram sakala kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ākara tvam jagat kāraṇa tvam ca abādhitam

original: aśrutavedāntāḥ puruṣāḥ padārthāḥ sarve jīvātmanaś ca brahmātmakā iti na paśyati sarvaśabdānāṃ ca kevaleṣu tattatpadārtheṣu vācyaikadeśeṣu vācyaparyavasānaṃ  #
analyzed: a śruta vedāntāḥ puruṣāḥ padārthāḥ sarve jīvātmanaḥ ca brahma ātmakāḥ iti na paśyati sarva śabdānām ca kevaleṣu tad tad padārtheṣu vācya eka deśeṣu vācya paryavasānam

original: manyante /
analyzed: manyante

original: idānīṃ vedāntavākyaśravaṇena brahmakāryatayā tadantaryāmitayā ca sarvasya brahmātmakatvaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ tattatprakārasaṃsthitabrahmavācitvaṃ  #
analyzed: idānīm vedānta vākya śravaṇena brahma kārya tayā tad antaryāmi tayā ca sarvasya brahma ātmaka tvam sarva śabdānām tad tad prakāra saṃsthita brahma vāci tvam

original: ca jānanti /
analyzed: ca jānanti

original: nanv evaṃ gavādiśabdānāṃ tattatpadārthavācitayā vyutpattir bādhitā syāt /
analyzed: nanu evam go ādi śabdānām tad tad padārtha vāci tayā vyutpattiḥ bādhitā syāt

original: naivaṃ sarve śabdā acijjīvaviśiṣṭasya paramātmano vācakā ity uktam /
analyzed: na evam sarve śabdāḥ acit jīva viśiṣṭasya paramātmanaḥ vācakāḥ iti uktam

original: nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīty atra /
analyzed: nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti atra

original: tatra laukikāḥ puruṣāḥ śabdaṃ vyāharantaḥ śabdavācye pradhānāṃśasya paramātmanaḥ pratyakṣādyaparicchedyatvād vācyaikadeśabhūte vācyasamāptiṃ  #
analyzed: tatra laukikāḥ puruṣāḥ śabdam vyāharantaḥ śabda vācye pradhāna aṃśasya paramātmanaḥ pratyakṣa ādi aparicchedya tvāt vācya eka deśa bhūte vācya samāptim

original: manyante /
analyzed: manyante

original: vedāntaśravaṇena ca vyutpattiḥ pūryate /
analyzed: vedānta śravaṇena ca vyutpattiḥ pūryate

original: evam eva vaidikāḥ sarve śabdāḥ paramātmaparyantān svārthān bodhayanti /
analyzed: evam eva vaidikāḥ sarve śabdāḥ paramātma paryantān sva arthān bodhayanti

original: vaidikā eva sarve śabdā vedādav uddhṛtyoddhṛtya pareṇaiva brahmaṇā sarvapadārthān pūrvavat sṛṣṭvā teṣu paramātmaparyanteṣu pūrvavan nāmatayā  #
analyzed: vaidikāḥ eva sarve śabdāḥ veda ādau uddhṛtya uddhṛtya pareṇa eva brahmaṇā sarva padārthān pūrvavat sṛṣṭvā teṣu paramātma paryanteṣu pūrvavat nāma tayā

original: prayuktāḥ /
analyzed: prayuktāḥ

original: tad āha manuḥ
analyzed: tat āha manuḥ

original: sarveṣāṃ tu nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak /

original: vedaśabdebhya evādau pṛthaksaṃsthāś ca nirmame //
analyzed: veda śabdebhyaḥ eva ādau pṛthak saṃsthāḥ ca nirmame

original: iti / saṃsthāḥ saṃsthānāni rūpāṇīti yāvat /
analyzed: iti saṃsthāḥ saṃsthānāni rūpāṇi iti yāvat

original: āha ca bhagavān parāśaraḥ
analyzed: āha ca bhagavān parāśaraḥ

analyzed: veda śabdebhyaḥ eva ādau daiva ādīnām cakāra saḥ

original: iti / śrutiś ca sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvam akalpayad iti /
analyzed: iti śrutiḥ ca sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvam akalpayat iti

original: sūryādīn pūrvavat parikalpya nāmāni ca pūrvavac cakāra ityarthaḥ / (22)
analyzed: sūrya ādīn pūrvavat parikalpya nāmāni ca pūrvavat cakāra iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ jagadbrahmaṇor ananyatvaṃ prapañcitam /
analyzed: evam jagat brahmaṇoḥ ananya tvam prapañcitam

original: tenaikena jñātena sarvasya jñātato 'papāditā bhavati /
analyzed: tena ekena jñātena sarvasya upapāditā bhavati

original: sarvasya brahmakāryatvapratipādanena tadātmakatayaiva satyatvaṃ nānyatheti tat satyam ityuktam /
analyzed: sarvasya brahma kārya tva pratipādanena tad ātmaka tayā eva satya tvam na anyathā iti tat satyam iti uktam

original: yathā dṛṣṭānte sarvasya mṛdvikārasya mṛdātmanaiva satyatvam / (23)
analyzed: yathā dṛṣṭānte sarvasya mṛd vikārasya mṛd ātmanā eva satya tvam

original: śodhakavākyāny api niravadyaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaraṃ paraṃ brahma bodhayanti /
analyzed: śodhaka vākyāni api niravadyam sarva kalyāṇa guṇa ākaram param brahma bodhayanti

original: sarvapratyanīkākāratābodhane 'pi tattatpratyanīkākāratāyāṃ bhedasyāvarjanīyatvān na nirviśeṣavastusiddhiḥ / (24)
analyzed: sarva pratyanīka ākāra tā bodhane tad tad pratyanīka ākāra tāyām bhedasya avarjanīya tvāt na nirviśeṣa vastu siddhiḥ

original: nanu ca jñānamātraṃ brahmeti pratipādite nirviśeṣajñānamātraṃ brahmeti niścīyate /
analyzed: nanu ca jñāna mātram brahma iti pratipādite nirviśeṣa jñāna mātram brahma iti niścīyate

original: naivaṃ /
analyzed: na evam

original: svarūpanirūpaṇadharmaśabdā hi dharmamukhena svarūpam api pratipādayanti /
analyzed: svarūpa nirūpaṇa dharma śabdāḥ hi dharma mukhena svarūpam api pratipādayanti

original: gavādiśabdavat /
analyzed: go ādi śabda vat

original: tad āha sūtrakāraḥ tadguṇasāratvāt tadvyapadeśaḥ prājñavat /
analyzed: tat āha sūtrakāraḥ tad guṇa sāra tvāt tad vyapadeśaḥ prājña vat

original: yāvad ātmabhāvitatvāc ca na doṣa iti /
analyzed: yāvat ātma bhāvita tvāt ca na doṣaḥ iti

original: jñānena dharmeṇa svarūpam api nirūpitaṃ na jñānamātraṃ brahmeti /
analyzed: jñānena dharmeṇa svarūpam api nirūpitam na jñāna mātram brahma iti

original: katham idam avagamyata iti ced yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavid ityādijñātṛtvaśruteḥ parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca /
analyzed: katham idam avagamyate iti ced yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vid ityādi jñātṛ tva śruteḥ parā asya śaktiḥ vividhā eva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñāna bala kriyā ca

original: vijñātāram are kena vijānīyād ityādiśrutiśatasamadhigatam idam /
analyzed: vijñātāram are kena vijānīyāt ityādi śruti śata samadhigatam idam

original: jñānasya dharmamātratvād dharmamātrasyaikasya vastutvapratipādanānupapatteś ca /
analyzed: jñānasya dharma mātra tvāt dharma mātrasya ekasya vastu tva pratipādana anupapatteḥ ca

original: ataḥ satyajñānādipadāni svārthabhūtajñānādiviśiṣṭam eva brahma pratipādayanti /
analyzed: atas satya jñāna ādi padāni svārtha bhūta jñāna ādi viśiṣṭam eva brahma pratipādayanti

original: tat tvam iti dvayor api padayoḥ svārthaprahāṇena nirviśeṣavastusvarūpopasthāpanaparatve mukhyārthaparityāgaś ca / (25)
analyzed: tat tvam iti dvayoḥ api padayoḥ sva artha prahāṇena nirviśeṣa vastu svarūpa upasthāpana para tve mukhya artha parityāgaḥ ca

original: nanv aikye tātparyaniścayān na lakṣaṇādoṣaḥ /
analyzed: nanu aikye tātparya niścayāt na lakṣaṇā doṣaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ devadatta itivat /
analyzed: saḥ yam devadattaḥ itivat

original: yathā so 'yam ity atra sa iti śabdena deśāntarakālāntarasaṃbandhī puruṣaḥ pratīyata ayam iti ca saṃnihitadeśavartamānakālasaṃbandhī,
analyzed: yathā saḥ yam iti atra saḥ iti śabdena deśa antara kāla antara saṃbandhī puruṣaḥ pratīyata ayam iti ca saṃnihita deśa vartamāna kāla saṃbandhī

original: tayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenāikyaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: tayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena aikyam pratīyate

original: tatraikasya yugapadviruddhadeśakālasaṃbandhitayā pratītir na ghaṭata iti dvayor padayoḥ svarūpamātropasthāpanaparatvaṃ svarūpasya cāikyaṃ pratipadyata  #
analyzed: tatra ekasya yugapad viruddha deśa kāla saṃbandhi tayā pratītiḥ na ghaṭate iti dvayoḥ padayoḥ svarūpa mātra upasthāpana para tvam svarūpasya ca aikyam pratipadyata

original: iti cen naitad evam /
analyzed: iti ced na etat evam

original: so 'yaṃ devadatta ity atrāpi lakṣaṇāgandho na vidyate /
analyzed: saḥ yam devadattaḥ iti atra api lakṣaṇā gandhaḥ na vidyate

original: virodhābhāvāt /
analyzed: virodha abhāvāt

original: ekasya bhūtavartamānakriyādvayasaṃbaṃdho na viruddhaḥ /
analyzed: ekasya bhūta vartamāna kriyā dvaya saṃbaṃdhaḥ na viruddhaḥ

original: deśāntarasthitir bhūtvā saṃnihitadeśasthitir vartate /
analyzed: deśa antara sthitiḥ bhūtvā saṃnihita deśa sthitiḥ vartate

original: ato bhūtavartamānakriyādvayasaṃbandhitayāikyapratipādanam aviruddham /
analyzed: atas bhūta vartamāna kriyā dvaya saṃbandhi tayā āikya pratipādanam aviruddham

original: deśadvayavirodhaś ca kālabhedena parihṛtaḥ /
analyzed: deśa dvaya virodhaḥ ca kāla bhedena parihṛtaḥ

original: lakṣaṇāyām api na dvayor api padayor lakṣaṇāsamāśrayaṇam /
analyzed: lakṣaṇāyām api na dvayoḥ api padayoḥ lakṣaṇā samāśrayaṇam

original: etenaiva lakṣitena virodhaparihārāt /
analyzed: etena eva lakṣitena virodha parihārāt

original: lakṣaṇābhāva evoktaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣaṇa abhāvaḥ eva uktaḥ

original: deśāntarasaṃbandhitayā bhūtasyaivānyadeśasaṃbandhitayā vartamānatvāvirodhāt / (26)
analyzed: deśa antara saṃbandhi tayā bhūtasya eva anya deśa saṃbandhi tayā vartamāna tva avirodhāt

original: evam atrāpi jagatkāraṇabūtasyaiva parasya brahmaṇo jīvāntaryāmitayā jīvātmatvam aviruddham iti pratipāditam /
analyzed: evam atra api jagat kāraṇa būtasya eva parasya brahmaṇaḥ jīva antaryāmi tayā jīvātma tvam aviruddham iti pratipāditam

original: yathā bhūtayor eva hi dvayor aikyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate /
analyzed: yathā bhūtayoḥ eva hi dvayoḥ aikyam sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate

original: tatparityāgena svarūpamātrāikyaṃ na sāmānādhikaraṇyārthaḥ bhinnapravṛttinimittānāṃ śabdānām ekasminn arthe vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti hi
analyzed: tad parityāgena svarūpa mātra aikyam na sāmānādhikaraṇya arthaḥ bhinna pravṛtti nimittānām śabdānām ekasmin arthe vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti hi

original: tathābhūtayor aikyam upapāditam asmābhiḥ /
analyzed: tathābhūtayoḥ aikyam upapāditam asmābhiḥ

original: upakramavirodhyupasaṃhārapadena vākyatātparyaniścayaś ca na ghaṭate /
analyzed: upakrama virodhi upasaṃhāra padena vākya tātparya niścayaḥ ca na ghaṭate

original: upakrame hi tad aikṣata bahu syām ityādinā satyasaṃkalpatvaṃ jagadekakāraṇatvam apy uktam /
analyzed: upakrame hi tat aikṣata bahu syām ityādinā satya saṃkalpa tvam jagat eka kāraṇatvam api uktam

original: tadvirodhi cāvidyāśrayatvādi brahmaṇaḥ / (27)
analyzed: tad virodhi ca avidyā āśraya tva ādi brahmaṇaḥ

original: api cārthabhedatatsaṃsargaviśeṣabodhanakṛtapadavākyasya svarūpatālabdhapramāṇabhāvasya śabdasya nirviśeṣavastubodhanāsāmarthān na nirviśeṣavastuni  #
analyzed: api ca artha bheda tad saṃsarga viśeṣa bodhana kṛta pada vākyasya sva rūpa tā labdha pramāṇa bhāvasya śabdasya nirviśeṣa vastu bodhana a sāmarthāt na nirviśeṣa vastuni

original: śabdaḥ pramāṇam /
analyzed: śabdaḥ pramāṇam

original: nirviśeṣa ityādiśabdās tu kenacid viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭatayāvagatasya vastuno vastvantaragataviśeṣaniṣedhaparatayā bodhakāḥ /
analyzed: nirviśeṣaḥ ityādi śabdāḥ tu kenacid viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭa tayā avagatasya vastunaḥ vastu antara gata viśeṣa niṣedha para tayā bodhakāḥ

original: itarathā teṣam apy anavabodhakatvam eva /
analyzed: itarathā teṣam api anavabodhaka tvam eva

original: prakṛtipratyayarūpeṇa padasyaivānekaviśeṣagarbhatvād anekapadārthasaṃsargabodhakatvāc ca vākyasya / (28)
analyzed: prakṛti pratyaya rūpeṇa padasya eva aneka viśeṣa garbha tvāt aneka padārtha saṃsarga bodhaka tvāt ca vākyasya

original: atha syāt nāsmābhir nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśe vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam ity ucyate /
analyzed: atha syāt na asmābhiḥ nirviśeṣe svayam prakāśe vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam iti ucyate

original: svataḥsiddhasya pramāṇānapekṣatvāt /
analyzed: svatas siddhasya pramāṇa anapekṣa tvāt

original: sarvaiḥ śabdais taduparāgaviśeṣā jñātṛtvādayaḥ sarve nirasyante /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ tad uparāga viśeṣāḥ jñātṛ tva ādayaḥ sarve nirasyante

original: sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu nivṛtteṣu vastumātram anavacchinnaṃ svayaṃprakāśaṃ svata evāvatiṣṭhata iti /
analyzed: sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu nivṛtteṣu vastu mātram anavacchinnam svayaṃprakāśam svatas eva avatiṣṭhate iti

original: naitad evam /
analyzed: na etat evam

original: kena śabdena tadvastu nirdiśya tadgataviśeṣā nirasyante /
analyzed: kena śabdena tat vastu nirdiśya tad gata viśeṣāḥ nirasyante

original: jñaptimātraśabdeneti cen na /
analyzed: jñapti mātra śabdena iti ced na

original: so 'pi saviśeṣam eva vastvavalambate /
analyzed: saḥ pi sa viśeṣam eva vastu avalambate

original: prakṛtipratyayarūpeṇa viśeṣagarbhatvāt /
analyzed: prakṛti pratyaya rūpeṇa viśeṣa garbha tvāt

original: jñā avabodhana iti sakarmakaḥ sakartṛkaḥ kriyāviśeṣaḥ kriyāntaravyāvartakasvabhāvaviśeṣaś ca prakṛtyāvagamyate /
analyzed: jñā avabodhane iti sa karmakaḥ sa kartṛkaḥ kriyā viśeṣaḥ kriyā antara vyāvartaka svabhāva viśeṣaḥ ca prakṛtyā avagamyate

original: pratyayena ca liṅgasaṃkhyādayaḥ /
analyzed: pratyayena ca liṅga saṃkhyā ādayaḥ

original: svataḥsiddhāv apy etatsvabhāvaviśeṣavirahe siddhir eva na syāt /
analyzed: svatas siddhau api etad svabhāva viśeṣa virahe siddhiḥ eva na syāt

original: anyasādhanasvabhāvatayā hi jñapteḥ svataḥsiddhir ucyate / (29)
analyzed: anya sādhana svabhāva tayā hi jñapteḥ svatas siddhiḥ ucyate

original: brahmasvarūpaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarvadā svayam eva prakāśate cen na tasminn anyadharmādhyāsaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: brahma svarūpam kṛtsnam sarvadā svayam eva prakāśate ced na tasmin anya dharma adhyāsaḥ saṃbhavati

original: na hi rajjusvarūpe 'vabhāsamāne sarpatvādir adhyasyate /
analyzed: na hi rajju svarūpe vabhāsamāne sarpa tva ādiḥ adhyasyate

original: ata eva hi bhavadbhir ācchādikāvidyābhyupagamyate /
analyzed: atas eva hi bhavadbhiḥ ācchādikā vidyā abhyupagamyate

original: tataś ca śāstrīyanivartakajñānasya brahmaṇi tirohitāṃśo viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca śāstrīya nivartaka jñānasya brahmaṇi tirohita aṃśaḥ viṣayaḥ

original: anyathā tasya nivartakatvaṃ ca na syāt /
analyzed: anyathā tasya nivartaka tvam ca na syāt

original: adhiṣṭhānātirekirajjutvaprakāśanena hi sarpatvaṃ bādhyate /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhāna atireki rajju tva prakāśanena hi sarpa tvam bādhyate

original: ekaś ced viśeṣo jñānamātre vastuni śabdenābhidhīyate sa ca brahmaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti sarvaśrutipratipāditasarvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma bhavati
analyzed: ekaḥ ced viśeṣaḥ jñāna mātre vastuni śabdena abhidhīyate sa ca brahma viśeṣaṇam bhavati iti sarva śruti pratipādita sarva viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭam brahma bhavati

original: ataḥ prāmāṇikānāṃ na kenāpi pramāṇena nirviśeṣavastusiddhiḥ /
analyzed: atas prāmāṇikānām na kena api pramāṇena nirviśeṣa vastu siddhiḥ

original: nirvikalpakapratyakṣe 'pi saviśeṣam eva vastu pratīyate /
analyzed: nirvikalpaka pratyakṣe sa viśeṣam eva vastu pratīyate

original: anyathā savikalpake so 'yam iti pūrvāvagataprakāraviśiṣṭapratyayānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: anyathā savikalpake saḥ yam iti pūrva avagata prakāra viśiṣṭa pratyaya anupapatteḥ

original: vastusaṃsthānaviśeṣarūpatvād gotvāder nirvikalpatadaśāyām api sasaṃsthānam eva vastv ittham iti pratīyate /
analyzed: vastu saṃsthāna viśeṣa rūpa tvāt go tva ādeḥ nirvikalpa tā daśāyām api sa saṃsthānam eva vastu ittham iti pratīyate

original: dvitīyādipratyayeṣu tasya saṃsthānaviśeṣasyānekavastuniṣṭhatāmātraṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: dvitīyā ādi pratyayeṣu tasya saṃsthāna viśeṣasya aneka vastu niṣṭha tā mātram pratīyate

original: saṃsthānarūpaprakārākhyasya padārthasyānekavastuniṣṭhatayānekavastuviśeṣaṇatvaṃ dvitīyādipratyayāvagamyam iti dvitīyādipratyayāḥ savikalpakā  #
analyzed: saṃsthāna rūpa prakāra ākhyasya padārthasya aneka vastu niṣṭha tayā aneka vastu viśeṣaṇa tvam dvitīya ādi pratyaya avagamyam iti dvitīya ādi pratyayāḥ sa vikalpakā

original: ity ucyante /
analyzed: iti ucyante

original: ata evaikasya padārthasya bhinnābhinnatvarūpeṇa dvyātmakatvaṃ viruddhaṃ pratyuktam /
analyzed: atas eva ekasya padārthasya bhinna abhinna tva rūpeṇa dvi ātmaka tvam viruddham pratyuktam

original: saṃsthānasya saṃsthāninaḥ prakāratayā padārthāntaratvam /
analyzed: saṃsthānasya saṃsthāninaḥ prakāra tayā padārtha antara tvam

original: prakāratvād eva pṛthaksiddhyanarhatvaṃ pṛthaganupalambhaś ceti na dvyātmakatvasiddhiḥ / (31)
analyzed: prakāra tvāt eva pṛthak siddhi anarha tvam pṛthak anupalambhaḥ ca iti na dvi ātmaka tva siddhiḥ

original: api ca nirviśeṣavastvādinā svayaṃprakāśe vastuni taduparāgaviśeṣāḥ sarvaiḥ śabdair nirasyanta iti vadatā ke te śabdā niṣedhakā iti vaktavyam
analyzed: api ca nirviśeṣa vastu ādinā svayam prakāśe vastuni tad uparāga viśeṣāḥ sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ nirasyante iti vadatā ke te śabdāḥ niṣedhakāḥ iti vaktavyam

original: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam iti vikāranāmadheyayor vācārambhaṇamātratvāt /
analyzed: vācā ārambhaṇam vikāraḥ nāmadheyam mṛttikā iti eva satyam iti vikāra nāmadheyayoḥ vācā ārambhaṇa mātra tvāt

original: yat tatra kāraṇatayopalakṣyate vastumātraṃ tad eva satyam anyad asatyam itīyaṃ śrutir vadatīti cen naitad upapadyate /
analyzed: yat tatra kāraṇa tayā upalakṣyate vastu mātram tat eva satyam anyat asatyam iti iyam śrutiḥ vadati iti ced na etat upapadyate

original: ekasmin vijñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratijñāte 'nyajñānenānyajñānāsaṃbhavaṃ
analyzed: ekasmin vijñāte sarvam vijñātam bhavati iti pratijñāte

original: manvānasyaikam eva vastu vikārādyavasthāviśeṣeṇa pāramārthikenaiva nāmarūpam avasthitaṃ
analyzed: manvānasya ekam eva vastu vikāra ādi avasthā viśeṣeṇa pāramārthikena eva nāma rūpam avasthitam

original: cet tatraikasmin vijñāte tasmād vilakṣaṇasaṃsthānāntaram api tad eveti tatra dṛṣṭānto 'yaṃ nidarśitaḥ /
analyzed: ced tatra ekasmin vijñāte tasmāt vilakṣaṇa saṃsthāna antaram api tat eva iti tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ yam nidarśitaḥ

original: nātra kasyacid viśeṣasya niṣedhakaḥ ko 'pi śabdo dṛśyate /
analyzed: na atra kasyacid viśeṣasya niṣedhakaḥ śabdaḥ dṛśyate

original: vācārambhaṇam iti vācā vyavahāreṇārabhyata ity ārambhaṇam /
analyzed: vācā ārambhaṇam iti vācā vyavahāreṇa ārabhyate iti ārambhaṇam

original: piṇḍarūpeṇāvasthitāyāḥ mṛttikāyā nāma vānyadvyavahāraś cānyaḥ /
analyzed: piṇḍa rūpeṇa avasthitāyāḥ mṛttikāyāḥ nāma vā anya vyavahāraḥ ca anyaḥ

original: ghaṭaśarāvādirūpeṇāvasthitāyās tasyā eva mṛttikāyā anyāni nāmadheyāni vyavahārāś cānyaddaśāḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭa śarāva ādi rūpeṇa avasthitāyāḥ tasyāḥ eva mṛttikāyāḥ anyāni nāmadheyāni vyavahārāḥ ca anya daśāḥ

original: tathāpi sarvatra mṛttikādravyam ekam eva nānāsaṃsthānanānānāmadheyābhyāṃ nānāvyavahāreṇa cārabhyata ityetad eva satyam ity anenānyajñānenānyajñānasaṃbhavo  #
analyzed: tathā api sarvatra mṛttikā dravyam ekam eva nānā saṃsthāna nānā nāmadheyābhyām nānā vyavahāreṇa ca ārabhyate iti etat eva satyam iti anena anya jñānena anya jñāna saṃbhavaḥ

original: nidarśitaḥ /
analyzed: nidarśitaḥ

original: nātra kiṃcid vastu niṣidhyata iti pūrvam evāyam arthaḥ prapañcitaḥ / (32)
analyzed: na atra kiṃcid vastu niṣidhyate iti pūrvam eva ayam arthaḥ prapañcitaḥ

original: api ca yenāśrutaṃ śrutam ityādinā brahmavyatiriktasya sarvasya mithyātvaṃ pratijñātaṃ ced yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍenetyādidṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ  #
analyzed: api ca yena a śrutam śrutam ityādinā brahma vyatiriktasya sarvasya mithyātvam pratijñātam ced yathā somya ekena mṛd piṇḍena ityādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ  /

original: syāt /
analyzed: syāt

original: rajjusarpādivan mṛttikāvikārasya ghaṭaśarāvāder asatyatvaṃ śvetaketoḥ śuśrūṣoḥ pramāṇāntareṇa yuktyā cāsiddham ity etad api siṣādhayiṣitam  #
analyzed: rajju sarpa ādi vat mṛttikā vikārasya ghaṭa śarāva ādeḥ asatya tvam śvetaketoḥ śuśrūṣoḥ pramāṇa antareṇa yuktyā ca asiddham iti etat api siṣādhayiṣitam

original: iti cet /
analyzed: iti ced

original: yatheti dṛṣṭāntayopādānaṃ na ghaṭate / (33)
analyzed: yathā iti dṛṣṭāntayā upādānam na ghaṭate

original: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam evādvitīyam ity atra sad evaikam evety
analyzed: sat eva somya idam agre āsīt ekam eva advitīyam eva advitīyam iti atra sat eva ekam eva iti

original: avadhāraṇadvayenādvitīyam ity anena ca sanmātrātirekisajātīyavijātīyāḥ sarve viśeṣā
analyzed: avadhāraṇa dvayena advitīyam iti anena ca sat mātra atireki sajātīya vijātīyāḥ sarve viśeṣāḥ

original: niṣiddhā iti pratīyata iti cenn etad evam /
analyzed: niṣiddhāḥ iti pratīyate iti ced etat evam

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvāvasthādvayāvasthitasyaikasya vastuna ekāvasthāvasthitasya jñānenāvasthāntarāvasthitasyāpi
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāva avasthā dvaya avasthitasya ekasya vastunaḥ eka avasthā avasthitasya jñānena avasthā antara avasthitasya api

original: vastvaikyena jñātatāṃ dṛṣṭāntena darśayitvā śvetaketor aprajñātaṃ sarvasya brahmakāraṇatvaṃ
analyzed: vastu aikyena jñātatām dṛṣṭāntena darśayitvā śvetaketoḥ aprajñātam sarvasya brahma kāraṇatvam

original: ca vaktuṃ sad eva somyedam ity ārabdham /
analyzed: ca vaktum sat eva somya idam iti ārabdham

original: idam agre sad evāsīd iti /
analyzed: idam agre sat eva āsīt iti

original: agra iti kālaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: agre iti kāla viśeṣaḥ

original: idaṃśabdavācyasya prapañcasya sadāpattirūpāṃ kriyāṃ sadravyatāṃ ca vadati /
analyzed: idam śabda vācyasya prapañcasya sat āpatti rūpām kriyām sadravyatām ca vadati

original: ekam eveti cāsya nānānāmarūpavikāraprahāṇam /
analyzed: ekam eva iti ca asya nānā nāma rūpa vikāra prahāṇam

original: etasmin pratipādite 'sya jagataḥ sadupādānatā pratipāditā bhavati /
analyzed: etasmin pratipādite sya jagataḥ sat upādāna tā pratipāditā bhavati

original: anyatropādānakāraṇasya svavyatiriktādhiṣṭhātrapekṣādarśane 'pi sarvavilakṣaṇatvād
analyzed: anyatra upādānakāraṇasya sva vyatirikta adhiṣṭhātṛ apekṣā darśane pi sarva vilakṣaṇa tvāt

original: asya sarvajñasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktiyogo na viruddha ity advitīyapadam adhiṣṭhātrantaraṃ nivārayati /
analyzed: asya sarvajñasya brahmaṇaḥ sarva śakti yogaḥ na viruddhaḥ iti advitīya padam adhiṣṭhātṛ antaram nivārayati

original: sarvaśaktiyuktatvād eva brahmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sarva śakti yukta tvāt eva brahmaṇaḥ

original: kāścana śrutayaḥ prathamam upādānakāraṇatvaṃ pratipādya nimittakāraṇam api tad eveti pratipādayanti /
analyzed: kāścana śrutayaḥ prathamam upādānakāraṇa tvam pratipādya nimitta kāraṇam api tat eva iti pratipādayanti

original: yatheyaṃ śrutiḥ /
analyzed: yathā iyam śrutiḥ

original: anyāś ca śrutayo brahmaṇo nimittakāraṇatvam anujñāyāsyaivopādānatādi katham iti paricodya,
analyzed: anyāḥ ca śrutayaḥ brahmaṇaḥ nimitta kāraṇa tvam anujñāya asya eva upādāna tā ādi katham iti paricodya

original: sarvaśaktiyuktatvād upādānakāraṇaṃ taditarāśeṣopakaraṇaṃ ca brahmaiveti pariharanti
analyzed: sarva śakti yukta tvāt upādānakāraṇam tad itara aśeṣa upakaraṇam ca brahmā eva iti pariharanti

original: kiṃsvid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭakṣurmaṇīṣiṇo manasā pṛcchated
analyzed: kim svid vanam kaḥ u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsīt yatas dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭakṣuḥ maṇīṣiṇaḥ manasā pṛcchata id

original: utdyad adhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan /
analyzed: utdyat adhyatiṣṭhat bhuvanāni dhārayan

original: brahma vanaṃ brahma sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣur manīṣiṇo manasā vibravīmi vaḥ brahmādhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni /
analyzed: brahma vanam brahma sa vṛkṣaḥ āsīt yatas dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ manasā vibravīmi vaḥ brahma adhyatiṣṭhat bhuvanāni

original: dhārayann iti sāmānyato dṛṣṭena virodham āśaṅkya brahmaṇaḥ sarvavilakṣaṇatvena parihāra uktaḥ /
analyzed: dhārayan iti sāmānyatas dṛṣṭena virodham āśaṅkya brahmaṇaḥ sarva vilakṣaṇa tvena parihāraḥ uktaḥ

original: ataḥ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ity atrāpy agra ityādyanekaviśeṣā brahmaṇo pratipāditāḥ /
analyzed: atas sat eva somya idam agre āsīt iti atra api agre ityādi aneka viśeṣāḥ brahmaṇaḥ pratipāditāḥ

original: bhavadabhimataviśeṣaniṣedhavācī ko 'pi śabdo na dṛśyate /
analyzed: bhavat abhimata viśeṣa niṣedha vācī śabdaḥ na dṛśyate

original: praty uta jagadbrahmaṇoḥ
analyzed: prati uta jagat brahmaṇoḥ

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvajñāpanāyāgra iti kālaviśeṣasadbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāva jñāpanāya agre iti kāla viśeṣa sadbhāvaḥ

original: āsīd iti kriyāviśeṣo,
analyzed: āsīt iti kriyā viśeṣaḥ

original: jagadupādānatā jagannimittatā ca,
analyzed: jagat upādāna tā jagat nimitta tā ca

original: nimittopādānayor bhedanirasanena tasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktiyogaś cety aprajñātaḥ sahasraśo viśeṣā eva pratipāditāḥ / (34)
analyzed: nimitta upādānayoḥ bheda nirasanena tasya eva brahmaṇaḥ sarva śakti yogaḥ ca iti aprajñātaḥ sahasraśas viśeṣāḥ eva pratipāditāḥ  /

original: yato vāstavakāryakāraṇabhāvādivijñāne pravṛttam ata evāsad evedam agra āsīd ityārabhyāsatkāryavādaniṣedhaś ca kriyate kutas tu khalu somyaivaṃ  #
analyzed: yatas vāstava kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi vijñāne pravṛttam atas eva asat eva idam agre āsīt iti ārabhya asat kārya vāda niṣedhaḥ ca kriyate kutas tu khalu somya evam

original: syād iti /
analyzed: syāt iti

original: prāgasata utpattir ahetuketyarthaḥ /
analyzed: prāk asataḥ utpattiḥ ahetukā iti arthaḥ

original: tad evopapādayati katham asataḥ saj jāyeteti /
analyzed: tat eva upapādayati katham asataḥ sat jāyeta iti

original: asata utpannam asadātmakam eva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: asataḥ utpannam asat ātmakam eva bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: yathā mṛd utpannaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ mṛdātmakam /
analyzed: yathā mṛd utpannam ghaṭa ādikam mṛd ātmakam

original: sata utpattir nāma vyavahāraviśeṣahetubhūto 'vasthāviśeṣayogaḥ / (35)
analyzed: sataḥ utpattiḥ nāma vyavahāra viśeṣa hetu bhūtaḥ vasthā viśeṣa yogaḥ

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati

original: ekam eva kāraṇabhūtaṃ dravyam avasthāntarayogena kāryam ity ucyata ity ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratipipādayiṣitam /
analyzed: ekam eva kāraṇa bhūtam dravyam avasthā antara yogena kāryam iti ucyate iti eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam pratipipādayiṣitam

original: tad asatkāryavāde na setsyati /
analyzed: tat asatkārya vāde na setsyati

original: tathā hi nimittasamavāyyasamavāyiprabhṛtiḥ kāraṇair avayavyākhyaṃ kāryaṃ dravyāntaram
analyzed: tathā hi nimitta samavāyi asamavāyi prabhṛtiḥ kāraṇaiḥ avayavi ākhyam kāryam dravya antaram

original: evotpadyata iti kāraṇabhūtād vastunaḥ kāryasya vastvantaratvān na tajjñānenāsya jñātatā
analyzed: eva utpadyate iti kāraṇa bhūtāt vastunaḥ kāryasya vastu antara tvāt na tad jñānena asya jñāta tā

original: katham api saṃbhavatīti /
analyzed: katham api saṃbhavati iti

original: katham avayavi dravyāntaraṃ nirasyata iti cet /
analyzed: katham avayavi dravya antaram nirasyate iti ced

original: kāraṇagatāvasthāntarayogasya dravyāntarotpattivādinaḥ saṃpratipannasyaivaikatvanāmāntarāder
analyzed: kāraṇa gata avasthā antara yogasya dravya antara utpatti vādinaḥ saṃpratipannasya eva eka tva nāma antara ādeḥ

original: upapādakatvād dravyāntarādarśanāc ceti kāraṇam evāvasthāntarāpannaṃ kāryam ity ucyata ity uktam / (36)
analyzed: upapādaka tvāt dravya antara adarśanāt ca iti kāraṇam eva avasthā antara āpannam kāryam iti ucyate iti uktam

original: nanu niradhiṣṭhānabhramāsaṃbhavajñāpanāyāsatkāryavādanirāsaḥ kriyate /
analyzed: nanu niradhiṣṭhāna bhrama asaṃbhava jñāpanāya asatkārya vāda nirāsaḥ kriyate

original: tathā hy ekaṃ cidrūpaṃ satyam evāvidyāc chāditaṃ jagadrūpeṇa vivartata ity avidyāśrayatvāya mūlakāraṇaṃ satyam ity abhyupagantavyam ity asatkāryavādanirāsaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi ekam cit rūpam satyam eva avidyāt chāditam jagat rūpeṇa vivartate iti avidyā āśraya tvāya mūlakāraṇam satyam iti abhyupagantavyam iti asatkārya vāda nirāsaḥ

original: naitad evam /
analyzed: na etat evam

original: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñādṛṣṭāntamukhena satkāryavādasyaiva prasaktatvād ity uktam /
analyzed: eka vijñānena sarva vijñāna pratijñā dṛṣṭānta mukhena satkārya vādasya eva prasakta tvāt iti uktam

original: bhavatpakṣe niradhiṣṭhānabhramāsaṃbhavasya durupapādatvāc ca /
analyzed: bhavat pakṣe niradhiṣṭhāna bhrama asaṃbhavasya durupapāda tvāt ca

original: yasya hi cetanagatadoṣaḥ pāramārthiko doṣāśrayatvaṃ ca pāramārthikaṃ tasya pāramārthikadoṣeṇa yuktasyāpāramārthikagandharvanagarādidarśanam
analyzed: yasya hi cetana gata doṣaḥ pāramārthikaḥ doṣa āśraya tvam ca pāramārthikam tasya pāramārthika doṣeṇa yuktasya a pāramārthika gandharvanagara ādi darśanam

original: yasya tu doṣaś cāpāramārthiko doṣāśrayatvaṃ cāpāramārthikaṃ tasyāpāramārthikenāpy āśrayeṇa tad upapannam iti bhavatpakṣe na niradhiṣṭhānabhramāsaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: yasya tu doṣaḥ ca apāramārthikaḥ doṣa āśraya tvam ca apāramārthikam tasya apāramārthikena api āśrayeṇa tat upapannam iti bhavat pakṣe na niradhiṣṭhāna bhrama asaṃbhavaḥ

original: śodhakeṣv api satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma,
analyzed: śodhakeṣu api satyam jñānam anantam brahma

original: ānando brahmetyādiṣu vākyeṣu sāmānyādhikaraṇyavyutpattisiddhānekaguṇaviśiṣṭaikārthāvabodhanam aviruddham iti sarvaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahmābhidhīyata  #
analyzed: ānandaḥ brahma ityādiṣu vākyeṣu sāmānya adhikaraṇya vyutpatti siddha aneka guṇa viśiṣṭa eka artha avabodhanam aviruddham iti sarva guṇa viśiṣṭam brahma abhidhīyata

original: iti pūrvam evoktam / (38)
analyzed: iti pūrvam eva uktam

original: athāta ādeśo neti netīti bahudhā niṣedho dṛṣyata iti cet /
analyzed: atha atas ādeśaḥ na iti na iti iti bahudhā niṣedhaḥ dṛṣyate iti ced

original: kim atra niṣidhyata iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: kim atra niṣidhyate iti vaktavyam

original: dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe mūrtaṃ caivāmūrtaṃ ceti mūrtāmūrtātmakaḥ prapañcaḥ sarvo 'pi niṣidhyata iti cen naivam /
analyzed: dve vāva brahmaṇaḥ rūpe mūrtam ca eva amūrtam ca iti mūrta amūrta ātmakaḥ prapañcaḥ niṣidhyate iti ced na evam

original: brahmaṇo rūpatayāprajñātaṃ sarvaṃ rūpatayopadiśya punar tad eva niṣeddhum ayuktam /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ rūpa tayā a prajñātam sarvam rūpa tayā upadiśya punar tat eva niṣeddhum ayuktam

original: prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya dūrād asparśanaṃ varam iti nyāyāt /
analyzed: prakṣālanāt hi paṅkasya dūrāt asparśanam varam iti nyāyāt

original: kas tarhi niṣedhavākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tarhi niṣedha vākya arthaḥ

original: sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva vadati prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūya iti /
analyzed: sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva vadati prakṛta etāvat tvam hi pratiṣedhati tatas bravīti ca bhūyas iti

original: uttaratra atha nāmadheyaṃ saty asya satyaṃ prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣām eṣa satyam iti satyādiguṇagaṇasya pratipāditatvāt pūrvaprakṛtaitāvanmātraṃ  #
analyzed: uttaratra atha nāmadheyam satī asya satyam prāṇāḥ vai satyam teṣām eṣa satyam iti satya ādi guṇa gaṇasya pratipādita tvāt pūrva prakṛta etāvat mātram

original: na bhavati brahmeti,
analyzed: na bhavati brahma iti

original: brahmaṇa etāvanmātratā pratiṣidhyata iti sūtrārthaḥ / (39)
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ etāvat mātra tā pratiṣidhyate iti sūtra arthaḥ

original: neha nānāsti kiṃcanetyādinā nānātvapratiṣedha eva dṛṣyata iti cet /
analyzed: na iha nānā asti kiṃcana ityādinā nānātva pratiṣedhaḥ eva dṛṣyate iti ced

original: atrāpy uttaratra sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśana iti satyasaṅkalpatvasarveśvaratvapratipādanāc
analyzed: atra api uttaratra sarvasya vaśī sarvasya īśanaḥ iti satya saṅkalpa tva sarva īśvara tva pratipādanāt

original: cetanavastuśarīra īśvara iti sarvaprakārasaṃsthitaḥ sa eka eveti tatpratyanīkābrahmātmakanānātvaṃ
analyzed: cetana vastu śarīre īśvaraḥ iti sarva prakāra saṃsthitaḥ saḥ ekaḥ eva iti tad pratyanīka a brahma ātmaka nānātvam

original: pratiṣiddhaṃ na bhavadabhimatam /
analyzed: pratiṣiddham na bhavat abhimatam

original: sarvāsv evaṃprakārāsu śrutiṣv iyam eva sthitir iti na kvacid api brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaniṣedhakavācī ko 'pi śabdo dṛśyate / (40)
analyzed: sarvāsu evaṃprakārāsu śrutiṣu iyam eva sthitiḥ iti na kvacid api brahmaṇaḥ sa viśeṣa tva niṣedhaka vācī śabdaḥ dṛśyate  /

original: api ca nirviśeṣajñānamātraṃ brahma tac cāchādikāvidyātirohitasvarūpaṃ svagatanānātvaṃ paśyatīty ayam artho na ghaṭate /
analyzed: api ca nirviśeṣa jñāna mātram brahma tat ca āchādika avidyā tirohita svarūpam svagata nānātvam paśyati iti ayam arthaḥ na ghaṭate

original: tirodhānaṃ nāma prakāśanivāraṇam /
analyzed: tirodhānam nāma prakāśa nivāraṇam

original: svarūpātirekiprakāśadharmānabhyupagamena prakāśasyaiva svarūpatvāt svarūpanāśa eva syāt /
analyzed: svarūpa atireki prakāśa dharma an abhyupagamena prakāśasya eva svarūpa tvāt svarūpa nāśaḥ eva syāt

original: prakāśaparyāyaṃ jñānaṃ nityaṃ sa ca prakāśo 'vidyātirohita iti bāliśabhāṣitam idam /
analyzed: prakāśa paryāyam jñānam nityam sa ca prakāśaḥ vidyā tirohitaḥ iti bāliśa bhāṣitam idam

original: avidyayā prakāśatirohita iti prakāśotpattipratibandho vidyamānasya vināśo vā /
analyzed: avidyayā prakāśa tirohitaḥ iti prakāśa utpatti pratibandhaḥ vidyamānasya vināśaḥ vā

original: prakāśasyānutpādyatvād vināśa eva syāt /
analyzed: prakāśasya an utpādya tvāt vināśaḥ eva syāt

original: prakāśo nityo nirvikāras tiṣṭhatīti cet /
analyzed: prakāśaḥ nityaḥ nirvikāraḥ tiṣṭhati iti ced

original: satyām apy avidyāyāṃ brahmaṇi na kiṃcit tirohitam iti nānātvaṃ paśyatīti bhavatām ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ satsv anirvacanīya eva / (41)
analyzed: satyām api avidyāyām brahmaṇi na kiṃcid tirohitam iti nānātvam paśyati iti bhavatām ayam vyavahāraḥ satsu anirvacanīyaḥ eva

original: nanu ca bhavato 'pi vijñānasvarūpa ātmābhyupagantavyaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca bhavataḥ pi vijñāna svarūpaḥ ātmā abhyupagantavyaḥ

original: sa ca svayaṃprakāśaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca svayaṃprakāśaḥ

original: tasya ca devādisvarūpātmābhimāne svarūpaprakāśatirodhānam avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam /
analyzed: tasya ca deva ādi sva rūpa ātma abhimāne sva rūpa prakāśa tirodhānam avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam

original: svarūpaprakāśe sati svātmany ākārāntarādhyāsāyogāt /
analyzed: svarūpa prakāśe sati svātmani ākāra antara adhyāsa ayogāt

original: ato bhavataś cāyaṃ samāno doṣaḥ /
analyzed: atas bhavataḥ ca ayam samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: kiṃ cāsmākam ekasminn evātmani bhavadudīritaṃ durghaṭatvam bhavatām ātmānantyābhyupagamāt sarveṣv ayaṃ doṣaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ / (42)
analyzed: kim ca asmākam ekasmin eva ātmani bhavat udīritam durghaṭa tvam bhavatām ātma ānantya abhyupagamāt sarveṣu ayam doṣaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ  /

original: atrocyate svabhāvato malapratyanīkānantajñānānandaikasvarūpaṃ svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayāparimitodāraguṇasāgaraṃ
analyzed: atrā ucyate svabhāvataḥ mala pratyanīka ananta jñāna ānanda eka svarūpam svābhāvika anavadhika atiśaya aparimita udāra guṇa sāgaram

original: nimeṣakāṣṭhākalāmuhūrtādiparārdhaparyantāparimitavyavacchedasvarūpasarvotpattisthitivināśādisarvapariṇāmanimittabhūtakālakṛtapariṇāmāspaṣṭānantamahāvibhūti
svalīlāparikarasvāṃśabhūtānantabaddhamuktanānāvidhacetanatadbhogyabhūtānantavicitrapariṇāmaśakticetanetaravastujātāntaryāmitvakṛtasarvaśaktiśarīratvasarvaprakarśāvasthānāvasthitaṃ
paraṃ brahmaiva vedyaṃ,
analyzed: param brahma eva vedyam

original: tatsākṣātkārakṣamabhagavaddvaipāyanaparāśaravālmīkimanuyājñavalkyagautamāpastambaprabhṛtimunigaṇapraṇītavidhyarthavādamantrasvarūpavedamūletihāsapurāṇadharmaśāstropabhṛṃhitaparamārthabhūtānādinidhanāvicchinnapāṭhasaṃpradāyargyajuḥsāmātharvarūpānantaśākhaṃ
analyzed: tad sākṣātkāra kṣama bhagavat dvaipāyana parāśara vālmīki manu yājñavalkya gautama āpastamba prabhṛti muni gaṇa praṇīta vidhi arthavāda mantra svarūpa veda mūla itihāsa purāṇa dharma śāstra upabhṛṃhita parama artha bhūta anādi nidhana avicchinna pāṭha saṃpradāya ṛc yajus sāma atharva rūpa ananta śākham

original: vedaṃ cābhyupagacchatām asmākaṃ kiṃ na setsyati /
analyzed: vedam ca abhyupagacchatām asmākam kim na setsyati

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā dvaipāyanena mahābhārate
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā dvaipāyanena mahābhārate

original: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram /
analyzed: yaḥ mām ajam anādim ca vetti loka mahā īśvaram

original: dvāv imau puraṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca /
analyzed: dvau imau pura ṣau loke kṣaraḥ ca akṣaraḥ eva ca

original: kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate //
analyzed: kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭasthaḥ kṣaraḥ ucyate

original: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ paramātmā iti udāhṛtaḥ

original: yo lokatrayam āviśya vibhartyavyaya īśvaraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ lokatrayam āviśya vibharti avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: kālaṃ ca pacate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhūḥ /
analyzed: kālam ca pacate tatra na kālaḥ tatra vai prabhūḥ

original: ete vai nirayās tāta sthānasya paramātmanaḥ //
analyzed: ete vai nirayāḥ tāta sthānasya paramātmanaḥ

original: avyaktādiviśeṣāntaṃ pariṇāmarddhisaṃyuktam /
analyzed: avyakta ādi viśeṣa antam pariṇāma ṛddhi saṃyuktam

original: krīḍā harer idaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaram ity avadhāryatām //
analyzed: krīḍā hareḥ idam sarvam kṣaram iti avadhāryatām

original: kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānām utpattir api cāpyayaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ eva hi lokānām utpattiḥ api ca apyayaḥ

original: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram //
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idam viśvam carācaram

original: iti / kṛṣṇasya hi kṛta iti kṛṣṇasya śeṣabhūtaṃ sarvam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iti kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte iti kṛṣṇasya śeṣa bhūtam sarvam iti arthaḥ

original: bhagavatā parāśareṇāpy uktam
analyzed: bhagavatā parāśareṇa api uktam

original: śuddhe mahāvibhūtyākhye pare brahmaṇi śabdyate /
analyzed: śuddhe mahāvibhūti ākhye pare brahmaṇi śabdyate

original: maitreya bhagavacchabdaḥ sarvakāraṇakāraṇe //
analyzed: maitreya bhagavat śabdaḥ sarva kāraṇa kāraṇe

original: jñānaśaktibalāiśvaryavīryatejāṃsy aśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: jñāna śakti bala aiśvarya vīrya tejāṃsi aśeṣatas

original: bhagavacchabdavācyāni vinā heyair guṇādibhiḥ //
analyzed: bhagavat śabda vācyāni vinā heyaiḥ guṇa ādibhiḥ

original: evam eṣa mahāśabdo maitreya bhagavān iti /
analyzed: evam eṣa mahā śabdaḥ maitreya bhagavān iti

original: paramabrahmabhūtasya vāsudevasya nānyagaḥ //
analyzed: parama brahma bhūtasya vāsudevasya na anya gaḥ

original: tatra pūjyapadārthoktiparibhāṣāsamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pūjya padārtha ukti paribhāṣā samanvitaḥ

original: śabdo 'yaṃ nopacāreṇa tv anyatra hy upacārataḥ //
analyzed: śabdaḥ yam na upacāreṇa tu anyatra hi upacārataḥ

original: evaṃprakāram amalaṃ satyaṃ vyāpakam akṣayam /
analyzed: evaṃprakāram amalam satyam vyāpakam akṣayam

original: samastaheyarahitaṃ viṣṇvākhyaṃ paramaṃ padam //
analyzed: samasta heya rahitam viṣṇu ākhyam paramam padam

original: kalāmuhūrtādimayaś ca kālo na yadvibhūteḥ pariṇāmahetuḥ //
analyzed: kalā muhūrta ādi mayaḥ ca kālaḥ na yad vibhūteḥ pariṇāma hetuḥ

original: krīḍato bālakasyeva ceṣṭās tasya niśāmaya //
analyzed: krīḍataḥ bālakasya iva ceṣṭāḥ tasya niśāmaya

original: ityādi / manunāpi
analyzed: ityādi manunā api

original: praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣām aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām /
analyzed: praśāsitāram sarveṣām aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām

original: ityuktam / yājñavalkyenāpi
analyzed: iti uktam yājñavalkyena api

original: kṣetrasyeśvarajñānād viśuddhiḥ paramā matā /
analyzed: kṣetrasya īśvara jñānāt viśuddhiḥ paramā matā

original: iti / āpastambenāpi pūḥ prāṇinaḥ sarva eva guhāśayasyeti /
analyzed: iti āpastambena api pūḥ prāṇinaḥ sarve eva guhā āśayasya iti

original: sarve prāṇino guhāśayas paramātmanaḥ pūḥ puraṃ śarīram ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarve prāṇinaḥ guhā āśayaḥ paramātmanaḥ pūḥ puram śarīram iti arthaḥ

original: prāṇina iti sajīvātmabhūtasaṃghātaḥ / (43)
analyzed: prāṇinaḥ iti sa jīva ātma bhūta saṃghātaḥ

original: nanu ca kim anenāḍambareṇa /
analyzed: nanu ca kim anena āḍambareṇa

original: codyaṃ tu na parihṛtam /
analyzed: codyam tu na parihṛtam

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: evam abhyupagacchatām asmākam ātmadharmabhūtasya caitanyasya svābhāvikasyāpi karmaṇā pāramārthikaṃ saṃkocaṃ vikāsaṃ ca bruvatāṃ sarvam idaṃ  #
analyzed: evam abhyupagacchatām asmākam ātma dharma bhūtasya caitanyasya svābhāvikasya api karmaṇā pāramārthikam saṃkocam vikāsam ca bruvatām sarvam idam

original: parihṛtam /
analyzed: parihṛtam

original: bhavas tu prakāśa eva svarūpam iti prakāśo na dharmabhūtas tasya saṃkocavikāsau vā nābyupagamyete /
analyzed: bhavaḥ tu prakāśaḥ eva svarūpam iti prakāśaḥ na dharma bhūtaḥ tasya saṃkoca vikāsau vā na abyupagamyete

original: prakāśaprasārānutpattim eva tirodhānabhūtāḥ karmādayaḥ kurvanti /
analyzed: prakāśa prasāra anutpattim eva tirodhāna bhūtāḥ karma ādayaḥ kurvanti

original: avidyā cet tirodhānaṃ tirodhānabhūtatayāvidyayā svarūpabhūtaprakāśanāśa iti pūrvam evoktam /
analyzed: avidyā ced tirodhānam tirodhāna bhūta tayā avidyayā sva rūpa bhūta prakāśa nāśaḥ iti pūrvam eva uktam

original: asmākaṃ tv avidyārūpeṇa karmaṇā svarūpanityadharmabhūtaprakāśaḥ saṃkucitaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam tu avidyā rūpeṇa karmaṇā sva rūpa nitya dharma bhūta prakāśaḥ saṃkucitaḥ

original: tena devādisvarūpātmābhimāno bhavatīti viśeṣaḥ / yathoktam
analyzed: tena deva ādi sva rūpa ātma abhimānaḥ bhavati iti viśeṣaḥ yathā uktam

original: avidyā karmasaṃjñānyā tṛtīyā śaktir iṣyate //
analyzed: avidyā karma saṃjñā anyā tṛtīyā śaktiḥ iṣyate

original: yathā kṣetraśaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarvagā /
analyzed: yathā kṣetra śaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarvagā

original: saṃsāratāpān akhilān avāpnoty atisaṃtatān //
analyzed: saṃsāra tāpān akhilān avāpnoti ati saṃtatān

original: tayā tirohitatvāc ca śaktiḥ kṣetrajñasaṃjñitā /
analyzed: tayā tirohita tvāt ca śaktiḥ kṣetrajña saṃjñitā

original: sarvabhūteṣu bhūpāle tāratamyena vartate //
analyzed: sarva bhūteṣu bhūpāle tāratamyena vartate

original: iti / kṣetrajñānāṃ svadharmabhūtasya jñānasya karmasaṃjñāvidyayā saṃkocaṃ vikāsaṃ ca darśayati / (44)
analyzed: iti kṣetrajñānām svadharma bhūtasya jñānasya karma saṃjñā avidyayā saṃkocam vikāsam ca darśayati

original: api cācchādikāvidyā śrutibhiś cāikyopadeśabalāc ca brahmasvarūpatirodhānaheyadoṣarūpāśrīyate tasyāś ca mithyārūpatvena prapañcavatsvadarśanamūladoṣāpekṣatvāt
analyzed: api ca ācchādikā avidyā śrutibhiḥ ca aikya upadeśa balāt ca brahma svarūpa tirodhāna heya doṣa rūpā āśrīyate tasyāḥ ca mithyā rūpa tvena prapañca vat sva darśana mūla doṣa apekṣa tvāt

original: na sā mithyā darśanamūladoṣaḥ syād iti brahmaiva mithyādarśanamūlaṃ syāt /
analyzed: na sā mithyā darśana mūla doṣaḥ syāt iti brahma eva mithyā darśana mūlam syāt

original: tasyāś cānāditve 'pi mithyārūpatvād eva brahmadṛśyatvenaivānāditvāt taddarśanamūlaparamārthadoṣānabhyupagamāc ca brahmaiva taddarśanamūlaṃ
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca anādi tve pi mithyā rūpa tvāt eva brahma dṛśya tvena eva anādi tvāt tad darśana mūla paramārtha doṣa anabhyupagamāt ca brahma eva tad darśana mūlam

original: tasya nityatvād anirmokṣa eva / (45)
analyzed: tasya nitya tvāt anirmokṣaḥ eva

original: ata evedam api nirastam ekam eva śarīraṃ jīvavat,
analyzed: atas eva idam api nirastam ekam eva śarīram jīva vat

original: nirjīvānītarāṇi śarīrāṇi svapnadṛṣṭanānāvidhānantaśarīrāṇāṃ yathā nirjīvatvam /
analyzed: nirjīvāni itarāṇi śarīrāṇi svapna dṛṣṭa nānāvidha ananta śarīrāṇām yathā nirjīva tvam

original: tatra svapne draṣṭuḥ śarīram ekam eva jīvavat /
analyzed: tatra svapne draṣṭuḥ śarīram ekam eva jīvavat

original: tasya svapnavelāyāṃ dṛśyabhūtanānāvidhaśarīrāṇāṃ nirjīvatvam eva /
analyzed: tasya svapna velāyām dṛśya bhūta nānāvidha śarīrāṇām nirjīva tvam eva

original: anenaikenaiva parikalpitatvāj jīvā mithyābhūtā iti brahmaṇā svasvarūpavyatiriktasya
analyzed: anena ekena eva parikalpita tvāt jīvāḥ mithyā bhūtāḥ iti brahmaṇā sva svarūpa vyatiriktasya

original: jīvabhāvasya sarvaśarīrāṇāṃ ca kalpitatvād ekasminn api śarīre śarīravaj jīvabhāvasya
analyzed: jīva bhāvasya sarva śarīrāṇām ca kalpita tvāt ekasmin api śarīre śarīra vat jīva bhāvasya

original: ca mithyārūpatvāt sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi mithyārūpāṇi,
analyzed: ca mithyā rūpa tvāt sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi mithyā rūpāṇi

original: tatra jīvabhāvaś ca mithyārūpa ity ekasya śarīrasya tatra jīvabhāvasya ca na kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra jīva bhāvaḥ ca mithyārūpaḥ iti ekasya śarīrasya tatra jīva bhāvasya ca na kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: asmākaṃ tu svapne draṣṭuḥ svaśarīrasya tasminn ātmasadbhāvasya ca prabodhavelāyām
analyzed: asmākam tu svapne draṣṭuḥ sva śarīrasya tasmin ātma sadbhāvasya ca prabodha velāyām

original: abādhitatvān anyeṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ tadgatajīvānāṃ ca bādhitatvāt te sarve mithyābhūtāḥ
analyzed: a bādhita tvāt anyeṣām śarīrāṇām tad gata jīvānām ca bādhita tvāt te sarve mithyā bhūtāḥ

original: svaśarīram ekaṃ tasmiñ jīvabhāvaś ca paramārtha iti viśeṣaḥ / (46)
analyzed: sva śarīram ekam tasmin jīva bhāvaḥ ca paramārthaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ

original: api ca kena vā vidyānivṛttiḥ sā kīdṛśīti vivecanīyam /
analyzed: api ca kena vā vidyā nivṛttiḥ sā kīdṛśī iti vivecanīyam

original: aikyajñānaṃ nivartakaṃ nivṛttiś cānirvacanīyapratyanīkākāreti cet /
analyzed: aikya jñānam nivartakam nivṛttiḥ ca anirvacanīya pratyanīka ākārā iti ced

original: anirvacanīyapratyanīkaṃ nirvacanīyaṃ tac ca sad vāsad vā dvirūpaṃ vā koṭyantaraṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: anirvacanīya pratyanīkam nirvacanīyam tat ca sat vā asat vā dvirūpam vā koṭi antaram na vidyate

original: brahmavyatirekeṇaitadabhyupagame punar avidyā na nivṛttā syāt /
analyzed: brahma vyatirekeṇa etat abhyupagame punar avidyā na nivṛttā syāt

original: brahmaiva cen nivṛttis tatprāg apy aviśiṣṭam iti vedāntajñānāt pūrvam eva nivṛttiḥ syāt /
analyzed: brahmā eva ced nivṛttiḥ tad prāk api aviśiṣṭam iti vedānta jñānāt pūrvam eva nivṛttiḥ syāt

original: aikyajñānaṃ nivartakaṃ tadabhāvāt saṃsāra iti bhavaddarśanaṃ vihanyate / (47)
analyzed: aikya jñānam nivartakam tad abhāvāt saṃsāraḥ iti bhavat darśanam vihanyate

original: kiñ ca nivartakajñānasyāpy avidyārūparvāt tannivartanaṃ keneti vaktavyam /
analyzed: kim ca nivartaka jñānasya api avidyā rūpa rvāt tad nivartanam kena iti vaktavyam

original: nivartakajñānaṃ svetarasamastabhedaṃ nivartya kṣaṇikatvād eva svayam eva vinaśyati dāvānalaviṣanāśanaviṣāntaravad iti cen na /
analyzed: nivartaka jñānam sva itara samasta bhedam nivartya kṣaṇika tvāt eva svayam eva vinaśyati dāva anala viṣa nāśana viṣa antara vat iti ced na

original: nivartakajñānasya brahmavyatiriktatvena tatsvarūpatadutpattivināśānāṃ mithyārūpatvāt tadvināśarūpā vidyā tiṣṭhaty eveti tadvināśadarśanasya  #
analyzed: nivartaka jñānasya brahma vyatirikta tvena tad svarūpa tad utpatti vināśānām mithyā rūpa tvāt tad vināśa rūpā vidyā tiṣṭhati eva iti tad vināśa darśanasya

original: nivartakaṃ vaktacyam eva /
analyzed: nivartakam vaktacyam eva

original: dāvāgnyādīnām api pūrvāvasthāvirodhipariṇāmaparaṃparāvarjanīyaiva / (48)
analyzed: dāva agni ādīnām api pūrva avasthā virodhi pariṇāma paraṃparā varjanīyā eva

original: api ca cinmātrabrahmavyatiriktakṛtsnaniṣedhaviṣayajñānasya ko 'yaṃ jñātā /
analyzed: api ca cit mātra brahma vyatirikta kṛtsna niṣedha viṣaya jñānasya kaḥ yam jñātā

original: adhyāsarūpa iti cen na /
analyzed: adhyāsa rūpaḥ iti ced na

original: tasya niṣedhatayā nivartakajñānakarmatvāt tatkartṛtvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tasya niṣedha tayā nivartaka jñāna karma tvāt tad kartṛ tva anupapatteḥ

original: brahmasvarūpa eveti cen na /
analyzed: brahma svarūpaḥ eva iti ced na

original: brahmaṇo nivartakajñānaṃ prati jñātṛtvaṃ kiṃ svarūpam utādhyastam /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ nivartaka jñānam prati jñātṛ tvam kim svarūpam uta adhyastam

original: adhyastaṃ ced ayam adhyāsas tanmūlavidyāntaraṃ ca nivartakajñānaviṣayatayā tiṣṭhaty eva /
analyzed: adhyastam ced ayam adhyāsaḥ tad mūla vidyā antaram ca nivartaka jñāna viṣaya tayā tiṣṭhati eva

original: tannivartakāntarābhyupagame tasyāpi trirūpatayānavasthaiva /
analyzed: tad nivartaka antara abhyupagame tasya api tri rūpa tayā anavasthā eva

original: sarvasya hi jñānasya trirūpakatvavirahe jñānatvam eva hīyate /
analyzed: sarvasya hi jñānasya tri rūpaka tva virahe jñāna tvam eva hīyate

original: kasyacit kaṃcanārthaviśeṣaṃ prati siddhirūpatvāt /
analyzed: kasyacid kaṃcana artha viśeṣam prati siddhi rūpa tvāt

original: jñānasya trirūpatvavirahe bhavatāṃ svarūpabhūtajñānavan nivartakajñānam apy anivartakaṃ syāt /
brahmasvarūpasyaiva jñātṛtvābhyupagame 'smadīya eva pakṣaḥ parigṛhītaḥ syāt /
analyzed: brahma svarūpasya eva jñātṛ tva abhyupagame smadīyaḥ eva pakṣaḥ parigṛhītaḥ syāt

original: nivartakajñānasvarūpajñātṛtvaṃ ca svanivartyāntargatam iti vacanaṃ bhūtalavyatiriktaṃ
analyzed: nivartaka jñāna svarūpa jñātṛ tvam ca sva nivartya antargatam iti vacanam bhū tala vyatiriktam

original: kṛtsnaṃ chinnaṃ devadattenety asyām eva chedanakriyāyām asyāś chedanakriyāyāś chettṛtvasya
analyzed: kṛtsnam chinnam devadattena iti asyām eva chedana kriyāyām asyāḥ chedana kriyāyāḥ chettṛ tvasya

original: ca chedyāntarbhāvavacanavad upahāsyam / (49)
analyzed: ca chedya antarbhāva vacana vat upahāsyam

original: api ca nikhilabhedanivartakam idam aikyajñānaṃ kena jātam iti vimarśanīyam /
analyzed: api ca nikhila bheda nivartakam idam aikya jñānam kena jātam iti vimarśanīyam

original: śrutyaiveti cen na /
analyzed: śrutyā eva iti ced na

original: tasyā brahmavyatiriktāyā avidyāparikalpitatvāt prapañcabādhakajñānasyotpādakatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: tasyāḥ brahma vyatiriktāyāḥ avidyā parikalpita tvāt prapañca bādhaka jñānasya utpādaka tvam na saṃbhavati

original: tathā hi duṣṭakāraṇajātam api rajjusarpajñānaṃ na duṣṭakāraṇajanyena rajjur iyaṃ na sarpa iti jñānena bādhyate /
analyzed: tathā hi duṣṭa kāraṇa jātam api rajju sarpa jñānam na duṣṭa kāraṇa janyena rajjuḥ iyam na sarpaḥ iti jñānena bādhyate

original: rajjusarpajñānabhaye vartamāne kenacidbhrāntena puruṣeṇa rajjur iyaṃ na sarpa ityukte
analyzed: rajju sarpa jñāna bhaye vartamāne kenacid bhrāntena puruṣeṇa rajjuḥ iyam na sarpaḥ iti ukte

original: 'py ayaṃ bhrānta iti jñāte sati tadvacanaṃ rajjusarpajñānasya bādhakaṃ na bhavati
analyzed: pi ayam bhrāntaḥ iti jñāte sati tat vacanam rajju sarpa jñānasya bādhakam na bhavati

original: bhayaṃ ca na nivartate /
analyzed: bhayam ca na nivartate

original: prayojakajñānavataḥ śravaṇavelāyām eva hi brahmavyatiriktatvena śruter api bhrāntimūlatvaṃ jñātam iti /
analyzed: prayojaka jñānavataḥ śravaṇa velāyām eva hi brahma vyatirikta tvena śruteḥ api bhrānti mūla tvam jñātam iti

original: nivartakajñānasya jñātus tatsāmagrībhūtaśāstrasya ca brahmavyatiriktatayā yadi bādhyatvam ucyate hanta tarhi prapañcanivṛtter mithyātvam āpatatīti  #
analyzed: nivartaka jñānasya jñātuḥ tad sāmagrī bhūta śāstrasya ca brahma vyatirikta tayā yadi bādhya tvam ucyate hanta tarhi prapañca nivṛtteḥ mithyātvam āpatati iti

original: prapañcasya satyatā syāt /
analyzed: prapañcasya satya tā syāt

original: svapnadṛṣṭapuruṣavākyāvagatapitrādimaraṇasya mithyātvena pitrādisatyatāvat /
analyzed: svapna dṛṣṭa puruṣa vākya avagata pitṛ ādi maraṇasya mithyātvena pitṛ ādi satya tā vat

original: kiñca tat tvam asy ādivākyaṃ na prapañcasya bādhakam /
analyzed: kiñca tat tvam asi ādi vākyam na prapañcasya bādhakam

original: bhrāntimūlatvād bhrāntaprayuktarajjusarpabādhakavākyavat / (50)
analyzed: bhrānti mūla tvāt bhrānta prayukta rajju sarpa bādhaka vākya vat

original: nanu ca svapne kasmiṃścid bhaye vartamāne svapnadaśāyām evāyaṃ svapna iti jñāte sati pūrvabhayanivṛttir dṛṣṭā /
analyzed: nanu ca svapne kasmiṃścid bhaye vartamāne svapna daśāyām eva ayam svapnaḥ iti jñāte sati pūrva bhaya nivṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā

original: tadvad atrāpi saṃbhavatīti /
analyzed: tadvat atra api saṃbhavati iti

original: naivam /
analyzed: na evam

original: svapnavelāyām eva so 'pi svapna iti jñāte sati punarbhayānivṛttir eva dṛṣṭeti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ / (51)
analyzed: svapna velāyām eva saḥ svapnaḥ iti jñāte sati punarbhaya anivṛttiḥ eva dṛṣṭā iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: śravaṇavelāyām eva so'pi svapna iti jñātam evetyuktam /
analyzed: śravaṇa velāyām eva saḥ api svapnaḥ iti jñātam eva iti uktam

original: yad api cedam uktaṃ bhrāntiparikalpitatvena mithyārūpam api śāstram advitīyaṃ brahmeti bodhayati tasya sato brahmaṇo viṣayasya paścāt tanabādhādarśanād  #
analyzed: yat api ca idam uktam bhrānti parikalpita tvena mithyā rūpam api śāstram advitīyam brahma iti bodhayati tasya sataḥ brahmaṇaḥ viṣayasya paścāt tana bādhā darśanāt

original: brahma susthitam eveti /
analyzed: brahma susthitam eva iti

original: tad ayuktam /
analyzed: tat ayuktam

original: śūnyam eva tat tvam iti vākyena tasyāpi bādhitatvāt /

original: idaṃ bhrāntimūlavākyam iti cet /

original: sad advitīyaṃ brahmeti vākyam api bhrāntimūlam iti tvayaivoktam /

original: paścāt tanabādhādarśanaṃ tu sarvaśūnyavākyasyaiveti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: paścāt tana bādhā darśanam tu sarva śūnya vākyasya eva iti viśeṣaḥ

original: sarvaśūnyavādino brahmavyatiriktavastumithyātvavādinaś ca svapakṣasādhanapramāṇapāramārthyānabyupagamenābhiyuktair vādānadhikāra eva pratipāditaḥ
analyzed: sarva śūnyavādinaḥ brahma vyatirikta vastu mithyātva vādinaḥ ca sva pakṣa sādhana pramāṇa pāramārthya an abyupagamena abhiyuktaiḥ vāda anadhikāraḥ eva pratipāditaḥ

original: adhikāro 'nabhyupāyatvān na vāde śūnyavādinaḥ / iti / (52)
analyzed: adhikāraḥ na abhyupāya tvāt na vāde śūnyavādinaḥ iti

original: api ca pratyakṣadṛṣṭasya prapañcasya mithyātvaṃ kena pramāṇena sādhyate /

original: pratyakṣasya doṣamūlatvenānyathāsiddhisaṃbhavān nirdoṣaṃ śāstram ananyathāsiddhaṃ pratyakṣasya bādhakam iti cet /
analyzed: pratyakṣasya doṣa mūla tvena anyathāsiddhi saṃbhavāt nirdoṣam śāstram ananyathāsiddham pratyakṣasya bādhakam iti ced

original: kena doṣeṇa jātaṃ pratyakṣam anantabhedaviṣayam iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: kena doṣeṇa jātam pratyakṣam ananta bheda viṣayam iti vaktavyam

original: anādibhedavāsanākhyadoṣajātaṃ pratyakṣam iti cet /
analyzed: anādi bheda vāsanā ākhya doṣa jātam pratyakṣam iti ced

original: hanta tarhy anenaiva doṣeṇa jātaṃ śāstram apīty ekadoṣamūlatvāc chāstrapratyakṣayor na bādhyabādhakabhāvasiddhiḥ / (53)
analyzed: hanta tarhi anena eva doṣeṇa jātam śāstram api iti eka doṣa mūla tvāt śāstra pratyakṣayoḥ na bādhya bādhaka bhāva siddhiḥ

original: ākāśavāyvādibhūtatadārabdhaśabdasparśādiyuktamanuṣyatvādisaṃsthānasaṃsthitapadārthagrāhi pratyakṣam /
analyzed: ākāśa vāyu ādi bhūta tad ārabdha śabda sparśa ādi yukta manuṣya tva ādi saṃsthāna saṃsthita padārtha grāhi pratyakṣam

original: śāstraṃ tu pratyakṣādyaparicchedyasarvāntarātmatvasatyatvādyanantaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭabrahmasvarūpatadupāsanādyārādhanaprakāratatprāptipūrvakatatprasādalabhyaphalaviśeṣatadaniṣṭakaraṇamūlanigrahaviśeṣaviṣayam
analyzed: śāstram tu pratyakṣa ādi aparicchedya sarva antarātma tva satya tva ādi ananta viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa brahma sva rūpa tad upāsana ādi ārādhana prakāra tad prāpti pūrvaka tad prasāda labhya phala viśeṣa tad aniṣṭa karaṇa mūla nigraha viśeṣa viṣayam

original: iti na śātrapratyakṣayor virodhaḥ /
analyzed: iti na śātra pratyakṣayoḥ virodhaḥ

original: anādinidhanāvicchinnapāṭasaṃpradāyatādyanekaguṇaviśiṣṭasya śāstrasya balīyastvaṃ

original: vadatā pratyakṣapāramārthyam avaśyam abhyupagantavyam ity alam anena śrutiśatavitativātavegaparāhatakudṛṣṭiduṣṭayuktijālatūlanirasanenety uparamyate
analyzed: vadatā pratyakṣa pāramārthyam avaśyam abhyupagantavyam iti alam anena śruti śata vitati vātavega parāhata kudṛṣṭi duṣṭa yukti jāla tūla nirasanena iti uparamyate

original: dvitīye tu pakṣa upādhibrahmavyatiriktavastvantarānabhyupagamād brahmaṇy evopādhisaṃsargād aupādhikāḥ sarve doṣā brahmaṇy eva bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: dvitīye tu pakṣe upādhi brahma vyatirikta vastu antara anabhyupagamāt brahmaṇi eva upādhi saṃsargāt aupādhikāḥ sarve doṣāḥ brahmaṇi eva bhaveyuḥ

original: tataś cāpahatapāpmatvādinirdoṣatvaśrutayaḥ sarve vihanyante / (55)

original: yathā ghaṭākāśādeḥ paricchinnatayā mahākāśād vailakṣaṇyaṃ parasparabhedaś ca dṛśyate
analyzed: yathā ghaṭa ākāśa ādeḥ paricchinna tayā mahā ākāśāt vailakṣaṇyam paraspara bhedaḥ ca dṛśyate

original: tatrasthā guṇā vā doṣā vānavacchinne mahākāśe na saṃbadhyante evam upādhikṛtabhedavyavasthitajīvagatā
analyzed: tatrasthāḥ guṇāḥ vā doṣāḥ vā anavacchinne mahā ākāśe na saṃbadhyante evam upādhi kṛta bheda vyavasthita jīva gatā

original: doṣā anupahite pare brahmaṇi na saṃbadhyanta iti cet /
analyzed: doṣāḥ anupahite pare brahmaṇi na saṃbadhyante iti ced

original: naitad upapadyate /
analyzed: na etat upapadyate

original: niravayavasyākāśasyānavacchedyasya ghaṭādibhiś chedāsaṃbhavāt tenaivākāśena ghaṭādayaḥ saṃyuktā iti brahmaṇo 'py acchedyatvād brahmaivopādhisaṃyuktaṃ  #
analyzed: niravayavasya ākāśasya anavacchedyasya ghaṭa ādibhiḥ cheda asaṃbhavāt tena eva ākāśena ghaṭa ādayaḥ saṃyuktāḥ iti brahmaṇaḥ api acchedya tvāt brahma eva upādhi saṃyuktam

original: syāt /
analyzed: syāt

original: ghaṭasaṃyuktākāśapradeśo 'nyasmād ākāśapradeśād bhidyata ic cet /
