original: ākāśasyaikasyaiva pradeśabhedena ghaṭādisaṃyogād ghaṭādau gacchati tasya ca pradeśabhedasyāniyama
analyzed: ākāśasya ekasya eva pradeśa bhedena ghaṭa ādi saṃyogāt ghaṭa ādau gacchati tasya ca pradeśa bhedasya aniyamaḥ

original: iti tadvad brahmaṇy eva pradeśabhedāniyamenopādhisaṃsargād upādhau gacchati saṃyuktaviyuktabrahmapradeśabhedāc
analyzed: iti tadvat brahmaṇi eva pradeśa bheda aniyamena upādhi saṃsargāt upādhau gacchati saṃyukta viyukta brahma pradeśa bhedāt

original: ca brahmaṇy evopādhisaṃsargaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bandhamokṣau syātām iti santaḥ parihasanti / (56)
analyzed: ca brahmaṇi eva upādhi saṃsargaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bandha mokṣau syātām iti santaḥ parihasanti  /

original: niravayavasyaivākāśasya śrotrendriyatve 'pīndriyavyavasthāvad brahmaṇy api vyavasthopapadyata iti cet /
analyzed: niravayavasya eva ākāśasya śrotra indriya tve pi indriya vyavasthā vat brahmaṇi api vyavasthā upapadyate iti ced

original: na vāyuviśeṣasaṃskṛtakarṇapradeśasaṃyuktasyaivākāśapradeśasyendriyatvāt tasya ca pradeśāntarābhede 'pīndriyavyavasthopapadyate /
analyzed: na vāyu viśeṣa saṃskṛta karṇa pradeśa saṃyuktasya eva ākāśa pradeśasya indriya tvāt tasya ca pradeśa antara abhede pi indriya vyavasthā upapadyate

original: ākāśasya tu sarveṣāṃ śarīreṣu gacchat svaniyamena sarvapradeśasaṃyoga iti brahmaṇy upādhisaṃyogapradeśāniyama eva / (57)
analyzed: ākāśasya tu sarveṣām śarīreṣu gacchat sva niyamena sarva pradeśa saṃyogaḥ iti brahmaṇi upādhi saṃyoga pradeśa aniyamaḥ eva

original: ākāśasya svarūpeṇaiva śrotrendriyatvam abhyupagamyāpīndriyavyavasthokatā /

original: paramārthatas tv ākāśo na śrotrendriyam /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu ākāśaḥ na śrotra indriyam

original: vaikārikād ahaṃkārād ekādaśendriyāṇi jāyanta iti hi vaidikāḥ /
analyzed: vaikārikāt ahaṃkārāt ekādaśa indriyāṇi jāyante iti hi vaidikāḥ

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇa
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā parāśareṇa

original: ekādaśaṃ manaś cātra devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ // iti /
analyzed: ekādaśam manaḥ ca atra devāḥ vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ iti

original: ayam arthaḥ /
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ

original: vaikārikas taijaso bhūtādir iti trividho 'haṃkāraḥ /
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ bhūtādiḥ iti trividhaḥ haṃkāraḥ

original: sa ca kramāt sāttviko rājasas tāmasaś ca /
analyzed: sa ca kramāt sāttvikaḥ rājasaḥ tāmasaḥ ca

analyzed: tatra tāmasāt bhūtādeḥ ākāśa ādīni bhūtāni jāyante iti sṛṣṭi kramam uktvā taijasāt rājasāt

original: ahaṃkārād ekadaśendriyāṇi jāyanta iti paramatam upanyasya sāttvikāhaṃkārād vaikārikānīndriyāṇi

analyzed: bhautika tve pi indriyāṇām ākāśa ādi bhūta vikāra tvāt eva ākāśa ādi bhūta pariṇāma viśeṣā vyavasthitā

original: eva śarīravat puruṣāṇām indriyāṇi bhavantīti brahmaṇy acchedye niravayave nirvikāre
analyzed: eva śarīra vat puruṣāṇām indriyāṇi bhavanti iti brahmaṇi acchedye niravayave nirvikāre

original: tv aniyamenānantaheyopādhisaṃsargadoṣo duṣparihara eveti śraddadhānānām evāyam pakṣa
analyzed: tu aniyamena ananta heya upādhi saṃsarga doṣaḥ duṣpariharaḥ eva iti śraddadhānānām eva ayam pakṣa

original: iti śāstravido na bahu manyante /
analyzed: iti śāstra vidaḥ na bahu manyante

original: svarūpapariṇāmābhyupagamād avikāratvaśrutir bādhyate /
analyzed: svarūpa pariṇāma abhyupagamāt avikāra tva śrutiḥ bādhyate

original: niravadyatā ca brahmaṇaḥ śaktipariṇāma iti cet /
analyzed: niravadya tā ca brahmaṇaḥ śakti pariṇāmaḥ iti ced

original: keyaṃ śaktir ucyate /
analyzed: kā iyam śaktiḥ ucyate

original: kiṃ brahmapariṇāmarūpā /
analyzed: kim brahma pariṇāma rūpā

original: uta brahmaṇo 'nanyā kāpīti /
analyzed: uta brahmaṇaḥ nanyā kā api iti

original: ubhayapakṣe 'pi svarūpapariṇāmo 'varjanīya eva / (58)
analyzed: ubhaya pakṣe sva rūpa pariṇāmaḥ varjanīyaḥ eva

original: tṛtīye 'pi pakṣe jīvabrahmaṇor bhedavad abhedasya cābhyupagamāt tasya ca tadbhāvāt
analyzed: tṛtīye pi pakṣe jīva brahmaṇoḥ bheda vat abhedasya ca abhyupagamāt tasya ca tad bhāvāt

original: saubharibhedavac ca svāvatārabhedavac ca sarvasyeśvarabhedatāt sarve jīvagatā doṣās tasyaiva syuḥ /
analyzed: saubhari bheda vat ca sva avatāra bheda vat ca sarvasya īśvara bheda tāt sarve jīva gatāḥ doṣāḥ tasya eva syuḥ

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati

original: īśvaraḥ svarūpeṇaiva suranaratiryaksthāvarādibhedenāvasthita iti hi tadātmakatvavarṇanaṃ kriyate /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sva rūpeṇa eva sura nara tiryak sthāvara ādi bhedena avasthitaḥ iti hi tad ātmaka tva varṇanam kriyate

original: tathā saty ekamṛtpiṇḍārabdhaghaṭaśarāvādigatāny udakāharaṇādīni sarvakāryāṇi yathā tasyaiva bhavanti,
analyzed: tathā sati eka mṛd piṇḍa ārabdha ghaṭa śarāva ādi gatāni udaka āharaṇa ādīni sarva kāryāṇi yathā tasya eva bhavanti

original: evaṃ sarvajīvagatasukhaduḥkhādi sarvam īśvaragatam eva syāt / (59)
analyzed: evam sarva jīva gata sukha duḥkha ādi sarvam īśvara gatam eva syāt

original: ghaṭaśarāvādisaṃsthānānupayuktamṛddravyaṃ yathā kāryāntarānvitam evam eva surapaśumanujādijīvatvānupayukteśvaraḥ
analyzed: ghaṭa śarāva ādi saṃsthāna anupayukta mṛd dravyam yathā kārya antara anvitam evam eva sura paśu manuja ādi jīva tva anupayukta īśvaraḥ

original: sarvajñaḥ satyasaṃkalpatvādikalyāṇaguṇākara iti cet satyaṃ sa eveśvara ekenāṃśena
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ satya saṃkalpa tva ādi kalyāṇa guṇa ākaraḥ iti ced satyam saḥ eva īśvaraḥ ekena aṃśena

original: kalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraḥ sa evānyenāṃśena heyaguṇākara ity uktam /
analyzed: kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ākaraḥ saḥ eva anyena aṃśena heya guṇa ākaraḥ iti uktam

original: dvayor aṃśayor īśvarāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: dvayoḥ aṃśayoḥ īśvara aviśeṣāt

original: dvav aṃśau vyavasthitav iti cet /
analyzed: dvau aṃśau vyavasthitau iti ced

original: kas tena lābhaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tena lābhaḥ

original: ekasyaivānekāṃśena nityaduḥkhitvād aṃśāntareṇa sukhitvam api neśvaratvāya kalpate /
analyzed: ekasya eva aneka aṃśena nitya duḥkhi tvāt aṃśa antareṇa sukhi tvam api nā īśvara tvāya kalpate

original: yathā devadattasyaikasmin haste candanapaṅkānulepakeyūrakaṭakāṅgulīyālaṃkāras tasyaivānyasmin
analyzed: yathā devadattasya ekasmin haste candana paṅka anulepa keyūra kaṭaka aṅgulīya alaṃkāraḥ tasya eva anyasmin

analyzed: haste mudgara abhighātaḥ kāla anala jvālā anupraveśaḥ ca tadvat eva īśvarasya syāt iti brahma ajñāna pakṣāt

original: api pāpīyān ayaṃ bhedābhedapakṣaḥ /
analyzed: api pāpīyān ayam bheda abheda pakṣaḥ

original: aparimitaduḥkhasya pāramārthikatvāt saṃsāriṇām anantatvena dustaratvāc ca / (60)
analyzed: aparimita duḥkhasya pāramārthika tvāt saṃsāriṇām ananta tvena dustara tvāt ca

original: tasmād vilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ jīvāṃśa iti cet /
analyzed: tasmāt vilakṣaṇaḥ yam jīvāṃśaḥ iti ced

original: āgato 'si tarhi madīyaṃ panthānam /
analyzed: āgataḥ si tarhi madīyam panthānam

original: īśvarasya svarūpeṇa tādātmyavarṇane syād ayaṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: īśvarasya sva rūpeṇa tādātmya varṇane syāt ayam doṣaḥ

original: ātmaśarīrabhāvena tu tādātmyapratipādane na kaścid doṣaḥ /
analyzed: ātma śarīra bhāvena tu tādātmya pratipādane na kaścid doṣaḥ

original: praty uta nikhilabhuvananiyamanādir mahān ayaṃ guṇagaṇaḥ pratipādito bhavati /
analyzed: prati uta nikhila bhuvana niyamana ādiḥ mahān ayam guṇa gaṇaḥ pratipāditaḥ bhavati

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca mukhyavṛttam / (61)
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca mukhya vṛttam

original: api caikasya vastuno bhinnābhinnatvaṃ viruddhatvān na saṃbhavatītyuktam /
analyzed: api ca ekasya vastunaḥ bhinna abhinna tvam viruddha tvāt na saṃbhavati iti uktam

original: ghaṭasya paṭād bhinnatve sati tasya tasminn abhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭasya paṭāt bhinna tve sati tasya tasmin abhāvaḥ

original: abhinnatve sati tasya ca bhāva iti /
analyzed: abhinna tve sati tasya ca bhāvaḥ iti

original: ekasmin kāle caikasmin deśe caikasya hi padārthasya yugapatsadbhāvo 'sadbhāvaś ca viruddhaḥ / (62)
analyzed: ekasmin kāle ca ekasmin deśe ca ekasya hi padārthasya ca viruddhaḥ

original: jātyātmanā bhāvo vyaktyātmanā cābhāva iti cet /
analyzed: jāti ātmanā bhāvaḥ vyakti ātmanā ca abhāvaḥ iti ced

original: jāter muṇḍena cābhāve sati khaṇḍe muṇḍasyāpi sadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: jāteḥ muṇḍena ca abhāve sati khaṇḍe muṇḍasya api sadbhāva prasaṅgaḥ

original: khaṇḍena ca jāter abhinnatve sadbhāvo bhinnatve cāsadbhāvaḥ aśve mahiśatvasyaiveti virodho duṣparihara eva /
analyzed: khaṇḍena ca jāteḥ abhinna tve sadbhāvaḥ bhinna tve ca asadbhāvaḥ aśve mahiśa tvasya eva iti virodhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ eva

original: jātyāder vastusaṃsthānatayā vastunaḥ prakāratvāt prakāraprakāriṇoś ca padārthāntaratvaṃ
analyzed: jāti ādeḥ vastu saṃsthāna tayā vastunaḥ prakāra tvāt prakāra prakāriṇoḥ ca padārtha antara tvam

original: prakārasya pṛthaksiddhyanarhatvaṃ pṛthaganupalambhaś ca tasya ca saṃsthānasya cānekavastuṣu
analyzed: prakārasya pṛthak siddhi anarha tvam pṛthak anupalambhaḥ ca tasya ca saṃsthānasya ca aneka vastuṣu

original: prakāratayāvasthitaś cetyādi pūrvam uktam / (63)
analyzed: prakāra tayā avasthitaḥ ca ityādi pūrvam uktam

original: so 'yam iti buddhiḥ prakārāikyād ayam api daṇḍīti buddhimat /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti buddhiḥ prakāra āikyāt ayam api daṇḍī iti buddhimat

original: ayam ca jātyādiprakāro vastuno bheda ity ucyate /
analyzed: ayam ca jāti ādi prakāraḥ vastunaḥ bhedaḥ iti ucyate

original: tadyoga eva vastuno bhinnam iti vyavahārahetur ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad yogaḥ eva vastunaḥ bhinnam iti vyavahāra hetuḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sa ca vastuno bhedavyavahārahetuḥ svasya ca saṃvedanavat /
analyzed: sa ca vastunaḥ bheda vyavahāra hetuḥ svasya ca saṃvedana vat

original: yathā saṃvedanaṃ vastuno vyavahārahetuḥ svasya vyavahārahetuś ca bhavati / (64)
analyzed: yathā saṃvedanam vastunaḥ vyavahāra hetuḥ svasya vyavahāra hetuḥ ca bhavati

original: ata eva sanmātragrāhi pratyakṣaṃ na bhedagrāhītyādivādā nirastāḥ /
analyzed: atas eva sanmātra grāhi pratyakṣam na bheda grāhi ityādi vādāḥ nirastāḥ

original: jātyādisaṃsthānasaṃsthitasyaiva vastunaḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītatvāt tasyaiva saṃsthānarūpajātyādeḥ pratiyogyapekṣayā bhedavyavahārahetutvāc ca
analyzed: jāti ādi saṃsthāna saṃsthitasya eva vastunaḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhīta tvāt tasya eva saṃsthāna rūpa jāti ādeḥ pratiyogi apekṣayā bheda vyavahāra hetu tvāt ca

original: svarūpapariṇāmadoṣaś ca pūrvam evoktaḥ / (65)
analyzed: sva rūpa pariṇāma doṣaḥ ca pūrvam eva uktaḥ

original: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivyām tiṣṭhan pṛthivyāḥ antaraḥ yam pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīram yaḥ pṛthivīm antaraḥ yamayati eṣa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro ya ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ ntaraḥ yaḥ ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati eṣa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: yaḥ pṛthivīm antare saṃcaran yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaṃ pṛthivī na vedetyādi yo 'kṣaram
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivīm antare saṃcaran yasya pṛthivī śarīram yam pṛthivī na veda ityādi yaḥ u kṣaram

original: antare saṃcaran yasyākṣaraṃ śarīraṃ akṣaraṃ na veda yo mṛtyum antare saṃcaran yasya
analyzed: antare saṃcaran yasya akṣaram śarīram akṣaram na veda yaḥ mṛtyum antare saṃcaran yasya

original: mṛtyuḥ śarīraṃ yaṃ mṛtyur na veda eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ śarīram yam mṛtyuḥ na veda eṣa sarva bhūta antarātmā apahata pāpmā divyaḥ devaḥ ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ

original: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
analyzed: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pariṣasvajāte

original: tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo 'bhicākaśīti /
analyzed: tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādu atti an aśnan anyaḥ bhicākaśīti

original: antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmā /
analyzed: antar praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām sarva ātmā

original: tatsṛṣṭvā tad evānuprāviśat /
analyzed: tat sṛṣṭvā tat eva anuprāviśat

original: tadanupraviśya sac ca tyac cānṛtaṃ ca satyam abhavat /
analyzed: tat anupraviśya sat ca tyad ca anṛtam ca satyam abhavat

original: anena jīvenātmanetyādi /
analyzed: anena jīvena ātmanā ityādi

original: pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ matvā jaṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam eti /
analyzed: pṛthak ātmānam preritāram matvā jaṣṭaḥ tatas tena amṛta tvam eti

original: bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā sarvaṃ proktaṃ trividhaṃ brahma, etat /
analyzed: bhoktā bhogyam preritāram ca matvā sarvam proktam trividham brahma etat

original: nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān /
analyzed: nityaḥ nityānām cetanaḥ cetanānām ekaḥ bahūnām yaḥ vidadhāti kāmān

original: pradhānakṣetrajñapatir guṇeśaḥ /
jñājñau dvav ajav īśānīśav ityādiśrutiśatais tadupabṛṃhaṇaiḥ
analyzed: jña ajñau dvau ajau īśāna īśau ityādi śruti śataiḥ tad upabṛṃhaṇaiḥ

original: jagat sarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyaṃ te vasudhātalam //
analyzed: jagat sarvam śarīram te sthairyam te vasudhā talam

original: yat kiṃcit sṛjyate yena sattvajātena vai dvija /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid sṛjyate yena sattva jātena vai dvija

original: tasya sṛjyasya saṃbhūtau tatsarvaṃ vai hares tanuḥ //
analyzed: tasya sṛjyasya saṃbhūtau tat sarvam vai hareḥ tanuḥ

original: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarvabhūtāśayasthitaḥ //
analyzed: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva bhūta āśaya sthitaḥ

original: sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo
analyzed: sarvasya ca aham hṛdi saṃniviṣṭaḥ

original: mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca //
analyzed: mattaḥ smṛtiḥ jñānam apohanam ca

original: ityādivedavidagresaravālmīkiparāśaradvaipāyanavacobhiś ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvasyātmatvāvagamāc
analyzed: ityādi veda vid agresara vālmīki parāśara dvaipāyana vacobhiḥ ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvasya ātma tva avagamāt

original: cidacidātmakasya vastunas taccharīratvāvagamāc ca śarīrasya śarīriṇaṃ prati prakāratayaiva
analyzed: cit acit ātmakasya vastunaḥ tad śarīra tva avagamāt ca śarīrasya śarīriṇam prati prakāra tayā eva

original: padārthatvāc śarīraśarīriṇoś ca dharmabhede 'pi tayor asaṃkarāt sarvaśarīraṃ brahmeti
analyzed: padārtha tvāt śarīra śarīriṇoḥ ca dharma bhede pi tayoḥ asaṃkarāt sarva śarīram brahma iti

original: brahmaṇo vaibhavaṃ pratipādayadbhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyādibhir mukhyavṛttaiḥ sarvacetanācetanaprakāraṃ
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ vaibhavam pratipādayadbhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya ādibhiḥ mukhya vṛttaiḥ sarva cetana acetana prakāram

original: brahmaivābhidhīyate /
analyzed: brahma eva abhidhīyate

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hi dvayoḥ padayoḥ prakāradvayamukhenaikārthaniṣṭhatvaṃ /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam hi dvayoḥ padayoḥ prakāra dvaya mukhena ekārtha niṣṭhatvam

original: tasya caitasmin pakṣe mukhyatā /
analyzed: tasya ca etasmin pakṣe mukhya tā

original: tathā hi tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇye tad ityanena jagatkāraṇaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraṃ niravadyaṃ brahmocyate /
analyzed: tathā hi tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇye tat iti anena jagat kāraṇam sarva kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ākaram niravadyam brahma ucyate

original: tvam iti ca cetanasāmānādhikaraṇyavṛttena jīvāntaryānirūpi taccharīraṃ tadātmatayāvasthitaṃ tatprakāraṃ brahmocyate /
analyzed: tvam iti ca cetana sāmānādhikaraṇya vṛttena jīva antaryā nirūpi tat śarīram tad ātma tayā avasthitam tad prakāram brahma ucyate

original: itareṣu pakṣeṣu sāmānādhikaraṇyahānir brahmaṇaḥ sadeṣatā ca syāt / (66)
analyzed: itareṣu pakṣeṣu sāmānādhikaraṇya hāniḥ brahmaṇaḥ sat eṣatā ca syāt

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati

original: brahmaivam avasthitam ity atraivaṃśabdārthabhūtaprakāratayaiva vicitracetanācetanātmakaprapañcasya sthūlasya sūkṣmasya ca sadbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: brahma evam avasthitam iti atra evam śabda artha bhūta prakāra tayā eva vicitra cetanā acetana ātmaka prapañcasya sthūlasya sūkṣmasya ca sadbhāvaḥ

original: tathā ca bahu syāṃ prajāyeyety ayam arthaḥ saṃpanno bhavati /
analyzed: tathā ca bahu syām prajāyeya iti ayam arthaḥ saṃpannaḥ bhavati

original: tasyaiveśvarasya kāryatayā kāraṇatayā ca nānāsaṃsthānasaṃsthitasya saṃsthānatayā cidacidvastujātam avasthitam iti / (67)
analyzed: tasya eva īśvarasya kārya tayā kāraṇa tayā ca nānā saṃsthāna saṃsthitasya saṃsthāna tayā cit acit vastu jātam avasthitam iti

original: nanu ca saṃsthānarūpeṇa prakāratayaivaṃśabdārthatvam jātiguṇayor eva dṛṣṭaṃ na dravyasya /
analyzed: nanu ca saṃsthāna rūpeṇa prakāra tayā evam śabda artha tvam jāti guṇayoḥ eva dṛṣṭam na dravyasya

original: svatantrasiddhiyogyasya padārthasyaivaṃśabdārthatayeśvarasya prakāramātratvam ayuktaṃ /
analyzed: svatantra siddhi yogyasya padārthasya evam śabda artha tayā īśvarasya prakāra mātra tvam ayuktam

original: ucyate dravyasyāpi daṇḍakuṇḍalāder dravyāntaraprakāratvaṃ dṛṣṭam eva /
analyzed: ucyate dravyasya api daṇḍa kuṇḍala ādeḥ dravya antara prakāra tvam dṛṣṭam eva

original: nanu ca daṇḍādeḥ svatantrasya dravyāntaraprakāratve matvarthīyapratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca daṇḍa ādeḥ svatantrasya dravya antara prakāra tve matvarthīya pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: yathā daṇḍī kuṇḍalīti /
analyzed: yathā daṇḍī kuṇḍalī iti

original: ato gotvāditulyatayā cetanācetanasya dravyabhūtasya vastuna īśvaraprakāratayā sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ na yujyate /
analyzed: atas go tva ādi tulya tayā cetana acetanasya dravya bhūtasya vastunaḥ īśvara prakāra tayā sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanam na yujyate

original: atrocyate gaur aśvo manuṣyo deva iti bhūtasaṃghātarūpāṇāṃ dravyāṇām eva devadatto manuṣyo jātaḥ puṇyaviśeṣeṇa yajñadatto gaurjātaḥ pāpena,
analyzed: atra ucyate gauḥ aśvaḥ manuṣyaḥ devaḥ iti bhūta saṃghāta rūpāṇām dravyāṇām eva devadattaḥ manuṣyaḥ jātaḥ puṇya viśeṣeṇa yajñadattaḥ gauḥ jātaḥ pāpena

original: anyaś cetanaḥ puṇyātirekeṇa devo jāta ityādidevādiśarīrāṇāṃ cetanaprakāratayā lokadevayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ dṛṣṭam / (68)
analyzed: anyaḥ cetanaḥ puṇya atirekeṇa devaḥ jātaḥ iti ādi deva ādi śarīrāṇām cetana prakāra tayā loka devayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanam dṛṣṭam  /

original: ayam arthaḥ jātir vā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā na tatrādaraḥ /
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ jātiḥ vā guṇaḥ vā dravyam vā na tatra ādaraḥ

original: kaṃcana dravyaviśeṣaṃ prati viśeṣaṇatayaiva yasya sadbhāvas tasya tadapṛthaksiddhes tatprakāratayā tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ yuktam
analyzed: kaṃcana dravya viśeṣam prati viśeṣaṇatayā eva yasya sadbhāvaḥ tasya tad apṛthak siddheḥ tad prakāra tayā tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanam yuktam

original: yasya punar dravyasya pṛthaksiddhasyaiva kadācitkvaciddravyāntaraprakāratvam iṣyate tatra matvarthīyapratyaya iti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: yasya punar dravyasya pṛthak siddhasya eva kadācid kvacid dravya antara prakāra tvam iṣyate tatra matvarthīya pratyayaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ

original: evam eva sthāvarajaṅgamātmakasya sarvasya vastuna īśvaraśarīratvena tatprakāratayaiva svarūpasadbhāva iti /
analyzed: evam eva sthāvara jaṅgama ātmakasya sarvasya vastunaḥ īśvara śarīra tvena tad prakāra tayā eva svarūpa sadbhāvaḥ iti

original: tatprakārīśvara eva tattacchabdenābhidhīyata iti tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ yuktaṃ /
analyzed: tad prakāri īśvaraḥ eva tad tad śabdena abhidhīyate iti tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanam yuktam

original: tad evaitat sarvaṃ pūrvam eva nāmarūpavyākaraṇaśrutivivaraṇe prapañcitam / (69)
analyzed: tat eva etat sarvam pūrvam eva nāma rūpa vyākaraṇa śruti vivaraṇe prapañcitam

original: ataḥ prakṛtipuruṣamahadahaṃkāratanmātrabhūtendriyatadārabdhacaturdaśabhuvanātmakabrahmāṇḍatadantarvartidevatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarādisarvaprakārasaṃsthānasaṃsthitaṃ
analyzed: atas prakṛti puruṣa mahat ahaṃkāra tanmātra bhūta indriya tad ārabdha caturdaśa bhuvana ātmaka brahmāṇḍa tad antarvarti deva tiryak manuṣya sthāvara ādi sarva prakāra saṃsthāna saṃsthitam

original: kāryam api sarvaṃ brahmaiveti kāraṇabhūtabrahmavijñānād eva sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīty
analyzed: kāryam api sarvam brahma eva iti kāraṇa bhūta brahma vijñānāt eva sarvam vijñātam bhavati iti

original: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānam upapannataram /
analyzed: eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam upapannataram

original: tad evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādimukhena kṛtsnasya cidacidvastunaḥ parabrahmaprakāratayā tadātmakatvam uktam / (70)
analyzed: tat evam kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi mukhena kṛtsnasya cit acit vastunaḥ para brahma prakāra tayā tad ātmaka tvam uktam

original: nanu ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpeṇa pariṇāmāspadatvaṃ nirvikāratvaniravadyatvaśrutivyākopaprasañgena nivāritam /
analyzed: nanu ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ sva rūpeṇa pariṇāma āspada tvam nirvikāra tva niravadya tva śruti vyākopa prasañgena nivāritam

original: prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhād ity ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñānamṛttatkāryadṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ paramapuruṣasya jagadupādānakāraṇatvaṃ  #
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ ca pratijñā dṛṣṭānta an uparodhāt iti eka vijñānena sarva vijñāna pratijñāna mṛd tad kārya dṛṣṭāntābhyām paramapuruṣasya jagat upādānakāraṇa tvam

original: ca pratipāditam /
analyzed: ca pratipāditam

original: upādānakāraṇatvaṃ ca pariṇāmāspadatvam eva /
analyzed: upādāna kāraṇa tvam ca pariṇāma āspada tvam eva

original: katham idam upapadyate / (71)
analyzed: katham idam upapadyate

original: atrocyate sajīvasya prapañcasyāviśeṣeṇa kāraṇatvam uktam /
analyzed: atrā ucyate sa jīvasya prapañcasya aviśeṣeṇa kāraṇa tvam uktam

original: tatreśvarasya jīvarūpapariṇāmābhyupagamena nātmā śruter nityatvāc ca tābhya iti virudhyate /
analyzed: tatra īśvarasya jīva rūpa pariṇāma abhyupagamena na ātmā śruteḥ nitya tvāt ca tābhyaḥ iti virudhyate

original: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaparihāraś ca jīvanam anāditvābhyupagamena tatkarmanimittatayā pratipāditaḥ
analyzed: vaiṣamya nairghṛṇya parihāraḥ ca jīvanam anādi tva abhyupagamena tad karma nimitta tayā pratipāditaḥ

original: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvān na karmavibhāgād iti cen na anāditvād upapadyate
analyzed: vaiṣamya nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣa tvāt na karma vibhāgāt iti ced na anādi tvāt upapadyate

original: cāpy upalabhyate cetyakṛtābhyāgamakṛtavipraṇāśaprasaṅgaś cānityatve 'bhihitaḥ / (72)
analyzed: ca api upalabhyate ca iti akṛta abhyāgama kṛta vipraṇāśa prasaṅgaḥ ca anitya tve bhihitaḥ

original: tathā prakṛter apy anāditā śrutibhiḥ pratipaditā
analyzed: tathā prakṛteḥ api anādi tā śrutibhiḥ pratipaditā

original: ajām ekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahnīṃ prajāṃ janayantīṃ sarūpām /
analyzed: ajām ekām lohita śukla kṛṣṇām bahnīm prajām janayantīm sarūpām

original: ajo hy eko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahāty enāṃ bhuktabhogām ajo 'nyaḥ //
analyzed: ajaḥ hi ekaḥ juṣamāṇaḥ nuśete jahāti enām bhukta bhogām ajaḥ nyaḥ

original: iti prakṛtipuruṣayor ajatvaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: iti prakṛti puruṣayoḥ aja tvam darśayati

original: asmān māyī sṛjate viśvam etat tasmiṃś cānyo māyayā saṃniruddhaḥ māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram iti prakṛtir eva svarūpeṇa vikārāspadam  #
analyzed: asmāt māyī sṛjate viśvam etat tasmin ca anyaḥ māyayā saṃniruddhaḥ māyām tu prakṛtim vidyāt māyinam tu maheśvaram iti prakṛtiḥ eva sva rūpeṇa vikāra āspadam  /

original: iti ca darśayati /
analyzed: iti ca darśayati

original: gaur anādyantavatī sā janitrī bhūtabhāvinīti ca /
analyzed: gauḥ anādi antavatī sā janitrī bhūta bhāvinī iti ca

original: smṛtiś ca bhavati
analyzed: smṛtiḥ ca bhavati

original: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhav api /
analyzed: prakṛtim puruṣam ca eva viddhi anādī ubhau api

original: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān //
analyzed: vikārān ca guṇān ca eva viddhi prakṛti saṃbhavān

original: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
analyzed: bhūmiḥ āpaḥ nalaḥ vāyuḥ kham manaḥ buddhiḥ eva ca

original: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā //
analyzed: ahaṃkāraḥ iti iyam me bhinnā prakṛtiḥ aṣṭadhā

original: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
analyzed: aparā iyam itas tu anyām prakṛtim viddhi me parām

original: jīvabhūtāṃ mahābāho yayedaṃ dhāryate jagat //
analyzed: jīva bhūtām mahā bāho yayā idam dhāryate jagat

original: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtim svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punar punar

original: mayādhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram //
analyzed: mayā adhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram

original: ityādikā / (73)
analyzed: ityādikā

original: evaṃ ca prakṛter apīśvaraśarīratvāt prakṛtiśabdo 'pi tadātmabhūtasyeśvarasya tatprakārasaṃsthitasya vācakaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca prakṛteḥ api īśvara śarīra tvāt prakṛti śabdaḥ api tad ātma bhūtasya īśvarasya tad prakāra saṃsthitasya vācakaḥ

original: puruṣaśabdo 'pi tadātmabhūtasyeśvarasya puruṣaprakārasaṃsthitasya vācakaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣa śabdaḥ api tad ātma bhūtasya īśvarasya puruṣa prakāra saṃsthitasya vācakaḥ

original: atas tadvikārāṇām api tatheśvara evātmā / tad āha
analyzed: atas tad vikārāṇām api tathā īśvaraḥ eva ātmā tat āha

original: vyaktaṃ viṣṇus tathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca /
analyzed: vyaktam viṣṇuḥ tathā avyaktam puruṣaḥ kālaḥ eva ca

original: sā eva kṣobhako brahman kṣobhyaś ca parameśvaraḥ //
analyzed: sā eva kṣobhakaḥ brahman kṣobhyaḥ ca parameśvaraḥ

original: iti / ataḥ prakṛtiprakārasaṃsthite paramātmani prakārabhūtaprakṛtyaṃse vikāraḥ prakāryaṃse cāvikāraḥ /
analyzed: iti atas prakṛti prakāra saṃsthite paramātmani prakāra bhūta prakṛti aṃse vikāraḥ prakāri aṃse ca avikāraḥ

original: evam eva jīvaprakārasaṃsthite paramātmani ca prakārabhūtajīvāṃśe sarve cāpuruṣārthāḥ prakāryaṃśo niyantā niravadyaḥ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaraḥ satyasaṃkalpa  #
analyzed: evam eva jīva prakāra saṃsthite paramātmani ca prakāra bhūta jīva aṃśe sarve ca apuruṣa arthāḥ prakāri aṃśaḥ niyantā niravadyaḥ sarva kalyāṇa guṇa ākaraḥ satya saṃkalpa
eva

original: tathā ca sati kāraṇāvastha īśvara eveti tadupādānakajagatkāryāvastho 'pi sa eveti kāryakāraṇayor ananyatvaṃ sarvaśrutyavirodhaś ca bhavati
analyzed: tathā ca sati kāraṇa avasthaḥ īśvaraḥ eva iti tad upādānaka jagat kārya avasthā u pi saḥ eva iti kārya kāraṇayoḥ ananya tvam sarva śruti avirodhaḥ ca bhavati

original: tad evaṃ nāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmadaśāpannaprakṛtipuruṣaśarīraṃ brahma kāraṇāvasthaṃ,
analyzed: tat evam nāma rūpa vibhāga anarha sūkṣma daśā āpanna prakṛti puruṣa śarīram brahma kāraṇa avastham

original: jagatas tadāpattir eva ca pralayaḥ /
analyzed: jagataḥ tad āpattiḥ eva ca pralayaḥ

original: nāmarūpavibhāgavibhaktasthūlacidacidvastuśarīraṃ brahma kāryatvaṃ,
brahmaṇas tathāvidhasthūlabhāva eva jagataḥ sṛṣṭir ity ucyate /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ tathāvidha sthūla bhāvaḥ eva jagataḥ sṛṣṭiḥ iti ucyate

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇa
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā parāśareṇa

original: pradhānapuṃsor ajayoḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryabhūtayoḥ / iti / (75)
analyzed: pradhāna puṃsoḥ ajayoḥ kāraṇam kārya bhūtayoḥ iti

original: tasmād īśvaraprakārabhūtasarvāvasthaprakṛtipuruṣavācinaḥ śabdās tatprakāraviśiṣṭatayāvasthite paramātmani mukhyatayā vartante /
analyzed: tasmāt īśvara prakāra bhūta sarva avastha prakṛti puruṣa vācinaḥ śabdāḥ tad prakāra viśiṣṭa tayā avasthite paramātmani mukhya tayā vartante

original: jīvātmavācidevamanuṣyaśabdavat /
analyzed: jīva ātma vāci deva manuṣya śabda vat

original: yathā devamanuṣyādiśabdā devamanuṣyādiprakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣāṇāṃ jīvātmaprakāratayaiva padārthatvāt prakāriṇi jīvātmani mukhyatayā vartante /
analyzed: yathā deva manuṣya ādi śabdāḥ deva manuṣya ādi prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣāṇām jīvātma prakāra tayā eva padārtha tvāt prakāriṇi jīvātmani mukhya tayā vartante

original: tasmāt sarvasya cidacidvastunaḥ paramātmaśarīratayā tatprakāratvāt paramātmani mukhyatayā vartante sarve vācakāḥ śabdāḥ / (76)
analyzed: tasmāt sarvasya cit acit vastunaḥ paramātma śarīra tayā tad prakāra tvāt paramātmani mukhya tayā vartante sarve vācakāḥ śabdāḥ

original: ayam eva cātmaśarīrabhāvaḥ pṛthaksiddhyanarhādhārādheyabhāvo niyantṛniyāmyabhāvaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvaś ca /
analyzed: ayam eva ca ātma śarīra bhāvaḥ pṛthak siddhi anarha ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ niyantṛ niyāmya bhāvaḥ śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ ca

original: sarvātmanādhāratayā niyantṛtayā śeṣitayā ca āpnotīty ātmā sarvātmanādheyatayā niyāmyatayā śeṣatayā ca apṛthaksiddhaṃ prakārabhūtam ity ākāraḥ  #
analyzed: sarva ātmanā ādhāra tayā niyantṛ tayā śeṣi tayā ca āpnoti iti ātmā sarva ātmanā ādheya tayā niyāmya tayā śeṣa tayā ca apṛthak siddham prakāra bhūtam iti ākāraḥ

original: śarīram iti cocyate /
analyzed: śarīram iti ca ucyate

original: evam eva hi jīvātmanaḥ svaśarīrasaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: evam eva hi jīvātmanaḥ sva śarīra saṃbandhaḥ

original: evam eva paramātmanaḥ sarvaśarīratvena sarvaśabdavācyatvam / (77)
analyzed: evam eva paramātmanaḥ sarva śarīra tvena sarva śabda vācya tvam

original: tad āha śrutigaṇaḥ sarve vedā yatpadam āmananti sarve vedā yatraikaṃ bhavantīti /
analyzed: tat āha śruti gaṇaḥ sarve vedāḥ yat padam āmananti sarve vedāḥ yatra ekam bhavanti iti

original: tasyaikasya vācyatvād ekārthavācino bhavantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ekasya vācya tvāt ekārtha vācinaḥ bhavanti iti arthaḥ

original: eko devo bahudhā niviṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: ekaḥ devaḥ bahudhā niviṣṭaḥ

original: sahaiva santaṃ na vijānanti devā ityādi /
analyzed: saha eva santam na vijānanti devāḥ ityādi

original: devā indriyāṇi /
analyzed: devāḥ indriyāṇi

original: devamanuṣyādīnām antaryāmitayātmatvena niviśya sahaiva santaṃ teṣām indriyāṇi manaḥparyantāni na vijānantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: deva manuṣya ādīnām antaryāmi tayā ātma tvena niviśya saha eva santam teṣām indriyāṇi manaḥ paryantāni na vijānanti iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca paurāṇikāni vacāṃsi
analyzed: tathā ca paurāṇikāni vacāṃsi

original: natāḥ sma sarvavacasāṃ pratiṣṭhā yatra śaśvatī /
analyzed: natāḥ sma sarva vacasām pratiṣṭhā yatra śaśvatī

analyzed: kāryāṇām kāraṇām pūrvam vacasām vācyam uttamam

original: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyaḥ /
analyzed: vedaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ aham eva vedyaḥ

original: ityādīni sarvāṇi hi vacāṃsi saśarīrātmaviśiṣṭam antaryāmiṇam evācakṣate /
analyzed: ityādīni sarvāṇi hi vacāṃsi sa śarīra ātma viśiṣṭam antaryāmiṇam eva ācakṣate

original: hantāham imās tisro devatā anena jīvenātmānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti hi śrutiḥ /
analyzed: hanta aham imāḥ tisraḥ devatāḥ anena jīvena ātmā anupraviśya nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti hi śrutiḥ

original: tathā ca mānavaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca mānavam vacaḥ

analyzed: praśāsitāram sarveṣām aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām

original: rukmābhaṃ svapnadhīgamyaṃ vidyāt taṃ puruṣaṃ param //
analyzed: rukma ābham svapna dhī gamyam vidyāt tam puruṣam param

original: antaḥ praviśyāntaryāmitayā sarveṣāṃ praśāsitāraṃ niyantāram aṇīyāṃsa ātmānaḥ kṛtsnasyācetanasya
analyzed: antar praviśya antaryāmi tayā sarveṣām praśāsitāram niyantāram aṇīyāṃsaḥ ātmānaḥ kṛtsnasya acetanasya

original: vyāpakatayā sūkṣmabhūtās te teṣām api vyāpakatvāt tebhyo 'pi sūkṣmatara ityarthaḥ
analyzed: vyāpaka tayā sūkṣma bhūtāḥ te teṣām api vyāpaka tvāt tebhyaḥ pi sūkṣmataraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: rukmābhaḥ ādityavarṇaḥ svapnakalpabuddhiprāpyaḥ,
analyzed: rukma ābhaḥ āditya varṇaḥ svapna kalpa buddhi prāpyaḥ

original: viśadatamapratyakṣatāpannānudhyānaikalabhya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: viśadatama pratyakṣa tā āpanna anudhyāna eka labhyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: enam eke vadanty agniṃ māruto 'nye prajāpatim /
analyzed: enam eke vadanti agnim mārutaḥ nye prajāpatim

analyzed: indram eke pare pramāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam

original: iti / eke vedā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iti eke vedāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: uktarītyā parasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sarvasya praśāsitṛtvena sarvāntarātmatayā praviśyāvasthitatvād agnyādayaḥ śabdā api śāśvatabrahmaśabdavat tasyaiva  #
analyzed: ukta rītyā parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ sarvasya praśāsitṛ tvena sarva antarātma tayā praviśya avasthita tvāt agni ādayaḥ śabdāḥ api śāśvata brahma śabda vat tasya eva

original: vācakā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vācakāḥ bhavanti iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca smṛtyantaram
analyzed: tathā ca smṛti antaram

original: ye yajanti pitQn devān brāhmaṇān sahutāśanān /
analyzed: ye yajanti pitqn devān brāhmaṇān sa hutāśanān

original: sarvabhūtāntarātmānaṃ viṣṇum eva yajanti te //
analyzed: sarva bhūta antarātmānam viṣṇum eva yajanti te

original: iti / pitṛdevabrāhmaṇahutāśanādiśabdās tanmukhena tadantarātmabhūtasya viṣṇor eva vācakā ityuktaṃ bhavati / (78)
analyzed: iti pitṛ deva brāhmaṇa hutāśana ādi śabdāḥ tad mukhena tad antarātma bhūtasya viṣṇoḥ eva vācakāḥ iti uktam bhavati  /

original: atredaṃ sarvaśāstrahṛdayam jīvātmānaḥ svayam asaṃkucitāparicchinnanirmalajñānasvarūpāḥ santaḥ karmarūpāvidyāveṣṭitās tattatkarmānurūpajñānasaṃkocam
analyzed: atrā idam sarva śāstra hṛdayam jīvātmānaḥ svayam asaṃkucita aparicchinna nirmala jñāna svarūpāḥ santaḥ karma rūpa avidyā veṣṭitāḥ tad tad karma anurūpa jñāna saṃkocam

original: brahmādistambaparyantavividhavicitradeheṣu praviśṭās tattaddehocitalabdhajñānaprasarās
analyzed: brahma ādi stamba paryanta vividha vicitra deheṣu praviśṭāḥ tad tad deha ucita labdha jñāna prasarāḥ

original: tattaddehātmābhimāninas taducitakarmāṇi kurvāṇās tadanuguṇasukhaduḥkhopabhogarūpasaṃsārapravāhaṃ pratipadyante /
analyzed: tad tad deha ātma abhimāninaḥ tad ucita karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ tad anuguṇa sukha duḥkha upabhoga rūpa saṃsāra pravāham pratipadyante

original: eteṣāṃ saṃsāramocanaṃ bhagavatprapattim antareṇa nopapadyata iti tadarthaḥ prathamam eṣāṃ devādibhedarahitajñānaikākāratayā sarveṣāṃ sāmyaṃ
analyzed: eteṣām saṃsāra mocanam bhagavat prapattim antareṇa nā upapadyate iti tad arthaḥ prathamam eṣām deva ādi bheda rahita jñāna eka ākāra tayā sarveṣām sāmyam

original: tasyāpi svarūpasya bhagavaccheṣataikarasatayā bhagavadātmakatām api pratipādya,
analyzed: tasya api svarūpasya bhagavat śeṣa tā ekarasa tayā bhagavat ātmaka tām api pratipādya

original: bhagavatsvarūpaṃ ca heyapratyanīlakalyāṇaikatānatayā sakaletaravisajātīyam anavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇāśrayaṃ
analyzed: bhagavat svarūpam ca heya pratyanīla kalyāṇa ekatāna tayā sakala itara visajātīyam anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa āśrayam

original: svasaṃkalpapravṛttasamastacidacidvastujātatayā sarvasyātmabhūtaṃ pratipādya,
analyzed: sva saṃkalpa pravṛtta samasta cit acit vastu jātatayā sarvasya ātma bhūtam pratipādya

original: tadupāsana sāṅgaṃ tatprāpakaṃ pratipadayanti śāstrāṇīti / (79)
analyzed: tad upāsana sa aṅgam tad prāpakam pratipadayanti śāstrāṇi iti

original: yathoktam
analyzed: yathā uktam

original: nirvāṇamaya evāyam ātmā jñānamayo 'malaḥ /
analyzed: nirvāṇa mayaḥ eva ayam ātmā jñāna mayaḥ malaḥ

original: duḥkhājñānamalā dharmā prakṛtes te na cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: duḥkha ajñāna malāḥ dharmāḥ prakṛteḥ te na ca ātmanaḥ

original: iti prakṛtisaṃsargakṛtakarmamūlatvān nātmadvarūpaprayuktā dharmā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iti prakṛti saṃsarga kṛta karma mūla tvāt na ātma dva rūpa prayuktāḥ dharmāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: prāptāprāptavivekena prakṛter eva dharmā ityuktam /
analyzed: prāpta aprāpta vivekena prakṛteḥ eva dharmāḥ iti uktam

original: vidyāvinayasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini /
analyzed: vidyā vinaya saṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini

original: śuni caiva śvapāke ca pāṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: śuni ca eva śvapāke ca pāṇḍitāḥ sama darśinaḥ

original: iti / devatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvararūpaprakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasyātmanaḥ svarūpavivecanī buddhir eṣāṃ te paṇḍitāḥ /
analyzed: iti deva tiryak manuṣya sthāvara rūpa prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya ātmanaḥ svarūpa vivecanī buddhiḥ eṣām te paṇḍitāḥ

original: tattat prakṛtiviśeṣaviyuktātmayāthātmyajñānavantas tatra tatrātyantaviṣamākāre vartamānam ātmānaṃ samānākāraṃ paśyantīti samadarśina ity uktam
analyzed: tat tat prakṛti viśeṣa viyukta ātma yāthātmya jñānavantaḥ tatra tatra atyanta viṣama ākāre vartamānam ātmānam samāna ākāram paśyanti iti sama darśinaḥ iti uktam

original: tad idam āha
analyzed: tat idam āha

original: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: iha eva taiḥ jitaḥ sargaḥ yeṣām sāmye sthitam manaḥ

original: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ //
analyzed: nirdoṣam hi samam brahma tasmāt brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ

original: iti / nirdoṣaṃ devādiprakṛtiviśeṣasaṃsargarūpadoṣarahitaṃ svarūpeṇāvasthitaṃ sarvam ātmavastu nirvāṇarūpajñānaikākāratayā samam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iti nirdoṣam deva ādi prakṛti viśeṣa saṃsarga rūpa doṣa rahitam sva rūpeṇa avasthitam sarvam ātma vastu nirvāṇa rūpa jñāna eka ākāra tayā samam iti arthaḥ

original: tasyaivaṃbhūtasyātmano bhagavaccheṣataikarasatā tanniyāmyatā tadekādhāratā ca taccharīratattanuprabhṛtibhiḥ
analyzed: tasya evaṃbhūtasya ātmanaḥ bhagavat śeṣa tā ekarasa tā tad niyāmya tā tad eka ādhāra tā ca tad śarīra tad tanu prabhṛtibhiḥ

original: śabdais tatsamānādhikaraṇyena ca śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu pratipādyata iti pūrvam evoktam / (81)
analyzed: śabdaiḥ tad samāna adhikaraṇyena ca śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu pratipādyate iti pūrvam eva uktam  /

original: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā /
analyzed: daivī hi eṣā guṇa mayī mama māyā duratyayā

original: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te //
analyzed: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etām taranti te

original: iti tasyātmanaḥ karmakṛtavicitraguṇamayaprakṛtisaṃsargarūpāt saṃsārān mokṣo bhagavatprapattim antareṇa nopapadayata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: iti tasya ātmanaḥ karma kṛta vicitra guṇa maya prakṛti saṃsarga rūpāt saṃsārāt mokṣaḥ bhagavat prapattim antareṇa na upapadayate iti uktam bhavati

original: nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādiśrutibhiś ca /
analyzed: na anyaḥ panthāḥ ayanāya vidyate ityādi śrutibhiḥ ca

original: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā /
analyzed: mayā tatam idam sarvam jagat avyakta mūrtinā

original: matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣu avasthitaḥ //
analyzed: mad sthāni sarva bhūtāni na ca aham teṣu avasthitaḥ

original: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram //
analyzed: na ca mad sthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram

original: iti sarvaśaktiyogāt svāiśvaryavaicitryam uktam / tad āha
analyzed: iti sarva śakti yogāt sva aiśvarya vaicitryam uktam tat āha

original: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat /
analyzed: viṣṭabhya aham idam kṛtsnam eka aṃśena sthitaḥ jagat

original: iti anantavicitramahāścaryarūpaṃ jagan mamāyutāṃśenātmatayā praviśya sarvaṃ matsaṃkalpena
analyzed: iti ananta vicitra mahā āścarya rūpam jagat mama ayuta aṃśena ātma tayā praviśya sarvam mad saṃkalpena

original: viṣṭabhyānena rūpeṇānantamahāvibhūtiparimitodāraguṇasāgaro niratiśayāścaryabhūtaḥ
analyzed: viṣṭabhya anena rūpeṇa ananta mahā vibhūti parimita udāra guṇa sāgaraḥ niratiśaya āścarya bhūtaḥ

original: sthito 'ham ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sthitaḥ ham iti arthaḥ

original: tad idam āha
analyzed: tat idam āha

original: ekatve sati nānātvaṃ nānātve sati caikatā /
analyzed: eka tve sati nānātvam nānātve sati ca ekatā

original: acintyaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ kutas tadveditum arhati //
analyzed: acintyam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam kutas tat veditum arhati

original: iti / praśāsitṛtvenaika eva sanvicitracidacidvastuṣv antarātmatayā praviśya tattadrūpeṇa vicitraprakāro vicitrakarma kārayan nānārūpāṃ bhajate

analyzed: bhoktā bhogyam preritāram ca matvā iti bhogya rūpasya cetana tvam parama artha tvam satatam vikāra āspada tvam ityādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ

analyzed: bhoktuḥ jīvātmanaḥ ca amala aparicchinna jñāna ānanda svabhāvasya eva anādi karma rūpa avidyā kṛta nānāvidha jñāna saṃkoca vikāsau

original: yathoktaṃ vākyakāreṇa yuktaṃ tadguṇakopāsanād iti /

original: vyākhyātaṃ ca dramiḍācāryeṇa vidyāvikalpaṃ vadatā yady api saccito na nirbhugnadaivataṃ
analyzed: vyākhyātam ca dramiḍa ācāryeṇa vidyā vikalpam vadatā yadi api saccitaḥ na nirbhugna daivatam

original: guṇagaṇaṃ manasānudhāvet tathāpy antarguṇām eva devatāṃ bhajata iti tatrāpi saguṇaiva
analyzed: guṇa gaṇam manasā anudhāvet tathā api antar guṇām eva devatām bhajate iti tatra api sa guṇā eva

na nirbhugnadaivataṃ guṇagaṇaṃ manasānudhāvet apahatapāpmatvādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇaṃ daivatād vibhaktaṃ yady api daharavidyāniṣṭha iva saccito na  #

original: smaret /
analyzed: smaret

original: yaḥ punar atimātraṃ prātikūlye pravṛttas tasya krūrāṃ buddhiṃ dadan svayam eva krūreṣv eva karmasu prerayati bhagavān /

original: paramapuruṣacaraṇāravindaśaraṇāgatijanitatadabhimukhyasya

analyzed: iti nikhila jagat uddhāraṇāya avani tale vatīrṇaḥ para brahma bhūtaḥ puruṣottamaḥ svayam eva etat uktavān

original: anena cārvākaśākyāulūkyākṣapādakṣapaṇakakapilapatañjalimatānusāriṇo vedabāhyā vedāvalambikudṛṣṭibhiḥ saha nirastāḥ /
analyzed: anena cārvāka śākya āulūkya akṣapāda kṣapaṇaka kapila patañjali mata anusāriṇaḥ veda bāhyāḥ veda avalambi kudṛṣṭibhiḥ saha nirastāḥ

analyzed: veda avalambinām api yathā avasthita vastu viparyayaḥ tāḍṛśām bāhya sāmyam manunā evā uktam

analyzed: iti rajaḥ tamobhyām a spṛṣṭam uttamam sattvam eva yeṣām svābhāvikaḥ guṇaḥ teṣām eva vaidikī ruciḥ veda artha yāthātmya avabodhaḥ ca iti arthaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ mātsye
analyzed: yathā uktam mātsye

analyzed: iti kecid brahma kalpāḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ kecid sattva prāyāḥ kecid rajaḥ prāyā kecid tamaḥ prāyā

original: sattvādiguṇamayena brahmaṇā kriyata iti coktam
analyzed: sattva ādi guṇa mayena brahmaṇā kriyate iti ca uktam

original: iti / viśeṣataś coktam

original: sāttvikeṣu ca kalpeṣu māhātmyam adhikaṃ hareḥ /

analyzed: teṣu eva yoga saṃsiddhāḥ gamiṣyanti parām gatim

original: saṃkīrṇeṣu sarasvatyāḥ ....................... //
analyzed: saṃkīrṇeṣu sarasvatyāḥ

original: ityādi / etaduktaṃ bhavati ādikṣetrajñatvād brahmaṇas tasyāpi keṣucid ahassu sattvamudrikaṃ keṣucid rajaḥ keṣucit tamaḥ /
analyzed: ityādi etat uktam bhavati ādi kṣetrajña tvāt brahmaṇaḥ tasya api keṣucid ahassu sattva mudrikam keṣucid rajaḥ keṣucid tamaḥ

analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā

original: iti / yo brahmaṇaṃ vidadhati pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃś ca prahiṇoti tasmā iti śruteḥ /

analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ u pi sṛjya tvena śāstra vaśya tvena ca kṣetrajña tvam gamyate

analyzed: sattva prāyeṣu ahassu tad itareṣu yāni purāṇāni brahmaṇā proktāni teṣām paraspara virodhe

original: sati sāttvikāhaḥproktam eva purāṇaṃ yathārthaṃ tadvirodhyanyad ayathārtham iti purāṇanirṇayāyaivedaṃ
analyzed: sati sāttvika ahar proktam eva purāṇam yathārtham tad virodhi anyat ayathārtham iti purāṇa nirṇayāya eva idam

original: sattvaniṣṭhena brahmaṇābhihitam iti vijñāyata iti /
analyzed: sattva niṣṭhena brahmaṇā abhihitam iti vijñāyate iti

original: sattvādīnāṃ kāryaṃ ca bhagavataivoktam
analyzed: sattva ādīnām kāryam ca bhagavatā evā uktam

original: yathā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca /

analyzed: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: sarvān purāṇārthān brahmaṇaḥ sakāśād adhigamyaiva sarvāṇi purāṇāni purāṇakārāś cakruḥ / yathoktam

original: kathayāmi yathā pūrvaṃ dakṣādyair munisattamaiḥ /
analyzed: kathayāmi yathā pūrvam dakṣa ādyaiḥ muni sattamaiḥ

analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān abjayoniḥ pitāmahaḥ
iti

original: apauruṣeyeṣu vedavākyeṣu parasparaviruddheṣu katham iti cet /

original: tātparyaniścayād avirodhaḥ pūrvam evoktaḥ /
analyzed: tātparya niścayāt avirodhaḥ pūrvam eva uktaḥ

original: yad api ced evaṃ viruddhavad dṛśyate prāṇaṃ manasi saha kāraṇair nādānte paramātmani saṃpratiṣṭhāya dhyāyītavyaṃ pradhyāyītavyaṃ sarvam idaṃ,
analyzed: yat api ced evam viruddha vat dṛśyate prāṇam manasi saha kāraṇaiḥ na adānte paramātmani saṃpratiṣṭhāya dhyāyītavyam pradhyāyītavyam sarvam idam

original: brahmaviṣṇurudrās te sarve saṃprasūyante,

original: sarvāiśvaryasaṃpannaḥ sarveśvaraḥ śaṃbhur ākāśamadhye dhyeyaḥ yasmāt paraṃ nāparam
analyzed: sarva aiśvarya saṃpannaḥ sarva īśvaraḥ śaṃbhuḥ ākāśa madhye dhyeyaḥ yasmāt param na aparam

original: asti kiṃcid yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścit vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekas
analyzed: asti kiṃcid yasmāt na aṇīyaḥ na jyāyaḥ sti kaścid vṛkṣaḥ iva stabdhaḥ divi tiṣṭhati ekaḥ

original: tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam tato yaduttarataraṃ tadarūpam anāmayaṃ ya etadvidur amṛtās te bhavanti,

original: athetare duḥkham evāpiyanti
analyzed: atha itare duḥkham eva apiyanti

original: yadā tamas tan na divā na rātrir na san na cāsac chiva eva kevalaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tamaḥ tat na divā na rātriḥ na sat na ca asat śivaḥ eva kevalaḥ

original: tadakṣaraṃ tatsavitur vareṇyaṃ prajñā ca tasmāt prasṛtā purāṇī //
analyzed: tat akṣaram tat savituḥ vareṇyam prajñā ca tasmāt prasṛtā purāṇī

original: ityādi nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahmeti ca pūrvam eva pratipāditaṃ,
analyzed: ityādi nārāyaṇaḥ param brahma iti ca pūrvam eva pratipāditam

original: tenāsya katham avirodhaḥ / (96)
analyzed: tena asya katham avirodhaḥ

original: atyalpam etat
analyzed: ati alpam etat

original: vedavitpravaraproktavākyanyāyopabṛṃhitāḥ /
vedāḥ sāṅgā hariṃ prāhur jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ //
analyzed: vedāḥ sāṅgāḥ harim prāhuḥ jagat janma ādi kāraṇam

original: janmādyasya yataḥ yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante,
analyzed: janma ādyasya yatas yatas vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante

original: yena jātāni jīvanti,
analyzed: yena jātāni jīvanti

original: yat prayanty abhisaṃviśanti,
analyzed: yat prayanti abhisaṃviśanti

original: tad vijijñānasva tad brahmeti jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ brahmety avagamyate /
analyzed: tat vijijñānasva tat brahma iti jagat janma ādikāraṇam brahma iti avagamyate

original: tac ca jagatsṛṣṭipralayaprakaraṇeṣv avagantavyam /
analyzed: tat ca jagat sṛṣṭi pralaya prakaraṇeṣu avagantavyam

original: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam iti jagadupādānatājagannimittatājagadantaryāmitādimukhena paramakāraṇaṃ sacchabdena praitpāditaṃ  #
analyzed: sat eva somya idam agre āsīt ekam eva advitīyam iti jagat upādāna tā jagat nimitta tā jagat antaryāmi tā ādi mukhena parama kāraṇam sat śabdena prait pāditam

original: brahmety avagatam /
analyzed: brahma iti avagatam

original: ayam evārthaḥ brahma vā idam ekam evāgra āsīd iti śākhāntare brahmaśabdena pratipaditaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva arthaḥ brahma vai idam ekam eva agre āsīt iti śākhā antare brahma śabdena pratipaditaḥ

original: anena sacchabdenābhihitaṃ brahmety avagatam /
analyzed: anena sat śabdena abhihitam brahma iti avagatam

original: ayam evārthas tathā śākhāntara ātmā vā idam eka evāgra āsīn nānyat kiṃcana miṣad iti sadbrahmaśabdābhyām ātmaivābhihita ity avagamyate /
analyzed: ayam eva arthaḥ tathā śākhā antare ātmā vai idam ekaḥ eva agre āsīt na anyat kiṃcana miṣat iti sat brahma śabdābhyām ātmā eva abhihitaḥ iti avagamyate

original: tathā ca śākhāntara eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahma neśāno neme dyāvapṛthivī na nakṣatrāṇīti sadbrahmātmādiparamakāraṇavādibhiḥ śabdair  #
analyzed: tathā ca śākhā antare ekaḥ ha vai nārāyaṇaḥ āsīt na brahma na īśānaḥ na ime dyāva pṛthivī na nakṣatrāṇi iti sat brahma ātma ādi parama kāraṇa vādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ

original: nārāyaṇa evābhidhīyata iti niścīyate / (97)
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ eva abhidhīyate iti niścīyate

original: yam antaḥ samudre kavayo vayantītyādi nainam ūrdhvaṃ na tiryañcaṃ na madhye parijagrabhat /
analyzed: yam antar samudre kavayaḥ vayanti ityādi na enam ūrdhvam na tiryañcam na madhye parijagrabhat

original: na tasyeśe kaścana tasya nāma mahadyaśaḥ //
analyzed: na tasya īśe kaścana tasya nāma mahat yaśaḥ

original: na saṃdṛśe tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam,
analyzed: na saṃdṛśe tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścana enam

original: hṛdā manīṣā manasābhikḷpto ya evaṃ vidur amṛtās te bhavantīti sarvasmāt paratvam asya pratipādya,
analyzed: hṛdā manīṣā manasā abhikḷptaḥ ye evam viduḥ amṛtāḥ te bhavanti iti sarvasmāt para tvam asya pratipādya

original: na tasyeśe kaścaneti tasmāt paraṃ kim api na vidyata iti ca pratiṣidhya,
analyzed: na tasya īśe kaścana iti tasmāt param kim api na vidyate iti ca pratiṣidhya

original: adbhyaḥ sambhūto hiraṇyagarbha ityaṣṭāv iti tenaikavākyatāṃ gamayati /
analyzed: adbhyaḥ sambhūtaḥ hiraṇya garbhaḥ iti aṣṭau iti tena ekavākyatām gamayati

original: tac ca mahāpuruṣaprakaraṇaṃ hrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyāv iti ca nārāyaṇa eveti dyotayati / (98)
analyzed: tat ca mahāpuruṣa prakaraṇam hrīḥ ca te lakṣmīḥ ca patnyau iti ca nārāyaṇaḥ eva iti dyotayati  /

original: ayam artho nārāyaṇānuvāke prapañcitaḥ /
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ nārāyaṇa anuvāke prapañcitaḥ

original: sahasraśīrṣaṃ devam ityārabhya sa brahma sa śivaḥ sendraḥ so 'kṣaraḥ paramaḥ svarāḍ iti /
analyzed: sahasra śīrṣam devam iti ārabhya sa brahma sa śivaḥ sa indraḥ saḥ u kṣaraḥ paramaḥ svarāj iti

original: sarvaśākhāsu paratattvapratipādanaparān akṣaraśivaśaṃbhuparabrahmaparajyotiḥparatattvaparāyaṇaparamātmādisarvaśabdāṃs
analyzed: sarva śākhāsu para tattva pratipādana parān akṣara śiva śaṃbhu para brahma para jyotiḥ para tattva parāyaṇa paramātma ādi sarva śabdān

original: tattadguṇayogena nārāyaṇa eva prayujya tadvyatiriktasya samastasya tadādhāratāṃ tanniyāmyatāṃ
analyzed: tad tad guṇa yogena nārāyaṇe eva prayujya tad vyatiriktasya samastasya tad ādhāra tām tad niyāmya tām

original: taccheṣatām tadātmakatāṃ ca pratipādya brahmaśivayor apīndrādisamānākāratayā tadvibhūtitvaṃ ca pratipāditam /
analyzed: tad śeṣa tām tad ātmaka tām ca pratipādya brahma śivayoḥ api indra ādi samāna ākāra tayā tad vibhūti tvam ca pratipāditam

original: idaṃ ca vākyaṃ kevalaparatattvapratipādanaikaparam anyat kiṃcid apy atra na vidhīyate / (99)
analyzed: idam ca vākyam kevala para tattva pratipādana eka param anyat kiṃcid api atra na vidhīyate

original: asmin vākye pratipāditasya sarvasmāt paratvenāvasthitasya brahmaṇo vākyāntareṣu brahmavid āpnoti param ityādiṣūpāsanādi vidhīyate /
analyzed: asmin vākye pratipāditasya sarvasmāt para tvena avasthitasya brahmaṇaḥ vākya antareṣu brahma vid āpnoti param ityādiṣu upāsana ādi vidhīyate

original: ataḥ prāṇaṃ manasi saha karaṇair ityādi vākyaṃ sarvakāraṇe paramātmani karaṇaprāṇādi
analyzed: atas prāṇam manasi saha karaṇaiḥ ityādi vākyam sarva kāraṇe paramātmani karaṇa prāṇa ādi

original: sarvaṃ vikārajātam upasaṃhṛtya tam eva paramātmānaṃ sarvasyeśānaṃ dhyāyīteti parabrahmabhūtanārāyaṇasyaiva dhyānaṃ vidadhāti / (100)
analyzed: sarvam vikāra jātam upasaṃhṛtya tam eva paramātmānam sarvasya īśānam dhyāyīta iti para brahma bhūta nārāyaṇasya eva dhyānam vidadhāti

original: patiṃ viśvasyeti na tasyeśe kaścaneti ca tasyaiva sarvasyeśānatā pratipāditā /
analyzed: patim viśvasya iti na tasya īśe kaścana iti ca tasya eva sarvasya īśāna tā pratipāditā

original: ata eva sarvāiśvaryasaṃpannaḥ sarveśvaraḥ śaṃbhurākāśamadhye dhyeya iti nārāyaṇasyaiva paramakāraṇasya śaṃbhuśabdavācyasya dhyānaṃ vidhīyate
analyzed: atas eva sarva aiśvarya saṃpannaḥ sarva īśvaraḥ śaṃbhuḥ ākāśa madhye dhyeyaḥ iti nārāyaṇasya eva parama kāraṇasya śaṃbhu śabda vācyasya dhyānam vidhīyate

original: kaś ca dhyeya ityārabhya kāraṇaṃ tu dhyeya iti kāryasyādhyeyatāpūrvakakāraṇaikadhyeyatāparatvād vākyasya /
analyzed: kaḥ ca dhyeyaḥ iti ārabhya kāraṇam tu dhyeyaḥ iti kāryasya adhyeya tā pūrvaka kāraṇa eka dhyeya tā paratvāt vākyasya

original: tasyaiva nārāyaṇasya paramakāraṇatā śaṃbhuśabdavācyatā ca paramakāraṇapratipādanaikapare
analyzed: tasya eva nārāyaṇasya parama kāraṇa tā śaṃbhu śabda vācya tā ca parama kāraṇa pratipādanā eka pare

original: nārāyaṇānuvāka eva pratipanneti tadvirodhyarthāntaraparikalpanaṃ kāraṇasyaiva dhyeyatvena
analyzed: nārāyaṇa anuvāke eva pratipannā iti tad virodhi artha antara parikalpanam kāraṇasya eva dhyeya tvena

original: vidhivākye na yujyate / (101)
analyzed: vidhi vākye na yujyate

original: yad api tato yaduttaram ity atra puruṣād anyasya parataratvaṃ pratīyata ityabhyadhāyi
analyzed: yat api tatas yat uttaram iti atra puruṣāt anyasya paratara tvam pratīyate iti abhyadhāyi

original: tad api yasmāt paraṃ nāparam asti kiṃcid yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścit yasmād
analyzed: tat api yasmāt param na aparam asti kiṃcid yasmāt na aṇīyaḥ na jyāyaḥ sti kaścid yasmāt

original: aparaṃ yasmād anyat kiṃcid api paraṃ nāsti kenāpi prakāreṇa puruṣavyatiriktasya paratvaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: aparam yasmāt anyat kiṃcid api param na asti kena api prakāreṇa puruṣa vyatiriktasya paratvam na asti iti arthaḥ

original: aṇīyastvaṃ sūkṣmatvam /
analyzed: aṇīyaḥ tvam sūkṣma tvam

original: jyāyastvaṃ sarveśvaratvam /
analyzed: jyāyaḥ tvam sarva īśvara tvam

original: sarvavyāpitvāt sarveśvaratvād asyaitadvyatirikitasya kasyāpy aṇīyastvaṃ jyāyastvaṃ ca nāstītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarvavyāpi tvāt sarva īśvara tvāt asya etad vyatirikitasya kasya api aṇīyaḥ tvam jyāyaḥ tvam ca na asti iti arthaḥ

original: yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścid iti puruṣād anyasya kasyāpi jyāyastvaṃ niṣiddham iti tasmād anyasya paratvaṃ na yujyata iti pratyuktam /
analyzed: yasmāt na aṇīyaḥ na jyāyaḥ sti kaścid iti puruṣāt anyasya kasya api jyāyaḥ tvam niṣiddham iti tasmāt anyasya paratvam na yujyate iti pratyuktam

original: kas tarhy asya vākyasyārthaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tarhi asya vākyasya arthaḥ

original: asya prakaraṇasyopakrame tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāyāiti
analyzed: asya prakaraṇasya upakrame tam eva viditvā atimṛtyum eti na anyaḥ panthāḥ vidyate

original: puruṣavedanasyāmṛtatvahetutāṃ tadvyatiriktasyāpathatāṃ ca pratijñāya yasmāt paraṃ
analyzed: puruṣa vedanasya amṛta tva hetutām tad vyatiriktasya apathatām ca pratijñāya yasmāt param

original: nāparam asti kiṃcit tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam ity etad antena sarvasmāt paratvaṃ pratipāditam /
analyzed: na aparam asti kiṃcid tena idam pūrṇam puruṣeṇa sarvam iti etat antena sarvasmāt para tvam pratipāditam

original: yataḥ puruṣatattvam evottarataraṃ tato yaduttarataraṃ puruṣatattvaṃ tad evārūpam anāmayaṃ ya etadvidur amṛtās te bhavanti,
analyzed: yatas puruṣa tattvam eva uttarataram tatas yat uttarataram puruṣa tattvam tat eva arūpam anāmayam ye etat viduḥ amṛtāḥ te bhavanti

original: athetare duḥkham evāpiyantīti puruṣavedanasyāmṛtatvahetutvaṃ taditarasyāpathatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ sahetukam upasaṃhṛtam /
analyzed: atha itare duḥkham eva apiyanti iti puruṣa vedanasya amṛta tva hetu tvam tad itarasya apatha tvam pratijñātam sa hetukam upasaṃhṛtam

original: anyathopakramagatapratijñābhyāṃ virudhyate /
analyzed: anyathā upakrama gata pratijñābhyām virudhyate

original: puruṣasyaiva śuddhiguṇayogena śivaśabdābhiprāyatvaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam acyutam ityādinā jñātam eva /
analyzed: puruṣasya eva śuddhi guṇa yogena śiva śabda abhiprāya tvam śāśvatam śivam acyutam ityādinā jñātam eva

original: puruṣa eva śivaśabdābhidheya ityanantaram eva vadati mahān prabhur vai puruṣaḥ sattvasyaiṣa pravartaka iti /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ eva śiva śabda abhidheyaḥ iti anantaram eva vadati mahān prabhuḥ vai puruṣaḥ sattvasya eṣa pravartakaḥ iti

original: uktenaiva nyāyena na san na cāsac chiva eva kevala ityādi sarvaṃ neyam / (103)
analyzed: uktena eva nyāyena na sat na ca asat śivaḥ eva kevalaḥ ityādi sarvam na iyam

original: kiṃca na tasyeśe kaścaneti nirastasamābhyadhikasaṃbhāvanasya puruṣasyāṇor aṇīyānityasminn
analyzed: kiṃca na tasya īśe kaścana iti nirasta sama abhyadhika saṃbhāvanasya puruṣasya aṇoḥ aṇīyān iti asmin

original: anuvāke vedādyantarūpatayā vedabījabhūtapraṇavasya prakṛtibhūtākāravācyatayā maheśvaratvaṃ
analyzed: anuvāke veda ādi anta rūpa tayā veda bīja bhūta praṇavasya prakṛti bhūta ākāra vācya tayā maheśvara tvam

original: pratipādya daharapuṇḍarīkamadhyasthākāśāntarvartitayopāsyatvam uktam /
analyzed: pratipādya dahara puṇḍarīka madhya stha ākāśa antar varti tayā upāsya tvam uktam

original: ayam arthaḥ sarvasya vedajātasya prakṛtiḥ praṇava uktaḥ /
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ sarvasya veda jātasya prakṛtiḥ praṇavaḥ uktaḥ

original: praṇavasya ca prakṛtir akāraḥ /
analyzed: praṇavasya ca prakṛtiḥ akāraḥ

original: praṇavavikāro vedaḥ svaprakṛtibhūte praṇave līnaḥ /
praṇavo 'py akāravikārabhūtaḥ svaprakṛtāv akāre līnaḥ /
analyzed: praṇavaḥ api akāra vikāra bhūtaḥ sva prakṛtau akāre līnaḥ

original: tasya praṇavaprakṛtibhūtasyākārasya yaḥ paro vācyaḥ sa eva maheśvara iti sarvavācakajātaprakṛtibhūtākāravācyaḥ sarvavācyajātaprakṛtibhūtanārāyaṇo  #
analyzed: tasya praṇava prakṛti bhūtasya ākārasya yaḥ paraḥ vācyaḥ saḥ eva maheśvaraḥ iti sarva vācaka jāta prakṛti bhūta ākāra vācyaḥ sarva vācya jāta prakṛti bhūta nārāyaṇaḥ

original: yaḥ sa maheśavara ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sa maheśa varaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā

original: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā /
analyzed: aham kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ tathā

original: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyatkiṃcid asti dhanaṃjaya //
analyzed: mattaḥ parataram na anyat kiṃcid asti dhanaṃjaya

original: akṣaraṇām akāro 'smi //
analyzed: akṣaraṇām akāraḥ smi

original: iti / a iti brahmeti ca śruteḥ /
analyzed: iti a iti brahma iti ca śruteḥ

original: akāro vai sarvā vāg iti ca /
analyzed: akāraḥ vai sarvā vāc iti ca

original: vācakajātasyākāraprakṛtitvaṃ vācyajātasya brahmaprakṛtitvaṃ ca suspaṣṭam /
analyzed: vācaka jātasya ākāra prakṛti tvam vācya jātasya brahma prakṛti tvam ca su spaṣṭam

original: ato brahmaṇo 'kāravācyatāpratipādanād akāravācyo nārāyaṇa eva maheśvara iti siddham / (104)
analyzed: atas kāra vācya tā pratipādanāt akāra vācyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ eva maheśvaraḥ iti siddham  /

original: tasyaiva sahasraśīrṣaṃ devam iti kevalaparatattvaviśeṣapratipādanapareṇa nārāyaṇānuvākena sarvasmāt paratvaṃ prapañcitam /
analyzed: tasya eva sahasra śīrṣam devam iti kevala para tattva viśeṣa pratipādana pareṇa nārāyaṇa anuvākena sarvasmāt paratvam prapañcitam

original: anenānanyapareṇa pratipāditam eva paratattvam anyapareṣu sarvavākyeṣu kenāpi śabdena
analyzed: anena ananya pareṇa pratipāditam eva para tattvam anya pareṣu sarva vākyeṣu kena api śabdena

original: pratīyamānaṃ tad evety avagamya iti śāstradṛṣtyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavad iti sūtrakāreṇa nirṇītam /
analyzed: pratīyamānam tat eva iti avagamyaḥ iti śāstra dṛṣtyā tu upadeśaḥ vāmadeva vat iti sūtrakāreṇa nirṇītam

original: tad etat paraṃ brahma kvacid brahmaśivādiśabdād avagatam iti kevalabrahmaśivayor na paratvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tat etat param brahma kvacid brahma śiva ādi śabdāt avagatam iti kevala brahma śivayoḥ na para tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: asminn ananyapare 'nuvāke tayor indrāditulyatayā tadvibhūtitvapratipādanāt /
analyzed: asmin an anya pare nuvāke tayoḥ indra ādi tulya tayā tad vibhūti tva pratipādanāt

original: kvacid ākāśaprāṇādiśabdena paraṃ brahmābhihitam iti bhūtākāśaprāṇāder yathā na paratvam /
analyzed: kvacid ākāśa prāṇa ādi śabdena param brahma abhihitam iti bhūtākāśa prāṇa ādeḥ yathā na paratvam

original: yat punar idam āśaṅkitam atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma
analyzed: yat punar idam āśaṅkitam atha yat idam asmin brahmapure daharam puṇḍarīkam veśma

original: daharo 'sminn antarākāśas tasmin yad antas tad anveṣṭavyaṃ tad vā va vijijñāsitavyam
analyzed: daharaḥ smin antarākāśaḥ tasmin yat antar tat anveṣṭavyam tat vā vaḥ vijijñāsitavyam

original: ity atrākāśaśabdena jagadupādānakāraṇaṃ pratipādya tadantarvartinaḥ kasyacit tattvaviśeṣasyānveṣṭavyatā pratipādyate /
analyzed: iti atra ākāśa śabdena jagat upādānakāraṇam pratipādya tad antarvartinaḥ kasyacid tattva viśeṣasya anveṣṭavya tā pratipādyate

original: asyākāśasya nāmarūpayor nivoḍhṛtvaśravaṇāt puruṣasūkte puruṣasya nāmarūpayoḥ kartṛtvadarśanāc
analyzed: asya ākāśasya nāma rūpayoḥ nivoḍhṛ tva śravaṇāt puruṣasūkte puruṣasya nāma rūpayoḥ kartṛ tva darśanāt

original: cākāśaparyāyabhūtāt puruṣād anyasyānveṣṭavyatayopāsyatvaṃ pratīyata ityanadhītavedānām
analyzed: ca ākāśa paryāya bhūtāt puruṣāt anyasya anveṣṭavya tayā upāsya tvam pratīyate iti anadhīta vedānām

original: adṛṣṭaśāstrāṇām idaṃ codyaṃ / (105)
analyzed: adṛṣṭa śāstrāṇām idam codyam

original: yatas tatra śrutir evāsya parihāram āha /
analyzed: yatas tatra śrutiḥ eva asya parihāram āha

original: vākyakāraś ca daharo 'sminn antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad
analyzed: vākya kāraḥ ca daharaḥ smin antarākāśaḥ kim tat atra vidyate yat anveṣṭavyam yat

original: vā va vijijñāsitavyam iti codite yāvān vā ayam ākāśas tāvān eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa
analyzed: vā vaḥ vijijñāsitavyam iti ca udite yāvān vai ayam ākāśaḥ tāvān eṣaḥ ntar hṛdaye ākāśa

original: ityādināsyākāśaśabdavācyasya paramapuruṣasyānavadhikamahattvaṃ sakalajagadādhāratvaṃ
analyzed: ityādinā asya ākāśa śabda vācyasya paramapuruṣasya anavadhika mahā tvam sakala jagat ādhāra tvam

original: ca pratipādya tasmin kāmāḥ samāhitā iti kāmaśabdenāpahatapāpmatvādisatyasaṃkalpaparyantaguṇāṣṭakaṃ
analyzed: ca pratipādya tasmin kāmāḥ samāhitāḥ iti kāma śabdena apahata pāpma tva ādi satya saṃkalpa paryanta guṇa aṣṭakam

original: nihitam iti paramapuruṣavat paramapuruṣaguṇāṣṭakasyāpi pṛthivijijñāsitavyatāpratipādayiṣayā
analyzed: nihitam iti parama puruṣa vat parama puruṣa guṇa aṣṭakasya api pṛthivī jijñāsitavya tā pratipādayiṣayā

original: tasmin yad antas tadanveṣṭavyam ityuktam iti śrutyaiva sarvaṃ parihṛtam / (106)
analyzed: tasmin yat antar tat anveṣṭavyam iti uktam iti śrutyā eva sarvam parihṛtam

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad aneṣṭavyam ity asya codyasya tasmin sarvasya
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati kim tat atra vidyate yat an iṣṭavyam iti asya codyasya tasmin sarvasya

original: jagataḥ sraṣṭṛtvam ādhāratvaṃ niyantṛtvaṃ śeṣitvam apahatapāpmatvādayo guṇāś ca vidyanta iti parihāra iti /
analyzed: jagataḥ sraṣṭṛ tvam ādhāra tvam niyantṛ tvam śeṣi tvam apahata pāpma tva ādayaḥ guṇāḥ ca vidyante iti parihāraḥ iti

original: tathā ca vākyakāravacanam tasmin yad antar iti kāmavyapadeśa iti /
analyzed: tathā ca vākyakāra vacanam tasmin yat antar iti kāma vyapadeśaḥ iti

original: kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ /
analyzed: kāmyante iti kāmāḥ

original: apahatapāpmatvādayo guṇā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: apahata pāpma tva ādayaḥ guṇāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati yad etad daharākāśaśabdābhidheyaṃ nikhilajagadudayavaibhavalayalīlaṃ
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yat etat daharākāśa śabda abhidheyam nikhila jagat udaya vaibhava laya līlam

original: paraṃ brahma tasmin yad antar nihitam anavadhikātiśayam apahatapāpmatvādiguṇāṣṭakaṃ
analyzed: param brahma tasmin yat antar nihitam anavadhika atiśayam apahata pāpma tva ādi guṇa aṣṭakam

original: tad ubhayam apy anveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyam iti /
analyzed: tat ubhayam api anveṣṭavyam vijijñāsitavyam iti

original: yathāha atha ya ihātmānam anuvidya vrajanty etāṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavantīti / (107)
analyzed: yathā āha atha ye iha ātmānam anuvidya vrajanti etān ca satyān kāmān teṣām sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāraḥ bhavanti iti

original: yaḥ punaḥ kāraṇasyaiva dhyeyatāpratipādanapare vākye viṣṇor ananyaparavākyapratipāditaparatattvabhūtasya
analyzed: yaḥ punar kāraṇasya eva dhyeya tā pratipādana pare vākye viṣṇoḥ ananya para vākya pratipādita para tattva bhūtasya

original: kāryamadhye niveśaḥ sa svakāryabhūtatattvasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ kurvataḥ svalīlayā jagadupakārāya
analyzed: kārya madhye niveśaḥ sa sva kārya bhūta tattva saṃkhyā pūraṇam kurvataḥ sva līlayā jagat upakārāya

original: svecchāvatāra ity avagantavyaḥ /
analyzed: svecchā avatāraḥ iti avagantavyaḥ

original: yathā līlayā devasaṃkhyāpūrṇaṃ kurvata upendratvaṃ parasyaiva,
analyzed: yathā līlayā deva saṃkhyā pūrṇam kurvataḥ upendra tvam parasya eva

original: yathā ca sūryavaṃśodbhavarājasaṃkhyāpūrṇaṃ kurvataḥ parasyaiva brahmaṇo dāśarathirūpeṇa svecchāvatāraḥ,
analyzed: yathā ca sūrya vaṃśa udbhava rāja saṃkhyā pūrṇam kurvataḥ parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ dāśarathi rūpeṇa sva icchā avatāraḥ

original: yathā ca somavaṃśasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ kurvato bhagavato bhūbhārāvatāraṇāya svecchayā vasudevagṛhe 'vatāraḥ / (108)
analyzed: yathā ca soma vaṃśa saṃkhyā pūraṇam kurvataḥ bhagavataḥ bhū bhāra avatāraṇāya sva icchayā vasudeva gṛhe vatāraḥ

original: sṛṣṭipralayaprakaraṇeṣu nārāyaṇa eva paramakāraṇatayā pratipādyata iti pūrvam evoktam /
analyzed: sṛṣṭi pralaya prakaraṇeṣu nārāyaṇaḥ eva parama kāraṇatayā pratipādyate iti pūrvam eva uktam

original: yat punar atharvaśirasi rudreṇa svasarvāiśvaryaṃ prapañcitaṃ tat so 'ntarād antaraṃ prāviśad iti paramātmapraveśād uktam iti śrutyaiva vyaktam
analyzed: yat punar atharvaśirasi rudreṇa sva sarva aiśvaryam prapañcitam tat saḥ ntarāt antaram prāviśat iti paramātma praveśāt uktam iti śrutyā eva vyaktam

original: śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavad iti sūtrakāreṇaivaṃvādinām arthaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
analyzed: śāstra dṛṣṭyā tu upadeśaḥ vāmadeva vat iti sūtrakāreṇa evaṃvādinām arthaḥ pratipāditaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ prahlādenāpi
analyzed: yathā uktam prahlādena api

original: sarvagatvād anantarasya sa evāham avasthitaḥ /
analyzed: sarva ga tvāt anantarasya saḥ eva aham avasthitaḥ

original: mattaḥ sarvam ahaṃ sarvaṃ mayi sarvaṃ sanātane //
analyzed: mattaḥ sarvam aham sarvam mayi sarvam sanātane

original: ityādi / atra sarvagatvād anantasyeti hetur uktaḥ /
analyzed: ityādi atra sarvaga tvāt anantasya iti hetuḥ uktaḥ

original: svaśarīrabhūtasya sarvasya cidacidvastuna ātmatvena sarvagaḥ paramātmeti sarve śabdāḥ sarvaśarīraṃ paramātmānam evābhidadhatīty uktam /
analyzed: sva śarīra bhūtasya sarvasya cit acit vastunaḥ ātma tvena sarvagaḥ paramātmā iti sarve śabdāḥ sarva śarīram paramātmānam eva abhidadhati iti uktam

original: ato 'ham iti śabdaḥ svātmaprakāraprakāriṇaṃ paramātmānam evācaṣṭe /
analyzed: atas ham iti śabdaḥ sva ātma prakāra prakāriṇam paramātmānam eva ācaṣṭe

original: ata idam ucyate /
analyzed: atas idam ucyate

original: ātmety eva tu gṛhṇīyāt sarvasya tanniṣpatter ityādināhaṃgrahaṇopāsanaṃ vākyakāreṇa
analyzed: ātmā iti eva tu gṛhṇīyāt sarvasya tad niṣpatteḥ ityādinā ahaṃgrahaṇa upāsanam vākya kāreṇa

original: kāryāvasthaḥ kāraṇāvasthaś ca sthūlasūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīraḥ paramātmaiveti sarvasya
analyzed: kārya avasthaḥ kāraṇa avasthaḥ ca sthūla sūkṣma cit acit vastu śarīraḥ paramātmā eva iti sarvasya

original: tanniṣpatter ity uktam /
analyzed: tad niṣpatteḥ iti uktam

original: ātmeti tūpagacchanti grāhayanti ceti sūtrakāreṇa ca /
analyzed: ātmā iti tu upagacchanti grāhayanti ca iti sūtrakāreṇa ca

original: mahābhārate ca brahmarudrasaṃvāde brahmā rudraṃ prayāha
analyzed: mahābhārate ca brahma rudra saṃvāde brahmā rudram prayāha

original: tavāntarātmā mama ca ye cānye dehisaṃjñitāḥ /
analyzed: tava antarātmā mama ca ye ca anye dehi saṃjñitāḥ

original: iti / rudrasya brahmaṇaś cānyeṣāṃ ca dehināṃ parameśvaro nārāyaṇo 'ntarātmatayāvasthita iti /
analyzed: iti rudrasya brahmaṇaḥ ca anyeṣām ca dehinām parameśvaraḥ nārāyaṇaḥ ntarātma tayā avasthitaḥ iti

original: tathā tatraiva
analyzed: tathā tatra eva

original: viṣṇur ātmā bhagavato bhavasyāmitatejasaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ ātmā bhagavataḥ bhavasya amita tejasaḥ

original: tasmād dhanurjyāsaṃsparśaṃ sa viṣehe maheśvaraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt dhanuḥ jyā saṃsparśam sa viṣehe maheśvaraḥ

original: iti / tatraiva
analyzed: iti tatra eva

original: etau dvau vibudhaśreṣṭhau prasādakrodhajau smṛtau /
analyzed: etau dvau vibudha śreṣṭhau prasāda krodha jau smṛtau

original: tadādarśitapanthānau sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārakau //
analyzed: tad ādarśita panthānau sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kārakau

original: iti / antarātmatayāvasthitanārāyaṇadarśitapathau brahmarudrau sṛṣṭisaṃhārakāryakarāv ityarthaḥ / (109)
analyzed: iti antarātma tayā avasthita nārāyaṇa darśita pathau brahma rudrau sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kārya karau iti arthaḥ

original: nimittopādānayos tu bhedaṃ vadanto vedabāhyā eva syuḥ /
analyzed: nimitta upādānayoḥ tu bhedam vadantaḥ veda bāhyāḥ eva syuḥ

original: janmādyasya yataḥ prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhād ityādi vedavitpraṇītasūtravirodhāt /
analyzed: janma ādyasya yatas prakṛtiḥ ca pratijñā dṛṣṭānta an uparodhāt ityādi veda vid praṇīta sūtra virodhāt

original: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti brahmavanaṃ
analyzed: sat eva somya idam agre āsīt ekam eva advitīyam tat aikṣata bahu syām prajāyeya iti brahma vanam

original: brahma sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ brahmādhyatiṣṭhadbhuvanāni dhārayan
analyzed: brahma sa vṛkṣaḥ āsīt yatas dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ brahma adhyatiṣṭhat bhuvanāni dhārayan

original: sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣādadhi na tasyeśe kaścana tasya nāma mahadyaśaḥ
analyzed: sarve nimeṣāḥ jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣāt adhi na tasya īśe kaścana tasya nāma mahat yaśaḥ

original: neha nānāsti kiṃcana sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ
analyzed: na iha nānā asti kiṃcana sarvasya vaśī sarvasya īśānaḥ puruṣaḥ eva idam sarvam yat bhūtam

original: yac ca bhavyam utāmṛtattvasyeśānaḥ nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādisarvaśrutivirodhāc ca / (110)
analyzed: yat ca bhavyam uta amṛta tvasya īśānaḥ na anyaḥ panthāḥ ayanāya vidyate ityādi sarva śruti virodhāt ca

original: itihāsapurāṇeṣu ca sṛṣṭisthitipralayaprakaraṇayor idam eva paratattvam ity avagamyate /
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇeṣu ca sṛṣṭi sthiti pralaya prakaraṇayoḥ idam eva para tattvam iti avagamyate

original: yathā mahābhārate
analyzed: yathā mahābhārate

original: kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam /
analyzed: kutas sṛṣṭam idam sarvam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam

original: pralaye ca kam abhyeti tan to brūhi pitāmaha //
analyzed: pralaye ca kam abhyeti tat te brūhi pitāmaha

original: iti pṛṣṭo
analyzed: iti pṛṣṭaḥ

original: nārāyaṇo jaganmūrtir anantātmā sanātana /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ jagat mūrtiḥ ananta ātmā sanātana

original: ityādi ca vadati
analyzed: ityādi ca vadati

original: ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā mahābhūtāni dhātavaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ pitaraḥ devāḥ mahābhūtāni dhātavaḥ

original: jaṅgamājaṅgamaṃ cedaṃ jagannārāyaṇodbhavam //
analyzed: jaṅgama ajaṅgamam ca idam jagat nārāyaṇa udbhavam

original: iti ca / prācyodīcyadākṣiṇātyapāścātyasarvaśiṣṭaiḥ sarvadharmasarvatattvavyavasthāyām
analyzed: iti ca prācya udīcya dākṣiṇātya pāścātya sarva śiṣṭaiḥ sarva dharma sarva tattva vyavasthāyām

original: idam eva paryāptam ity avigānaparigṛhītaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca purāṇaṃ janmādy asya yata
analyzed: idam eva paryāptam iti avigāna parigṛhītam vaiṣṇavam ca purāṇam janma ādi asya yata

original: iti jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ brahmety avagamyate /
analyzed: iti jagat janma ādikāraṇam brahma iti avagamyate

original: tajjanmādikāraṇaṃ kim iti praśnapūrvakaṃ viṣṇoḥ sakāśād bhūtam ityādinā brahmasvarūpaviśeṣapratipādanaikaparatayā pravṛttam iti sarvasaṃmatam
analyzed: tat janma ādikāraṇam kim iti praśna pūrvakam viṣṇoḥ sakāśāt bhūtam ityādinā brahma svarūpa viśeṣa pratipādana eka para tayā pravṛttam iti sarva saṃmatam

original: tathā tatraiva
analyzed: tathā tatra eva

original: prakṛtir yā khyātā vyaktāvyaktasvarūpiṇī /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ yā khyātā vyakta avyakta svarūpiṇī

original: puruṣaś ca+py ubhāv etau līyete paramātmani //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ ca api ubhau etau līyete paramātmani

original: paramātmā ca sarveṣām ādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ /
analyzed: paramātmā ca sarveṣām ādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: viṣṇunāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate //
analyzed: viṣṇu nāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate

original: iti / sarvavedavedānteṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ paramakāraṇatayāyam eva gīyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iti sarva veda vedānteṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ parama kāraṇatayā ayam eva gīyate iti arthaḥ

original: yathā sarvāsu ṣrutiṣu kevalaparabrahmasvarūpaviśeṣapratipādanāyaiva pravṛtto nārāyaṇānuvākas tathedaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca purāṇam
analyzed: yathā sarvāsu ṣrutiṣu kevala para brahma sva rūpa viśeṣa pratipādanāya eva pravṛttaḥ nārāyaṇa anuvākaḥ tathā idam vaiṣṇavam ca purāṇam

original: so 'ham icchāmi dharmajña śrotuṃ tvatto yathā jagat /
analyzed: saḥ ham icchāmi dharma jña śrotum tvattaḥ yathā jagat

original: babhūva bhūyaś ca yathā mahābhāga bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: babhūva bhūyas ca yathā mahābhāga bhaviṣyati

original: yanmayaṃ ca jagadbrahmany ataś caitaccarācaram /
analyzed: yad mayam ca jagat brahmani atas ca etat carācaram

original: līnam āsīd yathā yatra layam eṣyati yatra ca //
analyzed: līnam āsīt yathā yatra layam eṣyati yatra ca

original: iti paraṃ brahma kim iti prakramya
analyzed: iti param brahma kim iti prakramya

original: viṣṇoḥ sakāśād udbhūtaṃ jagat tatraiva ca sthitam /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ sakāśāt udbhūtam jagat tatra eva ca sthitam

original: sthitisaṃyamakartāsau jagato 'sya jagac ca saḥ //
analyzed: sthiti saṃyama kartā asau jagataḥ sya jagat ca saḥ

original: paraḥ parāṇāṃ paramaḥ paramātmātmasaṃsthitaḥ /
analyzed: paraḥ parāṇām paramaḥ parama ātma ātma saṃsthitaḥ

original: rūpavarṇādinirdeśaviśeṣaṇavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: rūpa varṇa ādi nirdeśa viśeṣaṇa vivarjitaḥ

original: apakṣayavināśābhyāṃ pariṇāmarddhijanmabhiḥ /
analyzed: apakṣaya vināśābhyām pariṇāma ṛddhi janmabhiḥ

original: varjitaḥ śakyate vaktuṃ yaḥ sad astīti kevalam //
analyzed: varjitaḥ śakyate vaktum yaḥ sat asti iti kevalam

original: sarvatrāsau samastaṃ ca vasaty atreti vai yataḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra asau samastam ca vasati atrā iti vai yatas

original: tataḥ sa vāsudeveti vidvadbhiḥ paripaṭhyate //
analyzed: tatas sa vāsudeva iti vidvadbhiḥ paripaṭhyate

original: tadbrahma paraṃ nityam ajam akṣayam avyayam /
analyzed: tat brahma param nityam ajam akṣayam avyayam

original: ekasvarūpaṃ ca sadā heyābhāvāc ca nirmalam //
analyzed: eka svarūpam ca sadā heya abhāvāt ca nirmalam

original: tad eva sarvam evaitadvyaktāvyaktasvarūpavat /
analyzed: tat eva sarvam eva etat vyakta avyakta sva rūpavat

original: tathā puruṣarūpeṇa kālarūpeṇa ca sthitam //
