original: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikārān guṇādidoṣāṃś ca mune vyatītaḥ /
analyzed: sa sarva bhūta prakṛtim vikārān guṇa ādi doṣān ca mune vyatītaḥ

original: atītasarvāvaraṇo 'khilātmā tenāstṛtaṃ yad bhuvanāntarāle //
analyzed: atīta sarva āvaraṇaḥ khila ātmā tena āstṛtam yat bhuvana antarāle

original: samastakalyāṇaguṇātmako 'sau svaśaktileśoddhṛtabhūtavargaḥ /
analyzed: samasta kalyāṇa guṇa ātmakaḥ sau sva śakti leśa uddhṛta bhūta vargaḥ

original: icchāgṛhītābhimatorudehaḥ saṃsādhitāśeṣajagaddhito 'sau //
analyzed: icchā gṛhīta abhimata uru dehaḥ saṃsādhita aśeṣa jagat hitaḥ sau

original: tejobalāiśvaryamahāvabodhasuvīryaśaktyādiguṇaikarāśiḥ /
analyzed: tejaḥ bala aiśvarya mahā avabodha su vīrya śakti ādi guṇa eka rāśiḥ

original: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥ santi parāvareśe //
analyzed: paraḥ parāṇām sakalāḥ na yatra kleśa ādayaḥ santi parāvara īśe

original: sa īśvaro vyaṣṭisamaṣṭirūpo 'vyaktasvarūpaḥ prakaṭasvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ īśvaraḥ vyaṣṭi samaṣṭi rūpaḥ vyakta svarūpaḥ prakaṭa svarūpaḥ

original: sarveśvaraḥ sarvadṛksarvavettā samastaśaktiḥ parameśvarākhyaḥ //
saṃjñāyate yena tad astadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalam ekarūpam /
analyzed: saṃjñāyate yena tat asta doṣam śuddham param nirmalam eka rūpam

original: saṃdṛśyate vāpy adhigamyate vā tajjñānam ajñānam ato 'nyad uktam //
analyzed: saṃdṛśyate vā api adhigamyate vā tat jñānam ajñānam atas uktam

original: iti parabrahmasvarūpaviśeṣanirṇayāyaiva pravṛttam / (111)
analyzed: iti para brahma svarūpa viśeṣa nirṇayāya eva pravṛttam

original: anyāni sarvāṇi purāṇāny etadavirodhena neyāni /
analyzed: anyāni sarvāṇi purāṇāni etad avirodhena neyāni

original: anyaparatvaṃ ca tattadārambhaprakārair avagamyate /
analyzed: anya para tvam ca tad tad ārambha prakāraiḥ avagamyate

original: sarvātmanā viruddhāṃśas tāmasatvād anādaraṇīyaḥ / (112)
analyzed: sarva ātmanā viruddha aṃśaḥ tāmasa tvāt an ādaraṇīyaḥ

original: nanv asminn api
analyzed: nanu asmin api

original: sṛṣṭisthityantakaraṇīṃ brahmaviṣnuśivātmikāṃ /
analyzed: sṛṣṭi sthiti anta karaṇīm brahma viṣnu śiva ātmikām

original: sa saṃjñā yāti bhagavān eka janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: sa saṃjñā yāti bhagavān eka janārdanaḥ

original: iti trimūrtosāmyaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: iti trimūrti sāmyam pratīyate

original: naitad evam /
analyzed: na etat evam

original: eka eva janārdana iti jana ardanasyaiva brahmaśivādikṛtsnaprapañcatādātmyaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva janārdanaḥ iti jana ardanasya eva brahma śiva ādi kṛtsna prapañca tādātmyam vidhīyate

original: jagac ca sa iti pūrvoktam eva vivṛṇoti sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca /
analyzed: jagat ca saḥ iti pūrva uktam eva vivṛṇoti sraṣṭā sṛjati ca ātmānam viṣṇuḥ pālyam ca pāti ca

original: upasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svatyaṃprabhuḥ //
analyzed: upasaṃhriyate ca ante saṃhartā ca svatyaṃprabhuḥ

original: iti ca sraṣṭṛtvenāvasthitaṃ brahmaṇaṃ sṛjyaṃ ca saṃhartāraṃ saṃhāryaṃ ca yugapan
analyzed: iti ca sraṣṭṛ tvena avasthitam sṛjyam ca saṃhartāram saṃhāryam ca yugapad

original: nirdiśya sarvasya viṣṇutādātmyopadeśāt sṛjyasaṃhāryabhūtād vastunaḥ sraṣṭṛsaṃhartror
analyzed: nirdiśya sarvasya viṣṇu tādātmya upadeśāt sṛjya saṃhārya bhūtāt vastunaḥ sraṣṭṛ saṃhartroḥ

original: janārdanavibhūtitvena viśeṣo dṛśyate /
analyzed: janārdana vibhūti tvena viśeṣaḥ dṛśyate

original: janārdanaviṣṇuśabdayoḥ paryāyatvena brahmaviṣṇuśivātmikām iti vibhūtim /
analyzed: janārdana viṣṇu śabdayoḥ paryāya tvena brahma viṣṇu śiva ātmikām iti vibhūtim

original: ata eva svecchayā līlārthaṃ vibhūtyantarbhāva ucyate /
analyzed: atas eva sva icchayā līlā artham vibhūti antarbhāvaḥ ucyate

original: yathedam anantaram evocyate
analyzed: yathā idam anantaram eva ucyate

original: pṛthivyāpas tathā tejo vāyur ākāśa eva ca /
analyzed: pṛthivī apaḥ tathā tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśaḥ eva ca

original: sarvendriyāntaḥkaraṇaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ hi yaj jagat //
analyzed: sarva indriya antaḥkaraṇam puruṣa ākhyam hi yat jagat

original: sa eva sarvabhūtātmā viśvarūpo yato 'vyayaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva sarva bhūta ātmā viśva rūpaḥ yatas vyayaḥ

original: sargādikaṃ tato 'syaiva bhūtastham upakārakam //
analyzed: sarga ādikam bhūta stham upakārakam

original: sa eva sṛjyaḥ sa ca sarvakartā sa eva pātyatti ca pālyate ca /
analyzed: saḥ eva sṛjyaḥ sa ca sarva kartā saḥ eva pāti atti ca pālyate ca

original: brahmādyavasthābhir aśeṣamūrtir viṣṇur variṣṭho varado vareṇyaḥ // iti / (113)
analyzed: brahma ādi avasthābhiḥ aśeṣa mūrtiḥ viṣṇuḥ variṣṭhaḥ vara daḥ vareṇyaḥ iti

original: atra sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdiṣṭaṃ heyamiśraprapañcatādātmyaṃ niravadyasya nirvikārasya
analyzed: atra sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdiṣṭam heya miśra prapañca tādātmyam niravadyasya nirvikārasya

original: samastakalyāṇaguṇātmakasya brahmaṇaḥ katham upapadyata ity āśaṅkhya sa eva sarvabhūtātmā
analyzed: samasta kalyāṇa guṇa ātmakasya brahmaṇaḥ katham upapadyate iti āśaṅkhya saḥ eva sarva bhūta ātmā

original: viśvarūpo yato 'vyaya iti svayam evopapādayati /
analyzed: viśvarūpaḥ yatas vyayaḥ iti svayam eva upapādayati

original: sa eva sarveśvaraḥ parabrahmabhūto viṣṇur eva sarvaṃ jagad iti pratijñāya sarvabhūtātmā viśvarūpo yato 'vyaya iti hetur uktaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva sarva īśvaraḥ para brahma bhūtaḥ viṣṇuḥ eva sarvam jagat iti pratijñāya sarva bhūta ātmā viśva rūpaḥ yatas vyayaḥ iti hetuḥ uktaḥ

original: sarvabhūtānām ayam ātmā viśvaśarīro yato 'vyaya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarva bhūtānām ayam ātmā viśva śarīraḥ yatas vyayaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: vakṣyati ca satsarvaṃ vai hares tanur iti /
analyzed: vakṣyati ca sat sarvam vai hareḥ tanuḥ iti

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati

original: asyāvyayasyāpi parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇor viśvaśarīratayā tādātmyaviruddham ity ātmaśarīrayoś ca svabhāvā vyavasthitā eva /
analyzed: asya avyayasya api parasya brahmaṇaḥ viṣṇoḥ viśva śarīra tayā tādātmya viruddham iti ātma śarīrayoḥ ca svabhāvāḥ vyavasthitāḥ eva

original: evaṃbhūtasya sarveśvarasya viṣṇoḥ prapañcāntarbhūtaniyāmyakoṭiniviṣṭabrahmādidevatiryaṅmanuṣyeṣu tat tat samāśrayaṇīyatvāya svecchāvatāraḥ
analyzed: evaṃbhūtasya sarveśvarasya viṣṇoḥ prapañca antarbhūta niyāmya koṭi niviṣṭa brahma ādi deva tiryak manuṣyeṣu tat tat samāśrayaṇīya tvāya sva icchā avatāraḥ

original: tad etad brahmādīnāṃ bhāvanātrayānvayena karmavaśyatvaṃ bhagavataḥ parabrahmabhūtasya
analyzed: tat etat brahma ādīnām bhāvanā traya anvayena karma vaśya tvam bhagavataḥ para brahma bhūtasya

original: vāsudevasya nikhilajagadupakārāya svecchayā svenaiva rūpeṇa devādiṣv avatāra iti
analyzed: vāsudevasya nikhila jagat upakārāya sva icchayā svena eva rūpeṇa deva ādiṣu avatāraḥ iti

original: ca ṣaṣṭe 'ṃśe śubhāśrayaprakaraṇe suvyaktam uktam /
analyzed: ca ṣaṣṭe ṃśe śubha āśraya prakaraṇe su vyaktam uktam

original: asya devādirūpeṇāvatāreṣv api na prākṛto deha iti mahābhārate na bhūtasaṃghasaṃsthāno deho 'sya paramātmanaḥ /
analyzed: asya deva ādi rūpeṇa avatāreṣu api na prākṛtaḥ dehaḥ iti mahābhārate na bhūta saṃgha saṃsthānaḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: iti pratipāditaḥ /
analyzed: iti pratipāditaḥ

original: śrutibhiś ca ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yonim iti /
analyzed: śrutibhiḥ ca a jāyamānaḥ bahudhā vijāyate tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yonim iti

original: karmavaśyānāṃ brahmādīnām anicchatām api tattatkarmānuguṇaprakṛtipariṇāmarūpabhūtasaṃghasaṃsthānaviśeṣadevādiśarīrapraveśarūpaṃ janmāvarjanīyam
analyzed: karma vaśyānām brahma ādīnām an icchatām api tad tad karma anuguṇa prakṛti pariṇāma rūpa bhūta saṃgha saṃsthāna viśeṣa deva ādi śarīra praveśa rūpam janma avarjanīyam

original: ayaṃ tu sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpo bhagavān evaṃbhūtaśubhetarajanmākurvann api svecchayā svenaiva niratiśayakalyāṇarūpeṇa devādiṣu jagadupakārāya  #
analyzed: ayam tu sarveśvaraḥ satya saṃkalpaḥ bhagavān evaṃbhūta śubha itara janma a kurvan api sva icchayā svena eva niratiśaya kalyāṇa rūpeṇa deva ādiṣu jagat upakārāya

original: bahudhā jāyate,
analyzed: bahudhā jāyate

original: tasyaitasya śubhetarajanmākurvato 'pi svakalyāṇaguṇānantyena bahudhā yoniṃ bahuvidhajanma dhīrādhīramatām agresarā jānantītyarthaḥ / (114)
analyzed: tasya etasya śubha itara janma a kurvataḥ sva kalyāṇa guṇa ānantyena bahudhā yonim bahuvidha janma dhīra adhīra matām agresarāḥ jānanti iti arthaḥ

original: tadetannikhilajagannimittopādānabhūtāj janmādy asya yataḥ prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhādityādisūtraiḥ
analyzed: tat etat nikhila jagat nimitta upādāna bhūtāt janma ādi asya yatas prakṛtiḥ ca pratijñā dṛṣṭānta an uparodhāt ityādi sūtraiḥ

original: pratipāditāt parasmād brahmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣād anyasya kasyacit parataratvaṃ paramataḥ
analyzed: pratipāditāt parasmāt brahmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣāt anyasya kasyacid paratara tvam paramatas

original: setūn mānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhya ityāśaṅkya sāmānyāt tu buddhyarthaḥ pādavat
analyzed: setūn māna saṃbandha bheda vyapadeśebhyaḥ iti āśaṅkya sāmānyāt tu buddhi arthaḥ pāda vat

original: sthānaviśeṣāt prakāśādivat upapatteś ca tathānyapratiṣedhāt anena sarvagatatvamāyām
analyzed: sthāna viśeṣāt prakāśa ādi vat upapatteḥ ca tathā anya pratiṣedhāt anena sarvagata tva māyām

original: ādiśabdādibhya iti sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva nirākaroti / (115)
analyzed: ādi śabda ādibhyaḥ iti sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva nirākaroti

original: mānave ca śāstre
analyzed: mānave ca śāstre

original: prādurāsīt tamonudaḥ sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ /
analyzed: prādurāsīt tamonudaḥ sisṛkṣuḥ vividhāḥ prajāḥ

original: apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryam apāsṛjat //
analyzed: apaḥ eva sasarja ādau tāsu vīryam apāsṛjat

original: tasmiñ jajñe svayaṃ brahma
analyzed: tasmin jajñe svayam brahma

original: iti brahmaṇo janmaśravaṇāt kṣetrajñatvam evāvagamyate /
analyzed: iti brahmaṇaḥ janma śravaṇāt kṣetrajña tvam eva avagamyate

original: tathā ca sraṣṭuḥ paramapuruṣasya tadvisṛṣṭasya ca brahmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca sraṣṭuḥ parama puruṣasya tad visṛṣṭasya ca brahmaṇaḥ

original: ayaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ayam tasya tāḥ pūrvam tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tadvisṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣo loke brahmeti kīrtyate //
analyzed: tad visṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣaḥ loke brahma iti kīrtyate

original: iti nāmanirdeśāc ca /
analyzed: iti nāma nirdeśāt ca

original: tathā ca vaiṣṇave purāṇe hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ bhāvanātrayānvayād aśuddhatvena śubhāśrayatvānarhatopapādanāt kṣetrajñatvaṃ niścīyate / (116)
analyzed: tathā ca vaiṣṇave purāṇe hiraṇyagarbha ādīnām bhāvanā traya anvayāt aśuddha tvena śubha āśraya tva anarha tā upapādanāt kṣetrajña tvam niścīyate  /

original: yad api kaiścid uktam sarvasya śabdajātasya vidhyarthavādamantrarūpasya
analyzed: yat api kaiścid uktam sarvasya śabda jātasya vidhi artha vāda mantra rūpasya

original: kāryābhidhāyitvenaiva prāmāṇyaṃ varṇanīyam /
analyzed: kārya abhidhāyi tvena eva prāmāṇyam varṇanīyam

original: vyavahārād anyatra śabdasya bodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇāsaṃbhavād vyavahārasya ca kāryabuddhimūlatvāt kāryarūpa eva śabdārthaḥ /
analyzed: vyavahārāt anyatra śabdasya bodhaka tva śakti avadhāraṇa asaṃbhavāt vyavahārasya ca kārya buddhi mūla tvāt kārya rūpaḥ eva śabda arthaḥ

original: na pariniṣpanne vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam iti /
analyzed: na pariniṣpanne vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam iti

original: atrocyate /
analyzed: atra ucyate

original: pravartakavākyavyavahāra eva śabdānām arthabodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇaṃ kartavyam iti kim iyaṃ rājājñā /
analyzed: pravartaka vākya vyavahāre eva śabdānām artha bodhaka tva śakti avadhāraṇam kartavyam iti kim iyam rāja ājñā

original: siddhavastuṣu śabdasya bodhakatvaśaktigrahaṇam atyantasukaram /
analyzed: siddha vastuṣu śabdasya bodhaka tva śakti grahaṇam atyanta sukaram

original: tathā hi kenacid dhastaceṣṭādināpavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita iti devadattāya jñāpayeti preṣitaḥ kaścit tajjñāpane pravṛtto 'pavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita  #
analyzed: tathā hi kenacid hasta ceṣṭā ādinā apavarake daṇḍaḥ sthitaḥ iti devadattāya jñāpaya iti preṣitaḥ kaścid tad jñāpane pravṛttaḥ upavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita

original: iti śabdaṃ prayuṅkte /
analyzed: iti śabdam prayuṅkte

original: mūkavad dhastaceṣṭām imāṃ jānan pārśvastho 'nyaḥ prāgvyutpanno 'pi tasyārthasya bodhanāyāpavarake
analyzed: mūka vat hasta ceṣṭām imām jānan pārśva sthaḥ tasya arthasya bodhanāya apavarake

original: daṇḍaḥ sthita ityasya śabdasya prayogadarśanād asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo bodhaka iti jānātīti kim atra duṣkaram /
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ sthitaḥ iti asya śabdasya prayoga darśanāt asya arthasya ayam śabdaḥ bodhakaḥ iti jānāti iti kim atra duṣkaram

original: tathā bālas tāto 'yam iyaṃ mātāyaṃ mātulo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yaṃ mṛgaś candro 'yam ayaṃ
analyzed: tathā bālaḥ tātaḥ yam iyam mātā ayam mātulaḥ yam manuṣyaḥ yam mṛgaḥ candraḥ yam ayam

original: ca sarpa iti mātāpitṛprabhṛtibhiḥ śabdaiḥ śanaiḥ śanair aṅgulyā nirdeśane tatra tatra
analyzed: ca sarpaḥ iti mātā pitṛ prabhṛtibhiḥ śabdaiḥ śanais śanais aṅgulyā nirdeśane tatra tatra

original: bahuśaḥ śikṣitas tair eva śabdais teṣv artheṣu svātmanaś ca buddhyutpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā
analyzed: bahuśas śikṣitaḥ taiḥ eva śabdaiḥ teṣu artheṣu sva ātmanaḥ ca buddhi utpattim dṛṣṭvā

original: teṣv artheṣu teṣāṃ śabdānām aṅgulyā nirdeśapūrvakaḥ prayogaḥ sambandhāntarābhāvāt
analyzed: teṣu artheṣu teṣām śabdānām aṅgulyāḥ nirdeśa pūrvakaḥ prayogaḥ sambandha antara abhāvāt

original: saṃketayitṛpuruṣājñānāc ca bodhakatvanibandhana iti krameṇa niścitya punar apy asya
analyzed: saṃketayitṛ puruṣa ajñānāt ca bodhaka tva nibandhanaḥ iti krameṇa niścitya punar api asya

original: śabdasyāyam artha iti pūrvavṛddhaiḥ śikṣitaḥ sarvaśabdānām artham avagamya svayam
analyzed: śabdasya ayam arthaḥ iti pūrva vṛddhaiḥ śikṣitaḥ sarva śabdānām artham avagamya svayam

original: api sarvaṃ vākyajātaṃ prayuṅkte /
analyzed: api sarvam vākya jātam prayuṅkte

original: evam eva sarvapadānāṃ svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ saṃghātaviśeṣaṇāṃ ca yathāvasthitasaṃsargaviśeṣavācitvaṃ ca jānātīti kāryārthaiva vyuttipattir ityādinirbandho  #
analyzed: evam eva sarva padānām svārtha abhidhāyi tvam saṃghāta viśeṣaṇām ca yathā avasthita saṃsarga viśeṣa vāci tvam ca jānāti iti kārya arthā eva vyutti pattiḥ

original: nirbandhanaḥ /
analyzed: nirbandhanaḥ

original: ataḥ pariṣpannaḥ vastuni śabdasyabodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇāt sarvāṇi vedāntavākyāni sakalajagatkāraṇaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaramuktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma  #
analyzed: atas pariṣpannaḥ vastuni śabdasya a bodhaka tva śakti avadhāraṇāt sarvāṇi vedānta vākyāni sakala jagat kāraṇam sarva kalyāṇa guṇa ākaram ukta lakṣaṇam brahma  /

original: bodhayanty eva / (117)
analyzed: bodhayanti eva

original: api ca kāryārtha eva vyutpattir astu /
analyzed: api ca kārya arthe eva vyutpattiḥ astu

original: vedāndavākyāny apy upāsanaviṣayakāryādhikṛtaviśeṣaṇabhūtaphalatvena duḥkhāsaṃbhinnadeśaviśeṣarūpasvargādivad
analyzed: vedānda vākyāni api upāsana viṣaya kārya adhikṛta viśeṣaṇa bhūta phala tvena duḥkha asaṃbhinna deśa viśeṣa rūpa svarga ādi vat

original: rātrisatrapratiṣṭhānādivad apagoraṇaśatayātanāsādhyasādhanabhāvavac ca karyopayogitayaiva sarvaṃ bodhayanti /
analyzed: rātri satra pratiṣṭhāna ādi vat apagoraṇa śata yātanā sādhya sādhana bhāva vat ca karya upayogi tayā eva sarvam bodhayanti

original: tathā+hi brahmavid āpnoti param ityatra brahmopāsanaviṣayakāryādhikṛtaviśeṣaṇabhūtaphalatvena
analyzed: tathā hi brahma vid āpnoti param iti atra brahma upāsana viṣaya kārya adhikṛta viśeṣaṇa bhūta phalatvena

original: brahmaprāptiḥ śrūyate paraprāptikāmo brahma vidyād ityatra prāpyatayā pratīyamānaṃ
analyzed: brahma prāptiḥ śrūyate para prāpti kāmaḥ brahma vidyāt iti atra prāpya tayā pratīyamānam

original: brahmasvarūpaṃ tadviśeṣaṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryopayogitayaiva siddhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: brahma svarūpam tad viśeṣaṇam ca sarvam kārya upayogi tayā eva siddham bhavati

original: tadantargatam eva jagatsraṣṭṛtvaṃ saṃhartṛtvam ādhāratvam antarātmatvam ityādy uktam anuktaṃ ca sarvam iti na kiṃcid anupapannam / (118)
analyzed: tad antargatam eva jagat sraṣṭṛ tvam saṃhartṛ tvam ādhāra tvam antarātma tvam ityādi uktam anuktam ca sarvam iti na kiṃcid anupapannam

original: evaṃ ca sati mantrārthavādagatā hy aviruddhā apūrvāś cārthāḥ sarve vidhiśeṣatayaiva siddhā bhavanti /
analyzed: evam ca sati mantra arthavāda gatāḥ hi a viruddhāḥ apūrvāḥ ca arthāḥ sarve vidhi śeṣa tayā eva siddhāḥ bhavanti

original: yathoktaṃ dramiḍabhāṣye ṛṇaṃ hi vai jāyata iti śruter ity upakramya yady apy avadānastutiparaṃ vākyaṃ tathāpi nāsatā stutir upapadyata iti
analyzed: yathā uktam dramiḍa bhāṣye ṛṇam hi vai jāyate iti śruteḥ iti upakramya yadi api avadāna stuti param vākyam tathā api na asatā stutiḥ upapadyate iti

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati sarvo hy arthavādabhāgo devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ sāṅgasyārādhyadevatāyāś cādṛṣṭarūpān guṇān sahasraśo vadan sahasraśaḥ  #
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati sarvaḥ hi arthavāda bhāgaḥ devatā ārādhana bhūta yāga ādeḥ sa aṅgasya ārādhya devatāyāḥ ca adṛṣṭa rūpān guṇān sahasraśas vadan sahasraśas

original: karmaṇi prāśastyabuddhim utpādayati /
analyzed: karmaṇi prāśastya buddhim utpādayati

original: teṣām asadbhāve prāśastyabuddhir eva na syād iti karmaṇi prāśastyabuddhyarthaṃ guṇasadbhāvam eva bodhayatīti /
analyzed: teṣām asadbhāve prāśastya buddhiḥ eva na syāt iti karmaṇi prāśastya buddhi artham guṇa sadbhāvam eva bodhayati iti

original: anayaiva diśā sarve mantrārthavādāvagatā arthāḥ siddhāḥ / (119)
analyzed: anayā eva diśā sarve mantra arthavāda avagatāḥ arthāḥ siddhāḥ

original: api ca kāryavākyārthavādibhiḥ kim idaṃ kāryatvaṃ nāmeti vaktavyam /
analyzed: api ca kārya vākya artha vādibhiḥ kim idam kārya tvam nāma iti vaktavyam

original: kṛtibhāvabhāvitā kṛtyuddeśyatā ceti cet /
analyzed: kṛti bhāva bhāvi tā kṛti uddeśya tā ca iti ced

original: kim idaṃ kṛtyuddeśyatvam /
analyzed: kim idam kṛti uddeśya tvam

original: yad adhikṛtya kṛtir vartate tat kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
analyzed: yat adhikṛtya kṛtiḥ vartate tat kṛti uddeśya tvam iti ced

original: puruṣavyāpārarūpāyāḥ kṛteḥ ko 'yam adhikāro nāma /
analyzed: puruṣa vyāpāra rūpāyāḥ kṛteḥ kaḥ yam adhikāraḥ nāma

original: yatprāptīcchayā kṛtim utpādayati puruṣaḥ tat kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti ced dhanta tarhīṣṭatvam eva kṛtyuddeśyatvam /
analyzed: yad prāpti icchayā kṛtim utpādayati puruṣaḥ tat kṛti uddeśya tvam iti ced hanta tarhi iṣṭa tvam eva kṛti uddeśya tvam

original: athaivaṃ manuṣe iṣṭasyaiva rūpadvayam asti /
analyzed: atha evam manuṣe iṣṭasya eva rūpa dvayam asti

original: icchāviṣayatayā sthitiḥ puruṣaprerakatvaṃ ca /
analyzed: icchā viṣaya tayā sthitiḥ puruṣa preraka tvam ca

original: tatra prerakatvākāraḥ kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti so 'yaṃ svapakṣābhiniveśakārito vṛthāśramaḥ /
analyzed: tatra preraka tva ākāraḥ kṛti uddeśya tvam iti saḥ yam sva pakṣa abhiniveśa kāritaḥ vṛthā śramaḥ

original: tathā hīcchāviṣayatayā pratītasya svaprayatnotpattim antareṇāsiddhir eva prerakatvam /
analyzed: tathā hi icchā viṣaya tayā pratītasya sva prayatna utpattim antareṇa asiddhiḥ eva preraka tvam

original: tata eva pravṛtteḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva pravṛtteḥ

original: icchāyāṃ jātāyām iṣṭasya svaprayatnotpattim antareṇāsiddhiḥ pratīyate cet tataś cikīrṣā jāyate tataḥ pravartate puruṣa iti tattvavidāṃ prakriyā
analyzed: icchāyām jātāyām iṣṭasya sva prayatna utpattim antareṇa asiddhiḥ pratīyate ced tatas cikīrṣā jāyate tatas pravartate puruṣaḥ iti tattva vidām prakriyā

original: tasmād iṣṭasya kṛtyadhīnātmalābhatvātireki kṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ nāma kim pi na dṛṣyate /
analyzed: tasmāt iṣṭasya kṛti adhīna ātmalābha tva atireki kṛti uddeśya tvam nāma kim na dṛṣyate

original: athocyate iṣṭatāhetuś ca puruṣānukūlatā /
analyzed: athā ucyate iṣṭa tā hetuḥ ca puruṣa anukūla tā

original: tatpuruṣānukūlatvaṃ kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
analyzed: tatpuruṣa anukūla tvam kṛti uddeśya tvam iti ced

original: naivam /
analyzed: na evam

original: puruṣānukūlaṃ sukham ity anarthāntaram /
analyzed: puruṣa anukūlam sukham iti anarthāntaram

original: tathā puruṣānukūlaṃ duḥkhaparyāyam /
analyzed: tathā puruṣa anukūlam duḥkha paryāyam

original: ataḥ sukhavyatiriktasya kasyāpi puruṣānukūlatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: atas sukha vyatiriktasya kasya api puruṣa anukūla tvam na saṃbhavati

original: nanu ca duḥkhanivṛtter api sukhavyatiriktāyāḥ puruṣānukūlatā dṛṣṭā /
analyzed: nanu ca duḥkha nivṛtteḥ api sukha vyatiriktāyāḥ puruṣa anukūla tā dṛṣṭā

original: naitat /
analyzed: na etat

original: ātmānukūlaṃ sukham ātmapratikūlaṃ duḥkham iti hi sukhaduḥkhayor vivekaḥ /
analyzed: ātma anukūlam sukham ātma pratikūlam duḥkham iti hi sukha duḥkhayoḥ vivekaḥ

original: tatrātmānukūlaṃ sukham iṣṭaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tatra ātma anukūlam sukham iṣṭam bhavati

original: tatpratikūlaṃ duḥkhaṃ cāniṣṭam /
analyzed: tad pratikūlam duḥkham ca aniṣṭam

original: ato duḥkhasaṃyogasyāsahyatayā tannivṛttir apīṣṭā bhavati /
analyzed: atas duḥkha saṃyogasya asahya tayā tad nivṛttiḥ api iṣṭā bhavati

original: tata eveṣṭatāsāmyād anukūlatābhramaḥ /
analyzed: tatas evā iṣṭa tā sāmyāt anukūla tā bhramaḥ

original: tathā hi prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya saṃsāriṇaḥ puruṣasyānukūlasaṃyogaḥ pratikūlasaṃyogaḥ svarūpeṇāvasthitir iti ca tisro 'vasthāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya saṃsāriṇaḥ puruṣasya anukūla saṃyogaḥ pratikūla saṃyogaḥ sva rūpeṇa avasthitiḥ iti ca tisraḥ vasthāḥ

original: tatra pratikūlasaṃbandhanivṛttiś cānukūlasaṃbandhanivṛttiś ca svarūpeṇāvasthitir eva /
analyzed: tatra pratikūla saṃbandha nivṛttiḥ ca anukūla saṃbandha nivṛttiḥ ca sva rūpeṇa avasthitiḥ eva

original: tasmāt pratikūlasaṃyoge vartamāne tannivṛttirūpā svarūpeṇāvasthitir apīṣṭā bhavati /
analyzed: tasmāt pratikūla saṃyoge vartamāne tad nivṛtti rūpā sva rūpeṇa avasthitiḥ api iṣṭā bhavati

original: tatreṣṭatāsāmyād anukūlatābhramaḥ / (120)
analyzed: tatra iṣṭa tā sāmyāt anukūla tā bhramaḥ

original: ataḥ sukharūpatvād anukūlatāyāḥ niyogasyānukūlatāṃ vadantaṃ prāmāṇikāḥ parihasanti /
analyzed: atas sukha rūpa tvāt anukūla tāyāḥ niyogasya anukūla tām vadantam prāmāṇikāḥ parihasanti

original: iṣṭasyārthaviśeṣasya nivartakatayaiva hi niyogasya niyogatvaṃ sthiratvam apūrvatvaṃ ca pratīyate /
analyzed: iṣṭasya artha viśeṣasya nivartaka tayā eva hi niyogasya niyoga tvam sthira tvam apūrva tvam ca pratīyate

original: svargakāmo yajetety atra kāryasya kriyātiriktā svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhāreṇa svargasādhanatvaniścayād eva bhavanti /
analyzed: svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atra kāryasya kriyā atiriktā svarga kāma pada samabhivyāhāreṇa svarga sādhanatva niścayāt eva bhavanti

original: na ca vācyaṃ yajetety atra prathamaṃ niyogaḥ svapradhānatayaiva pratīyate svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārāt svasiddhaye svargasiddhyanukūlatā ca  #
analyzed: na ca vācyam yajeta iti atra prathamam niyogaḥ sva pradhāna tayā eva pratīyate svarga kāma pada samabhivyāhārāt sva siddhaye svarga siddhi anukūla tā ca

original: niyogasyeti /
analyzed: niyogasya iti

original: yajeteti hi dhātvarthasya puruṣaprayatnasādhyatā pratīyate /
analyzed: yajeta iti hi dhātvarthasya puruṣa prayatna sādhya tā pratīyate

original: svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārād eva dhātvarthātirekiṇo niyogatvaṃ sthiratvam apūrvatvaṃ cetyādi /
analyzed: svarga kāma pada samabhivyāhārāt eva dhātvartha atirekiṇaḥ niyoga tvam sthira tvam apūrva tvam ca ityādi

original: tac ca svargasādhanatvapratītinibandhanam /
analyzed: tat ca svarga sādhanatva pratīti nibandhanam

original: samabhivyāhṛtasvargakāmapadārthānvayayogyaṃ svargasādhanam eva kāryaṃ liṅādayo 'bhidadhatīti lokavyutpattir api tiraskṛtā /
analyzed: samabhivyāhṛta svarga kāma padārtha anvaya yogyam svarga sādhanam eva kāryam liṅ ādayaḥ bhidadhati iti loka vyutpattiḥ api tiraskṛtā

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati samabhivyahṛtapadāntaravācyārthānvayayogyam evetarapadapratipādyam ityanvitābhidhāyipadasaṃghātarūpavākyaśravaṇasaman antaram  #
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati antaram

original: eva pratīyate /
analyzed: eva pratīyate

original: tac ca svargasādhanarūpam /
analyzed: tat ca svarga sādhana rūpam

original: ataḥ kriyāvad ananyārthatāpi virodhād eva parityakteti /
analyzed: atas kriyā vat ananyārthatā api virodhāt eva parityaktā iti

original: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣaprativāsayogyārthopasthāpanaparatvaṃ gaṅgāpadasyāśrīyate /
analyzed: atas eva gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ ityādau ghoṣa prativāsa yogya artha upasthāpana para tvam gaṅgā padasya āśrīyate

original: prathamaṃ gaṅgāpadena gaṅgārthaḥ smṛta iti gaṅgāpadārthasya peyatvaṃ na vākyārthānvayībhavati /
analyzed: prathamam gaṅgā padena gaṅgā arthaḥ smṛtaḥ iti gaṅgā pada arthasya peya tvam na vākya artha anvayībhavati

original: evam atra api yajetetyetāvanmātraśravaṇe kāryam ananyārthaṃ smṛtam iti vākyārthānvayasamaye kāryasyānanyārthatā nāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: evam atra api yajeta iti etāvat mātra śravaṇe kāryam ananya artham smṛtam iti vākya artha anvaya samaye kāryasya ananya artha tā na avatiṣṭhate

original: kāryābhidhāyipadaśravaṇavelāyāṃ prathamaṃ kāryam ananyārthaṃ pratītam ity etad api na saṃgacchate /
analyzed: kārya abhidhāyi pada śravaṇa velāyām prathamam kāryam ananya artham pratītam iti etat api na saṃgacchate

original: vyutpattikāle gavānayanādikriyāyā duḥkharūpāyā iṣṭaviśeṣasādhanatayaiva kāryatāpratīteḥ /
analyzed: vyutpatti kāle gavānayana ādi kriyāyāḥ duḥkha rūpāyāḥ iṣṭa viśeṣa sādhanatayā eva kāryatā pratīteḥ

original: ato niyogasya puruṣānukūlatvaṃ sarvalokaviruddhaṃ niyogasya sukharūpapuruṣānukūlatāṃ vadataḥ svānubhavavirodhaś ca /
analyzed: atas niyogasya puruṣa anukūla tvam sarva loka viruddham niyogasya sukha rūpa puruṣa anukūla tām vadataḥ sva anubhava virodhaḥ ca

original: karīryā vṛṣṭikāmo yajeytetyādiṣu siddhe 'pi niyoge vṛṣṭyādisiddhinimittasya vṛṣṭivyatirekeṇa niyogasyānukūlatā
analyzed: karīryā vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ yajeyta ityādiṣu siddhe niyoge vṛṣṭi ādi siddhi nimittasya vṛṣṭi vyatirekeṇa niyogasya anukūla tā

original: nānubhūyate /
analyzed: na anubhūyate

original: yady apy asmiñ janmani vṛṣṭyādisiddher aniyamas tathāpy aniyamād eva niyogasiddhir avaśyāśrayaṇīyā /
analyzed: yadi api asmin janmani vṛṣṭi ādi siddheḥ aniyamaḥ tathā api aniyamāt eva niyoga siddhiḥ avaśya āśrayaṇīyā

original: tasminn anukūlatāparyāyasukhānubhūtir na dṛśyate /
analyzed: tasmin anukūla tā paryāya sukha anubhūtiḥ na dṛśyate

original: evam uktarītyā kṛtisādhyeṣṭatvātireki kṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ na dṛśyate / (121)
analyzed: evam ukta rītyā kṛti sādhya iṣṭatva atireki kṛti uddeśya tvam na dṛśyate

original: kṛtiṃ prati śeṣitvaṃ kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
analyzed: kṛtim prati śeṣi tvam kṛti uddeśya tvam iti ced

original: kim idaṃ śeṣitvaṃ kiṃ ca śeṣatvam iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: kim idam śeṣi tvam kim ca śeṣa tvam iti vaktavyam

original: kāryaṃ prati saṃbandhī śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kāryam prati saṃbandhī śeṣaḥ

original: tatpratisaṃbandhitvaṃ śeṣitvam iti cet /
analyzed: tad pratisaṃbandhi tvam śeṣi tvam iti ced

original: evaṃ tarhi kāryatvam eva śeṣitvam ity uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam tarhi kārya tvam eva śeṣi tvam iti uktam bhavati

original: kāryatvam eva vicāryate /
analyzed: kārya tvam eva vicāryate

original: paroddeśapravṛttakṛtivyāptyarhatvam śeṣatvam iti cet /
analyzed: para uddeśa pravṛtta kṛti vyāpti arha tvam śeṣa tvam iti ced

original: ko 'yaṃ paroddeśo nāmeti /
analyzed: kaḥ yam para uddeśaḥ nāma iti

original: ayam eva hi vicāryate /
analyzed: ayam eva hi vicāryate

original: uddeśyatvaṃ nāmepsitatvasādhyatvam iti cet /
analyzed: uddeśya tvam nāma īpsitatva sādhyatvam iti ced

original: kim idam īpsitatvam /
analyzed: kim idam īpsita tvam

original: kṛtiprayojanatvam iti cet puruṣasya kṛtyārambhaprayojanam eva hi kṛtiprayojanam /
analyzed: kṛti prayojana tvam iti ced puruṣasya kṛtya ārambha prayojanam eva hi kṛti prayojanam

original: sa cecchāviṣayaḥ kṛtyadhīnātmalābha iti pūrvokta eva /
analyzed: sa ca icchā viṣayaḥ kṛti adhīna ātmalābhaḥ iti pūrva uktaḥ eva

original: ayam eva hi sarvatra śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva hi sarvatra śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ

original: paragatātiśayādhānecchopādeyatvam eva yasya svarūpaṃ sa śeṣaḥ paraḥ śeṣī /
analyzed: para gata atiśaya ādhāna icchā upādeya tvam eva yasya svarūpam sa śeṣaḥ paraḥ śeṣī

original: phalotpattīcchayā yāgādes tatprayatnasya copādeyatvaṃ yāgādisiddhīcchayānyat sarvam upādeyam / (122)
analyzed: phala utpatti icchayā yāga ādeḥ tad prayatnasya ca upādeya tvam yāga ādi siddhi icchayā anyat sarvam upādeyam

original: evaṃ garbhadāsādīnām api puruṣaviśeṣātiśayādhānopādeyatvam eva svarūpam /
analyzed: evam garbha dāsa ādīnām api puruṣa viśeṣa atiśaya ādhāna upādeya tvam eva svarūpam

original: evam īśvaragatātiśayādhānecchayopādeyatvam eva cetanācetanātmakasya nityasyānityasya
analyzed: evam īśvara gata atiśaya ādhāna icchayā upādeya tvam eva cetana acetana ātmakasya nityasya anityasya

original: ca sarvasya vastunaḥ svarūpam iti sarvam īśvaraśeṣatvam eva sarvasya ceśvaraḥ śeṣīti
analyzed: ca sarvasya vastunaḥ svarūpam iti sarvam īśvara śeṣa tvam eva sarvasya ca īśvaraḥ śeṣi iti

original: sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ patiṃ viśvasyetyādyuktam /
analyzed: sarvasya vaśī sarvasya īśānaḥ patim viśvasya ityādi uktam

original: kṛtisādhyaṃ pradhānaṃ yat tatkāryam abhidhīyata ity ayam arthaḥ śraddadhāneṣv eva śobhate / (123)
analyzed: kṛti sādhyam pradhānam yat tat kāryam abhidhīyate iti ayam arthaḥ śraddadhāneṣu eva śobhate  /

original: api ca svargakāmo yajetetyādiṣu lakāravācyakartṛviśeṣasamarpaṇaparāṇāṃ svargakāmādipadānāṃ niyojyaviśeṣasamarpaṇaparatvaṃ śabdānuśāsanaviruddhaṃ  #
analyzed: api ca svarga kāmaḥ yajeta ityādiṣu lakāra vācya kartṛ viśeṣa samarpaṇa parāṇām svarga kāma ādi padānām niyojya viśeṣa samarpaṇa para tvam śabda anuśāsana viruddham

original: kenāvagamyate /
analyzed: kena avagamyate

original: sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭasya svargasādhane kartṛtvānvayo na ghaṭata iti cet /
analyzed: sādhya svarga viśiṣṭasya svarga sādhane kartṛ tva anvayaḥ na ghaṭate iti ced

original: niyojyatvānvayo 'pi na ghaṭata iti hi svargasādhanatvaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: niyojya tva anvayaḥ api na ghaṭate iti hi svarga sādhanatva niścayaḥ

original: sa tu śāstrasiddhe kartṛtvānvaye svargasādhanatvaniścayaḥ kriyate /
analyzed: sa tu śāstra siddhe kartṛ tva anvaye svarga sādhana tva niścayaḥ kriyate

original: yathā bhoktukāmo devadattagṛhaṃ gacched ityukte bhojanakāmasya devadattagṛhagamane kartṛtvaśravaṇād eva prāgajñātam api bhojanasādhanatvaṃ
analyzed: yathā bhoktu kāmaḥ devadatta gṛham gacchet iti ukte bhojana kāmasya devadatta gṛha gamane kartṛ tva śravaṇāt eva prāk ajñātam api bhojana sādhanatvam

original: evam atrāpi bhavati /
analyzed: evam atra api bhavati

original: na kriyāntaraṃ prati kartṛtayā śrutasya kriyāntare kartṛtvakalpanaṃ yuktam yajeteti hi yāgakartṛtayā śrutasya biddhau kartṛtvakalpanaṃ kriyate
analyzed: na kriyā antaram prati kartṛ tayā śrutasya kriyā antare kartṛ tva kalpanam yuktam yajeta iti hi yāga kartṛ tayā śrutasya biddhau kartṛ tva kalpanam kriyate

original: buddheḥ kartṛtvakalpanam eva hi niyojyatvam / yathoktaṃ
analyzed: buddheḥ kartṛ tva kalpanam eva hi niyojya tvam yathā uktam

original: niyojya sarvakāryaṃ yaḥ svakīyatvena budhyate /
analyzed: niyojya sarva kāryam yaḥ svakīya tvena budhyate

original: iti / yaṣṭṛtvānuguṇaṃ tadbodhṛtvam iti cet /
analyzed: iti yaṣṭṛ tva anuguṇam tad bodhṛ tvam iti ced

original: devadattaḥ paced iti pāke kartṛtayā śrutasya devadattasya pākārthagamanaṃ pākānuguṇam iti gamane kartṛtvakalpanaṃ na yujyate / (124)
analyzed: devadattaḥ pacet iti pāke kartṛ tayā śrutasya devadattasya pāka artha gamanam pāka anuguṇam iti gamane kartṛ tva kalpanam na yujyate  /

original: kiṃ ca liṅādiśabdavācyaṃ sthāyirūpaṃ kim ity apūrvam āśrīyate /
analyzed: kim ca liṅ ādi śabda vācyam sthāyi rūpam kim iti apūrvam āśrīyate

original: svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārānupapatter iti cet /
analyzed: svarga kāma pada samabhivyāhāra anupapatteḥ iti ced

original: kātrānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: kā atra anupapattiḥ

original: siṣādhayiṣitasvargo hi svargakāmaḥ /
analyzed: siṣādhayiṣita svargaḥ hi svarga kāmaḥ

original: tasya svargakāmasya kālāntarabhāvisvargasiddhau kṣaṇabhaṅginī yāgādikriyā na samartheti cet /
analyzed: tasya svarga kāmasya kāla antara bhāvi svarga siddhau kṣaṇabhaṅginī yāga ādi kriyā na samarthā iti ced

original: anāghrātavedasiddhāntānām iyam anupapattiḥ /
analyzed: an āghrāta veda siddhāntānām iyam anupapattiḥ

original: sarvaiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ parameśvaro bhagavān nārāyaṇas tattadiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ dadātīti vedavido vadanti /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ ārādhitaḥ parameśvaraḥ bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ tad tad iṣṭam phalam dadāti iti veda vidaḥ vadanti

original: yathāhur vedavidagresarā dramiḍācāryāḥ phalasaṃbibhatsayā hi karmabhir ātmānaṃ piprīṣanti sa prīto 'laṃ phalāyeti śāstramaryādā iti /
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ veda vid agresarāḥ dramiḍa ācāryāḥ phala saṃbibhatsayā hi karmabhiḥ ātmānam piprīṣanti sa prītaḥ laṃ phalāya iti śāstra maryādā iti

original: phalasaṃbandhecchayā karmabhir yāgadānahomādibhir indriyādidevatāmukhena tattadantaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitam indrādiśabdavācyaṃ paramātmānaṃ bhagavantaṃ  #
analyzed: phala saṃbandha icchayā karmabhiḥ yāga dāna homa ādibhiḥ indriya ādi devatā mukhena tad tad antaryāmi rūpeṇa avasthitam indra ādi śabda vācyam paramātmānam bhagavantam

original: vāsudevam ārirādhayiṣanti,
analyzed: vāsudevam ārirādhayiṣanti

original: sa hi karmabhir ārādhitas teṣām iṣṭāni phalāni prayacchatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi karmabhiḥ ārādhitaḥ teṣām iṣṭāni phalāni prayacchati iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ iṣṭāpūrtaṃ bahudhā jātaṃ jāyamānaṃ viśvaṃ bibharti bhuvanasya nābhir iti /
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ iṣṭāpūrtam bahudhā jātam jāyamānam viśvam bibharti bhuvanasya nābhiḥ iti

original: iṣṭāpūrtam iti sakalaśrutismṛticoditaṃ karmocyate /
analyzed: iṣṭāpūrtam iti sakala śruti smṛti coditam karma ucyate

original: tadviśvaṃ bibharti indrāgnivaruṇādisarvadevatāsaṃbandhitayā pratīyamānaṃ tattadantarātmatayāvasthitaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ svayam eva bibharti svayam  #
analyzed: tat viśvam bibharti indra agni varuṇa ādi sarva devatā saṃbandhi tayā pratīyamānam tat tat antarātma tayā avasthitaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ svayam eva bibharti svayam

original: eva svīkaroti /
analyzed: eva svīkaroti

original: bhuvanasya nābhiḥ brahmakṣatrādisarvavarṇapūrṇasya bhuvanasya dhārakaḥ tais taiḥ karmabhir ārādhitas tattadiṣṭaphalapradānena bhuvanānāṃ dhāraka  #
analyzed: bhuvanasya nābhiḥ brahma kṣatra ādi sarva varṇa pūrṇasya bhuvanasya dhārakaḥ taiḥ taiḥ karmabhiḥ ārādhitaḥ tad tad iṣṭa phala pradānena bhuvanānām dhāraka

original: iti nābhir ityuktaḥ /
analyzed: iti nābhiḥ iti uktaḥ

original: agnivāyuprabhṛtidevatāntarātmatayā tattacchabdābhidheyo 'yam evety āha tad evāgnis tadvāyus tatsūryas tad u candramā iti /
analyzed: agni vāyu prabhṛti devatā antarātma tayā tad tad śabda abhidheyaḥ yam eva iti āha tat eva agniḥ tat vāyuḥ tat sūryaḥ tat u candramāḥ iti

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā

original: yo yo yām yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ yām yām tanum bhaktaḥ śraddhayā arcitum icchati

original: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham //
analyzed: tasya tasya acalām śraddhām tām eva vidadhāmi aham

original: sa tasya śraddhayā yuktas tasyārādhanam īhate /
analyzed: sa tasya śraddhayā yuktaḥ tasya ārādhanam īhate

original: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān iha tān // iti /
analyzed: labhate ca tatas kāmān mayā eva vihitān iha tān  iti

original: yāṃ yāṃ tanum itīndrādidevatāviśeṣās tattadantaryāmitayāvasthitasya bhagavatas tanavaḥ śarīrāṇītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yām yām tanum iti indra ādi devatā viśeṣāḥ tad tad antaryāmi tayā avasthitasya bhagavataḥ tanavaḥ śarīrāṇi iti arthaḥ

original: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca /
analyzed: aham hi sarva yajñānām bhoktā ca prabhuḥ eva ca

original: ityādi / prabhur eva ceti sarvaphalānāṃ pradātā cetyarthaḥ / yathā ca
analyzed: ityādi prabhuḥ eva ca iti sarva phalānām pradātā ca iti arthaḥ yathā ca

original: yajñais tvam ijyase nityaṃ sarvadevamayācyuta /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ tvam ijyase nityam sarva deva maya acyuta

original: yaiḥ svadharmaparair nātha narair ādādhito bhavān /
analyzed: yaiḥ svadharma paraiḥ nātha naraiḥ ādādhitaḥ bhavān

original: te taranty akhilām etāṃ mayām ātmavimuktaye //
analyzed: te taranti akhilām etām mayām ātma vimuktaye

original: iti / setihāsapurāṇeṣu sarveṣv eva vedeṣu sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarveśvarārādhanarūpāṇi,
analyzed: iti sa itihāsa purāṇeṣu sarveṣu eva vedeṣu sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarva īśvara ārādhana rūpāṇi

original: tais taiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ puruṣottamas tattadiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ dadātīti tatra tatra prapañcitam /
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ karmabhiḥ ārādhitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ tad tad iṣṭam phalam dadāti iti tatra tatra prapañcitam

original: evam hi sarvaśaktiṃ sarvajñaṃ sarveśvaraṃ bhagavantam indrādidevatāntaryāmirūpeṇa yāgadānahomādivedoditasarvakarmaṇāṃ bhoktāraṃ sarvaphalānāṃ  #
analyzed: evam hi sarva śaktim sarvajñam sarva īśvaram bhagavantam indra ādi devatā antaryāmi rūpeṇa yāga dāna homa ādi veda udita sarva karmaṇām bhoktāram sarva phalānām

original: pradātāraṃ ca sarvāḥ śrutayo vadanti /
analyzed: pradātāram ca sarvāḥ śrutayaḥ vadanti

original: caturhotāro yatra saṃpadaṃ gacchanti devair ityādyāḥ /
analyzed: catur hotāraḥ yatra saṃpadam gacchanti devaiḥ ityādyāḥ

original: caturhotāro yajñāḥ,
analyzed: catur hotāraḥ yajñāḥ

original: yatra paramātmani deveṣv antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthite,
analyzed: yatra paramātmani deveṣu antaryāmi rūpeṇa avasthite

original: devaiḥ saṃpadaṃ gacchanti devaiḥ saṃbandhaṃ gacchanti yajñā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: devaiḥ saṃpadam gacchanti devaiḥ saṃbandham gacchanti yajñāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitasya paramātmanaḥ śarīratayāvasthitānām indrādīnāṃ yāgādisaṃbandha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: antaryāmi rūpeṇa avasthitasya paramātmanaḥ śarīra tayā avasthitānām indra ādīnām yāga ādi saṃbandhaḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā

original: bhoktāraṃ yajñatapasāṃ sarvalokamaheśvaram /
analyzed: bhoktāram yajña tapasām sarva loka mahā īśvaram

original: iti / tasmād agnyādidevatāntarātmabhūtaparamapuruṣārādhanarūpabhūtāni sarvāṇi karmāṇi,
analyzed: iti tasmāt agni ādi devatā antarātma bhūta paramapuruṣa ārādhana rūpa bhūtāni sarvāṇi karmāṇi

original: sa eva cābhilaṣitaphalapradāteti kim atrāpūrveṇa vyutpattipathadūravartinā vācyatayābhyupagatena kalpitena vā prayojanam /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca abhilaṣita phala pradātā iti kim atra apūrveṇa vyutpatti patha dūra vartinā vācya tayā abhyupagatena kalpitena vā prayojanam

original: evaṃ ca sati liṅādeḥ ko 'yam arthaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca sati liṅ ādeḥ kaḥ yam arthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ bhavati

original: yaja devapūjāyām iti devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāṃ vyutpattisiddhāṃ liṅādayo 'bhidadhatīti na kiṃcid anupapannam
analyzed: yaja deva pūjāyām iti devatā ārādhana bhūta yāga ādeḥ prakṛti arthasya kartṛ vyāpāra sādhyatām vyutpatti siddhām liṅ ādayaḥ bhidadhati iti na kiṃcid anupapannam

original: kartṛvācināṃ pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasaṃbandhaprakāro hi vācyaḥ /
analyzed: kartṛ vācinām pratyayānām prakṛti arthasya kartṛ vyāpāra saṃbandha prakāraḥ hi vācyaḥ

original: bhūtavartamānādikam anye vadanti /
analyzed: bhūta vartamāna ādikam anye vadanti

original: liṅādayas tu kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāṃ vadanti / (125)
analyzed: liṅ ādayaḥ tu kartṛ vyāpāra sādhyatām vadanti

original: api ca kāminaḥ kartavyatā karma vidhāya karmaṇo devatārādhanarūpatāṃ taddvārā phalasaṃbhavaṃ ca tattatkarmavidhivākyāny eva vadanti /
analyzed: api ca kāminaḥ kartavya tā karma vidhāya karmaṇaḥ devatā ārādhana rūpa tām tad dvārā phala saṃbhavam ca tad tad karma vidhi vākyāni eva vadanti

original: vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabhata bhūtikāmo vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayatītyādīni /
analyzed: vāyavyam śvetam ālabhata bhūti kāmaḥ vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyena upadhāvati saḥ eva enam bhūtim gamayati ityādīni

original: nātra phalasiddhyanupapattiḥ kāpi dṛśyata iti phalasādhanatvāvagatir aupādānikīty api na saṃgacchati /
analyzed: na atra phala siddhi anupapattiḥ kā api dṛśyate iti phala sādhanatva avagatiḥ aupādānikī iti api na saṃgacchati

original: vidhyapekṣitaṃ yāgādeḥ phalasādhanatvaprakāraṃ vākyaśeṣa eva bodhayatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vidhi apekṣitam yāga ādeḥ phala sādhanatva prakāram vākyaśeṣaḥ eva bodhayati iti arthaḥ

original: tasmād brāhmaṇāya nāpaguretety atrāpagoraṇaniṣedhavidhiparavākyaśeṣe śrūyamāṇaṃ niṣedhyasyāpagoraṇasya śatayātanāsādhanatvaṃ niṣedhavidhyupayogīti  #
analyzed: tasmāt brāhmaṇāya na apagureta iti atra apagoraṇa niṣedha vidhi para vākya śeṣe śrūyamāṇam niṣedhyasya apagoraṇasya śata yātanā sādhana tvam niṣedha vidhi upayogi iti

original: hi svīkriyate /
analyzed: hi svīkriyate

original: atra punaḥ kāminaḥ kartavyatayā vihitasya yāgādeḥ kāmyasvargādisādhanatvaprakāraṃ vākyaśeṣāvagatam anādṛtya kim ity upādānena yāgādeḥ phalasādhanatvaṃ  #
analyzed: atra punar kāminaḥ kartavya tayā vihitasya yāga ādeḥ kāmya svarga ādi sādhanatva prakāram vākyaśeṣa avagatam an ādṛtya kim iti upādānena yāga ādeḥ phala sādhanatvam

original: parikalpyate /
analyzed: parikalpyate

original: hiraṇyanidhim apavarake nidhāya yācate kodravādilubdhaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ janam iti śrūyate tad etad yuṣmāsu dṛśyate /
analyzed: hiraṇyanidhim apavarake nidhāya yācate kodrava ādi lubdhaḥ kṛpaṇam janam iti śrūyate tat etat yuṣmāsu dṛśyate

original: śatayātanāsādhanatvam api nādṛṣṭadvāreṇa /
analyzed: śata yātanā sādhanatvam api na adṛṣṭa dvāreṇa

original: coditāny anutiṣṭho vihitaṃ karmākurvato ninditāni ca kurvataḥ sarvāṇi sukhāni duḥkhāni ca paramapuruṣānugrahanigrahābhyām eva bhavanti /
analyzed: coditāni vihitam karma a kurvataḥ ninditāni ca kurvataḥ sarvāṇi sukhāni duḥkhāni ca paramapuruṣa anugraha nigrahābhyām eva bhavanti

original: eṣa hy evānandayati atho so 'bhayaṃ gato bhavati atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavati bhīṣāsmād vātaḥ pavate bhīṣodeti sūryo bhīṣāsmād agniś candraś ca  #
analyzed: eṣa hi eva ānandayati atha u saḥ bhayam gataḥ bhavati atha tasya bhayam bhavati bhīṣā asmāt vātaḥ pavate bhīṣā udeti sūryaḥ bhīṣā asmāt agniḥ candraḥ ca  /

original: mṛtyur dhāvati pañcamaḥ iti /
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ dhāvati pañcamaḥ iti

original: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ etasya vā
analyzed: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ etasya vā

original: akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dadato manuṣyāḥ praśaṃsanti yajamānaṃ devā darvīṃ pitaro
analyzed: akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dadataḥ manuṣyāḥ praśaṃsanti yajamānam devāḥ darvīm pitaraḥ

original: 'nvāyattā ityādyanekavidhāḥ śrutayaḥ santi /
analyzed: nu āyattāḥ ityādi anekavidhāḥ śrutayaḥ santi

original: yathoktaṃ dramiḍabhāṣye tasyājñayā dhāvati vāyur nadyaḥ sravanti tena ca kṛtasīmāno jalāśayāḥ samadā iva meṣavirsapitaṃ kurvantīti /
analyzed: yathā uktam dramiḍabhāṣye tasya ājñayā dhāvati vāyuḥ nadyaḥ sravanti tena ca kṛta sīmānaḥ jalāśayāḥ samadāḥ iva meṣa virsapitam kurvanti iti

original: tatsaṃkalpanibandhanā hīme loke na cyavante na sphuṭante /
analyzed: tad saṃkalpa nibandhanāḥ hi ime loke na cyavante na sphuṭante

original: svaśāsanānuvartināṃ jñātvā kāruṇyāt
analyzed: sva śāsana anuvartinām jñātvā kāruṇyāt

original: sa bhagavān vardhayeta vidvān karmadakṣa iti ca / (126)
analyzed: sa bhagavān vardhayeta vidvān karma dakṣaḥ iti ca

original: paramapuruṣayāthātmyajñānapūrvakatadupāsanādivihitakarmānuṣṭhāyinas tatprasādāt tatprāptiparyantāni sukhāny abhayaṃ ca yathādhikāraṃ bhavanti
analyzed: paramapuruṣa yāthātmya jñāna pūrvaka tad upāsana ādi vihita karma anuṣṭhāyinaḥ tad prasādāt tad prāpti paryantāni sukhāni abhayam ca yathā adhikāram bhavanti

original: tajjñānapūrvakaṃ tadupāsanādivihitaṃ karmākurvato ninditāni ca kurvatas tannigrahād eva tadaprāptipūrvakāparimitaduḥkhāni bhayaṃ ca bhavanti
analyzed: tad jñāna pūrvakam tad upāsana ādi vihitam karma a kurvataḥ ninditāni ca kurvataḥ tad nigrahāt eva tad aprāpti pūrvaka aparimita duḥkhāni bhayam ca bhavanti

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā

original: niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: niyatam kuru karma tvam karma jyāyaḥ hi akarmaṇaḥ

original: ityādinā kṛtsnaṃ karma jñānapūrvakam anuṣṭheyaṃ vidhāya
analyzed: ityādinā kṛtsnam karma jñāna pūrvakam anuṣṭheyam vidhāya

original: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya
analyzed: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya

original: iti sarvasya karmaṇaḥ svārādhanatām ātmanāṃ svaniyāmyatāṃ ca pratipādya
analyzed: iti sarvasya karmaṇaḥ sva ārādhana tām ātmanām sva niyāmya tām ca pratipādya

original: ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: ye me matam idam nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ

original: śraddhāvanto 'nasūyanto mucyante te 'pi karmabhiḥ //
analyzed: śraddhāvantaḥ nasūyantaḥ mucyante te pi karmabhiḥ

original: ye tv etadabhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam /
analyzed: ye tu etat abhyasūyantaḥ na anutiṣṭhanti me matam

original: sarvajñānavimūḍhāṃs tān viddhi naṣṭān acetasaḥ //
analyzed: sarva jñāna vimūḍhān tān viddhi naṣṭān acetasaḥ

original: iti svājñānuvartinaḥ praśasya viparītān vinindya punar api svājñānupālanam akurvatām āsur aprakṛtyantarbhāvam abhidhāyādhamā gatiś coktā
analyzed: iti sva ājñā anuvartinaḥ praśasya viparītān vinindya punar api sva ājñā anupālanam akurvatām āsuḥ a prakṛti antarbhāvam abhidhāya adhamā gatiḥ ca uktā

original: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān /
analyzed: tān aham dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu nara adhamān

original: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu //
analyzed: kṣipāmi ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣu eva yoniṣu

original: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani /
