original: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim // iti /
analyzed: mām a prāpya eva kaunteya tatas yānti adhamām gatim iti

original: sarvakarmāṇy api sadā kurvāṇo madvypāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sarva karmāṇi api sadā kurvāṇaḥ mad vypāśrayaḥ

original: matprasādād avāpnoti śāśvataṃ padam avyayam //
analyzed: mad prasādāt avāpnoti śāśvatam padam avyayam

original: iti ca svājñānuvartināṃ śāśvataṃ padaṃ coktam /
analyzed: iti ca sva ājñā anuvartinām śāśvatam padam ca uktam

original: aśrutavedāntānāṃ karmaṇy aśraddhā mā bhūd iti devatādhikaraṇe 'tivādāḥ kṛtāḥ karmamātre yathā śraddhā syād iti sarvam ekaśāstram iti vedavitsiddhāntaḥ
analyzed: aśruta vedāntānām karmaṇi aśraddhā mā bhūt iti devatā adhikaraṇe ti vādāḥ kṛtāḥ karma mātre yathā śraddhā syāt iti sarvam eka śāstram iti veda vid siddhāntaḥ

original: tasyaitasya parasya brahmaṇo
analyzed: tasya etasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ

original: nārāyaṇasyāparicchedyajñānānandāmalatvasvarūpavajjñānaśaktibalāiśvaryavīryatejaḥprabhṛtyanavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇavatsvasaṃkalpapravartyasvetarasamastacidacidvastujātavatsvābhimatasvānurūpaikarūpadivyarūpataducitaniratiśayakalyāṇavividhānaṃtabhūṣaṇasvaśaktisadṛśāparimitānantāścaryanānāvidhāyudhasvābhimatānurūpasvarūpaguṇavibhavāiśvaryaśīlādyanavadhikamahimamahisīsvānurūpakalyāṇajñānakriyādyaparimeyaguṇānantaparijanaparicchedasvocitanikhilabhogyabhogopakaraṇādyanantamahāvibhavāvāṅmanasagocarasvarūpasvabhāvadivyasthānādinityatāniravadyatāgocarāś
analyzed: nārāyaṇasya aparicchedya jñāna ānanda amala tva svarūpavat jñāna śakti bala aiśvarya vīrya tejaḥ prabhṛti anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇavat sva saṃkalpa pravartya sva itara samasta cit acit vastu jātavat sva abhimata sva anurūpa eka rūpa divya rūpa tad ucita niratiśaya kalyāṇa vividha ananta bhūṣaṇa sva śakti sadṛśa aparimita ananta āścarya nānāvidha āyudha sva abhimata anurūpa svarūpa guṇa vibhava aiśvarya śīla ādi anavadhika mahima mahi

original: ca sahasraśaḥ śrutayaḥ santi /
analyzed: ca sahasraśas śrutayaḥ santi

original: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt /
analyzed: veda aham etam puruṣam mahāntam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt

original: ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ eṣaḥ ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkam evam akṣiṇī /
analyzed: tasya yathā kapyāsam puṇḍarīkam evam akṣiṇī

original: ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśas tasminn ayaṃ puruṣo manomayo 'mṛto hiraṇmayaḥ manomaya
analyzed: yaḥ eṣaḥ ntar hṛdaye ākāśaḥ tasmin ayam puruṣaḥ manaḥ mayaḥ mṛtaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ manaḥ maya

original: iti manasaiva viśuddhena gṛhyata ityarthaḥ sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣād
analyzed: iti manasā eva viśuddhena gṛhyate iti arthaḥ sarve nimeṣāḥ jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣāt

original: adhi vidyudvarṇāt puruṣād ityarthaḥ nīlatoyadamadhyasthā vidyullekheva bhāsvarā madhyasthanīlatoyadā
analyzed: adhi vidyut varṇāt puruṣāt iti arthaḥ nīla toyada madhya sthā vidyut lekhā iva bhāsvarā madhya stha nīla toyadā

original: vidyullekheva seyaṃ daharapuṇḍarīkamadhyasthākāśavartinī vahnirśikhā svāntarnihitanīlatoyadābhaparamātmasvarūpā
analyzed: vidyut lekhā iva sā iyam dahara puṇḍarīka madhya stha ākāśa vartinī vahniḥ śikhā sva antar nihita nīla toyada ābha paramātma svarūpā

original: avāntarnihitanīlatoyadā visyud ivābhātītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: avāntar nihita nīla toyadā visyut iva ābhāti iti arthaḥ

original: manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ mayaḥ prāṇa śarīraḥ bhā rūpaḥ

original: satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ /
analyzed: satya kāmaḥ satya saṃkalpaḥ

original: ākāśātmā sarvakāmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ sarvam idam abhyātto 'vākyānādaraḥ /
analyzed: ākāśa ātmā sarva kāmā sarva kāmaḥ sarva gandhaḥ sarva rasaḥ sarvam idam abhyāttaḥ vākya anādaraḥ

original: māhārajanaṃ vāsa ityādyāḥ /
analyzed: māhārajanam vāsaḥ ityādyāḥ

original: asyeśānā jagato viṣṇupatnī /
analyzed: asya īśānā jagataḥ viṣṇu patnī

original: hrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyau /
analyzed: hrīḥ ca te lakṣmīḥ ca patnyau

original: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ

original: kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke /
analyzed: kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke

original: yad ekam avyaktam anantarūpaṃ viśvaṃ purāṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt /
analyzed: yat ekam avyaktam ananta rūpam viśvam purāṇam tamasaḥ parastāt

original: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman /
analyzed: yaḥ veda nihitam guhāyām parame vyoman

original: yo 'syādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman /
analyzed: yaḥ sya adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman

original: tad eva tad u bhavyamā
analyzed: tat eva tat u bhavyamā

original: idaṃ tadakṣare parame vyoman nityādiśrutiśataniścito 'yam arthaḥ / (128)
analyzed: idam tat akṣare parame vyoman nitya ādi śruti śata niścitaḥ yam arthaḥ

original: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti viṣṇoḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ paraṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūraya iti vacanāt sarvakāladarśanavantaḥ paripūrṇajñānāḥ kecana  #
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam iti viṣṇoḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ param padam sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ iti vacanāt sarva kāla darśanavantaḥ paripūrṇa jñānāḥ kecana

original: santīti vijñāyate /
analyzed: santi iti vijñāyate

original: ye sūrayas te sadā paśyantīti vacanavyaktiḥ,
analyzed: ye sūrayaḥ te sadā paśyanti iti vacana vyaktiḥ

original: ye sadā paśyanti te sūraya iti vā /
analyzed: ye sadā paśyanti te sūrayaḥ iti vā

original: ubhayapakṣe 'py anekavidhānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti cet / na /
analyzed: ubhaya pakṣe pi aneka vidhānam na saṃbhavati iti ced na

original: aprāptatvāt sarvasya sarvaviśiṣṭaṃ paramasthānaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: aprāpta tvāt sarvasya sarva viśiṣṭam parama sthānam vidhīyate

original: yathoktaṃ tadguṇās te vidhīyerann avibhāgād vidhānārthe na ced anyena śiṣṭā iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam tad guṇāḥ te vidhīyeran avibhāgāt vidhāna arthe na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ iti

original: yathā yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ityādikarmavidhau karmaṇo guṇānāṃ cāprāptatvena sarvaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ
analyzed: yathā yat āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ iti ādi karma vidhau karmaṇaḥ guṇānām ca aprāpta tvena sarva guṇa viśiṣṭam

original: karma vidhīyate tathātrāpi sūribhiḥ sadā dṛśyatvena viṣṇoḥ paramasthānam aprāptaṃ
analyzed: karma vidhīyate tathā atrā api sūribhiḥ sadā dṛśya tvena viṣṇoḥ parama sthānam a prāptam

original: pratipādayatīti na kaścid virodhaḥ /
analyzed: pratipādayati iti na kaścid virodhaḥ

original: karaṇamantrāḥ kriyamāṇānuvādinaḥ stotraśastrarūpā japādiṣu viniyuktāś ca prakaraṇapathitāś
analyzed: karaṇa mantrāḥ kriyamāṇa anuvādinaḥ stotra śastra rūpāḥ japa ādiṣu viniyuktāḥ ca prakaraṇa pathitāḥ

original: cāprakaraṇapathitāś ca svārthaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvasthitam evāprāptam aviruddhaṃ brāhmaṇavad
analyzed: ca a prakaraṇa pathitāḥ ca sva artham sarvam yathā avasthitam eva a prāptam a viruddham brāhmaṇa vat

original: bodhayantīti hi vaidikāḥ /
analyzed: bodhayanti iti hi vaidikāḥ

original: pragītamantrasādhyaguṇaguṇiabhimānaṃ stotram /
analyzed: pragīta mantra sādhya guṇa guṇi abhimānam stotram

original: apragītamantrasādhyaguṇaguṇiniṣṭhaguṇābhidhānaṃ śastram /
analyzed: a pragīta mantra sādhya guṇa guṇi niṣṭha guṇa abhidhānam śastram

original: niyuktārthaprakāśanāṃ ca devatādiṣv aprāptāviruddhaguṇaviśeṣaprtipādanaṃ viniyogānuguṇam eva /
analyzed: niyukta artha prakāśanām ca devatā ādiṣu aprāpta aviruddha guṇa viśeṣa prtipādanam viniyoga anuguṇam eva

original: neyaṃ śrutir muktajanaviṣayā /
analyzed: na iyam śrutiḥ mukta jana viṣayā

original: teśāṃ sadādarśanānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: teśām sadā adarśana anupapatteḥ

original: na+pi muktapravāhaviṣayā /
analyzed: mukta pravāha viṣayā

original: sadā paśyantīty ekaikakartṛkaviṣayatayā pratīteḥ śrutibhaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: sadā paśyanti iti ekaika kartṛka viṣayatayā pratīteḥ śruti bhaṅga prasaṅgāt

original: mantrārthavādagatā hy arthāḥ kāryaparatve 'pi siddhyantītyuktam /
analyzed: mantra arthavāda gatāḥ hi arthāḥ kārya paratve

original: kiṃ punaḥ siddhavastuny eva tātparye vyutpattisiddha iti sarvam upapannam /
analyzed: kim punar siddha vastuni eva tātparye vyutpatti siddhe iti sarvam upapannam

original: nanu cātra tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti parasvarūpam eva paramapadaśabdenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: nanu ca atra tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam iti para svarūpam eva parama pada śabdena abhidhīyate

original: samastaheyarahitaṃ viṣṇvākhyaṃ paraṃ padam ityādiṣv avyatirekadarśanāt /
analyzed: samasta heya rahitam viṣṇu ākhyam param padam ityādiṣu avyatireka darśanāt

original: naivam /
analyzed: na evam

original: kṣayantam asya rajataḥ parāke,
analyzed: kṣayantam asya rajataḥ parāke

original: tadakṣare parame vyoman,
analyzed: tad akṣare parame vyoman

original: yo asyādhyākṣaḥ parame vyoman,
analyzed: yaḥ asya adhi akṣaḥ parame vyoman

original: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman nityādiṣu paramasthānasyaiva darśanam /
analyzed: yaḥ veda nihitam guhāyām parame vyoman nitya ādiṣu parama sthānasya eva darśanam

original: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti vyatirekanirdeśāc ca /
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam iti vyatireka nirdeśāt ca

original: viṣṇvākhyaṃ paramaṃ padam iti viśeṣaṇād anyad api paramaṃ padaṃ vidyata iti ca tenaiva jñāyate /
analyzed: viṣṇu ākhyam paramam padam iti viśeṣaṇāt anyat api paramam padam vidyate iti ca tena eva jñāyate

original: tad idaṃ parasthānaṃ sūribhiḥ sadādṛśyatvena pratipādyate / (129)
analyzed: tat idam para sthānam sūribhiḥ sadā adṛśya tvena pratipādyate

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati kvacitparasthānaṃ paramapadaśabdena pratipādyate,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati kvacid para sthānam parama pada śabdena pratipādyate

original: kvacitprakṛtiviyuktātmasvarūpaṃ,
analyzed: kvacid prakṛti viyukta ātma svarūpam

original: kvacidbhagavatsvarūpam /
analyzed: kvacid bhagavat svarūpam

original: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūraya iti parasthānam /
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ iti para sthānam

original: sargasthityantakāleṣu trividhaiva pravartate /
analyzed: sarga sthiti anta kāleṣu trividhā eva pravartate

original: guṇapravṛttyā paramaṃ padaṃ tasyāguṇaṃ mahat //
analyzed: guṇa pravṛttyā paramam padam tasya aguṇam mahat

original: ityatra prakṛtiviyuktātmasvarūpam /
analyzed: iti atra prakṛti viyukta ātma svarūpam

original: samastaheyarahitaṃ viṣṇvākhyaṃ paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: samasta heya rahitam viṣṇu ākhyam paramam padam

original: ityatra bhagavatsvarūpam /
analyzed: iti atra bhagavat svarūpam

original: trīṇy apy etāni paramaprāptatvena paramapadaśabdena pratipādyante /
analyzed: trīṇi api etāni parama prāpta tvena parama pada śabdena pratipādyante

original: kathaṃ trayāṇāṃ paramaprāpyatvam iti cet /
analyzed: katham trayāṇām parama prāpya tvam iti ced

original: bhagavatsvarūpaṃ paramaprāpyatvād eva paramaṃ padam /
itarayor api bhagavatprāptigarbhatvād eva paramapadatvam /
sarvakarmabandhavinirmuktātmasvarūpāvāptir bhagavatprāptigarbhā /
ta ime satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānā iti bhagavato guṇagaṇasya tirodhāyakatvenānṛtaśabdena svakarmaṇaḥ pratipādanam / (130)
analyzed: te ime satyāḥ kāmāḥ anṛta apidhānāḥ iti bhagavataḥ guṇa gaṇasya tirodhāyaka tvena anṛta śabdena sva karmaṇaḥ pratipādanam

original: anṛtarūpatirodhānaṃ kṣetrajñakarmeti katham avagamyata iti cet /
analyzed: anṛta rūpa tirodhānam kṣetrajña karma iti katham avagamyate iti ced

original: avidyā karmasaṃjñānyā tṛtīyā śaktir iṣyate /
analyzed: avidyā karma saṃjñā anyā tṛtīyā śaktiḥ iṣyate

original: yathā kṣetrajñaśaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarvagā //
analyzed: yathā kṣetrajña śaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarvagā

original: saṃsāratāpān akhilān avāpnoty atisaṃtatān /
analyzed: saṃsāra tāpān akhilān avāpnoti ati saṃtatān

original: tayā tirohitatvāc ca
analyzed: tayā tirohita tvāt ca

original: ityādivacanāt / (131)
analyzed: iti ādi vacanāt

original: parasthānaprāptir api bhagavatprāptigarbhaiveti suvyaktam /
analyzed: para sthāna prāptiḥ api bhagavat prāpti garbhā evā iti su vyaktam

original: kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāka iti rajataḥśabdena triguṇātmikā prakṛtir ucyate kevalasya rajaso 'navasthānāt /
analyzed: kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parākaḥ iti rajataḥśabdena triguṇa ātmikā prakṛtiḥ ucyate kevalasya rajasaḥ nava sthānāt

original: imāṃ triguṇātmikāṃ prakṛtim atikramya sthite sthāne kṣayantam vasantam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: imām triguṇa ātmikām prakṛtim atikramya sthite sthāne kṣayantam vasantam iti arthaḥ

original: anena triguṇātmakāt kṣetrajñasya bhogyabhūtād vastunaḥ parastād viṣṇor vāsasthānam iti gamyate /
analyzed: anena triguṇa ātmakāt kṣetrajñasya bhogya bhūtāt vastunaḥ parastāt viṣṇoḥ vāsa sthānam iti gamyate

original: vedāham etaṃ
analyzed: veda aham etam

original: puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastād ityatrāpi tamaḥśabdena saiva prakṛtir ucyate /
analyzed: puruṣam mahāntam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt iti atra api tamaḥ śabdena sā eva prakṛtiḥ ucyate

original: kevalasya tamaso 'navasthānād eva /
analyzed: kevalasya tamasaḥ nava sthānāt eva

original: rajasaḥ parāke kṣayantam ityanenaikavākyatvāt tamasaḥ parastād vasantaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ puruṣam ahaṃ vedety ayam artho 'vagamyate /
analyzed: rajasaḥ parāke kṣayantam iti anena ekavākyatvāt tamasaḥ parastāt vasantam mahāntam āditya varṇam puruṣam aham veda iti ayam arthaḥ vagamyate

original: satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma /
analyzed: satyam jñānam anantam brahma

original: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman /
analyzed: yaḥ veda nihitam guhāyām parame vyoman

original: tadakṣare parame vyomann iti tatsthānam avikārarūpaṃ paramavyomaśabdābhidheyam iti ca gamyate /
analyzed: tad akṣare parame vyoman iti tat sthānam avikāra rūpam parama vyoma śabda abhidheyam iti ca gamyate

original: akṣare parame vyoman nityasya sthānasyākṣaratvaśravaṇāt kṣararūpādityamaṇḍalādayo na paramavyomaśabdābhidheyāḥ /
analyzed: akṣare parame vyoman nityasya sthānasya akṣara tva śravaṇāt kṣara rūpa āditya maṇḍala ādayaḥ na parama vyoma śabda abhidheyāḥ

original: yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ,
analyzed: yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ

original: yatra rṣayaḥ prathamajā ye purāṇā ityādiṣu ca ta eva sūraya ity avagamyate /
analyzed: yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathama jāḥ ye purāṇāḥ ityādiṣu ca te eva sūrayaḥ iti avagamyate

original: tadviprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ samindhate viṣṇor yatparaṃ padam ityatrāpi viprāso medhāvinaḥ,
analyzed: tat viprāsaḥ vipanyavaḥ jāgṛvāṃsaḥ samindhate viṣṇoḥ yat param padam iti atra api viprāsaḥ medhāvinaḥ

original: vipanyavaḥ stutiśīlāḥ,
analyzed: vipanyavaḥ stuti śīlāḥ

original: jāgṛvāṃsaḥ askhalitajñānās ta evāskhalitajñānās tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā stuvantaḥ samindhata ityarthaḥ / (132)
analyzed: jāgṛvāṃsaḥ askhalita jñānāḥ te eva askhalita jñānāḥ tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam sadā stuvantaḥ samindhate iti arthaḥ  /

original: eteṣāṃ parijanasthānādīnāṃ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ityatra jñānabalāiśvaryādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇavatparabrahmasvarūpāntarbhūtatvāt
analyzed: eteṣām parijana sthāna ādīnām sat eva somya idam agre āsīt iti atra jñāna bala aiśvarya ādi kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇavat para brahma svarūpa antarbhūta tvāt

original: sad evaikam evādvitīyam iti brahmāntarbhāvo 'vagamyate /
analyzed: sat eva ekam eva advitīyam iti brahma antarbhāvaḥ vagamyate

original: eṣām api kalyāṇaguṇaikadeśatvād eva sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ity atredam iti śabdasya
analyzed: eṣām api kalyāṇa guṇa eka deśa tvāt eva sat eva somya idam agre āsīt iti atra idam iti śabdasya

original: karmavaśyabhoktṛvargamiśratadbhogyabhūtaprapañcaviṣayatvāc ca sadā paśyanti sūraya
analyzed: karma vaśya bhoktṛ varga miśra tad bhogya bhūta prapañca viṣaya tvāt ca sadā paśyanti sūraya

original: iti sadādarśitvena ca teṣāṃ karmavaśyānantarbhāvāt /
analyzed: iti sat ādarśi tvena ca teṣām karma vaśyā anantarbhāvāt

original: apahatapāpmetyādy apipāsa ityantena salīlopakaraṇabhūtatriguṇaprakṛtiprākṛtatatsaṃsṛṣṭapuruṣagataṃ
analyzed: apahata pāpmā ityādi apipāsaḥ iti antena salīla upakaraṇa bhūta triguṇa prakṛti prākṛta tad saṃsṛṣṭa puruṣa gatam

original: heyasvabhāvaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣidhya satyakāma ityanena svabhogyabhogopakaraṇajātasya
analyzed: heya svabhāvam sarvam pratiṣidhya satyakāmaḥ iti anena sva bhogya bhoga upakaraṇa jātasya

original: sarvasya satyatā pratipāditā /
analyzed: sarvasya satyatā pratipāditā

original: asatyāḥ kāmā yasyāsau satyakāmaḥ /
analyzed: asatyāḥ kāmāḥ yasya asau satya kāmaḥ

original: kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ /
analyzed: kāmyante iti kāmāḥ

original: tena pareṇa brahmaṇā svabhogyatadupakaraṇādayaḥ svābhimatā ye kāmyante te satyāḥ nityā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tena pareṇa brahmaṇā sva bhogya tad upakaraṇa ādayaḥ sva abhimatāḥ ye kāmyante te satyāḥ nityāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: anyasya līlopakaraṇasyāpi vastunaḥ pramāṇasaṃbandhayogyatve saty api vikārāspadatvenāsthiratvād tadviparītaṃ sthiratvam eṣāṃ satyapadenocyate
analyzed: anyasya līlā upakaraṇasya api vastunaḥ pramāṇa saṃbandha yogya tve sati api vikāra āspada tvena asthira tvāt tad viparītam sthira tvam eṣām satya padena ucyate

original: satyasaṃkalpa ityeteṣu bhogyatadupakaraṇādiṣu nityeṣu niratiśayeṣv ananteṣu satsvapyapūrvāṇām aparimitānām arthānām api saṃkalpamātreṇa siddhiṃ  #
analyzed: satya saṃkalpaḥ iti eteṣu bhogya tad upakaraṇa ādiṣu nityeṣu niratiśayeṣu ananteṣu satsu api apūrvāṇām aparimitānām arthānām api saṃkalpa mātreṇa siddhim

original: vadati /
analyzed: vadati

original: eṣāṃ ca bhogopakaraṇānāṃ līlopakaraṇānāṃ cetanānām acetanānāṃ sthirāṇām asthirāṇām ca tatsaṃkalpāyattasvarūpasthitipravṛttibhedādi sarvaṃ vāti  #
analyzed: eṣām ca bhoga upakaraṇānām līlā upakaraṇānām cetanānām acetanānām sthirāṇām asthirāṇām ca tad saṃkalpa āyatta svarūpa sthiti pravṛtti bheda ādi sarvam vāti  /

original: satyasaṃkalpa iti / (133)
analyzed: satya saṃkalpaḥ iti

original: itihāsapurāṇayor vedopabṛṃhaṇayoś cāyam artha ucyate
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇayoḥ veda upabṛṃhaṇayoḥ ca ayam arthaḥ ucyate

original: tau te medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau /
analyzed: tau te medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau

original: vedopabṛṃhaṇārthāya tāv agrāhayata prabhuḥ //
analyzed: veda upabṛṃhaṇa arthāya tau agrāhayata prabhuḥ

original: iti vedopabṛṃhaṇatayā prārabdhe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe
analyzed: iti veda upabṛṃhaṇa tayā prārabdhe śrīmat rāmāyaṇe

original: vyaktam eṣa mahāyogī paramātmā sanātanaḥ /
analyzed: vyaktam eṣa mahā yogī parama ātmā sanātanaḥ

original: anādimadhyanidhano mahataḥ paramo mahān //
analyzed: an ādi madhya nidhanaḥ mahataḥ paramaḥ mahān

original: tamasaḥ paramo dhātā śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ /
analyzed: tamasaḥ paramaḥ dhātā śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: śrīvatsavakṣā nityaśrīr ajayyaḥ śāśvato dhruvaḥ //
śārā nānāvidhāś cāpi dhanur āyatavigraham /
analyzed: śārāḥ nānāvidhāḥ ca api dhanuḥ āyata vigraham

original: anvagacchanta kākutsthaṃ sarve puruṣavigrahāḥ //
analyzed: anvagacchanta kākutstham sarve puruṣa vigrahāḥ

original: viveśa vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ saśarīraḥ sahānugaḥ //
analyzed: viveśa vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ sa śarīraḥ saha anugaḥ

original: śrīmadvaiṣṇavapurāṇe
samastāḥ śaktayaś caitā nṛpa yatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: samastāḥ śaktayaḥ ca etāḥ nṛpa yatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: tadviśvairūpyaṃ rūpam antyaddharer mahat //
analyzed: tat viśvairūpyam rūpam antyat hareḥ mahat

original: mūrtaṃ brahma mahābhāga sarvabrahmamayo hariḥ //
analyzed: mūrtam brahma mahābhāga sarva brahma mayaḥ hariḥ

original: nityaivaiṣā jaganmātā viṣṇoḥ śrīr anapāyinī /
analyzed: nityā eva eṣā jaganmātā viṣṇoḥ śrīḥ anapāyinī

original: yathā sarvagato viṣṇus tathaiveyaṃ dvijottama //
analyzed: yathā sarva gataḥ viṣṇuḥ tathā evā iyam dvijottama

original: devatve devadeheyaṃ manuṣyatve ca mānuṣī /
analyzed: deva tve deva dehā iyam manuṣya tve ca mānuṣī

original: viṣṇor dehānurūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ deha anurūpām vai karoti eṣā ātmanaḥ tanum

original: ekāntinaḥ sadā brahmadhyāyino yogino hi ye /
analyzed: ekāntinaḥ sadā brahma dhyāyinaḥ yoginaḥ hi ye

original: teṣāṃ tatparaṃ sthānaṃ yad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām tat param sthānam yat vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ

original: kalāmuhūrtādimayaś ca kālo na yadvibhūteḥ pariṇāmahetuḥ //
analyzed: kalā muhūrta ādi mayaḥ ca kālaḥ na yad vibhūteḥ pariṇāma hetuḥ

original: mahābhārate ca
analyzed: mahābhārate ca

original: divyaṃ sthānam ajaraṃ cāprameyaṃ durvijñeya,
analyzed: divyam sthānam ajaram ca aprameyam durvijñeya

original: cāgamair gamyamādyam /
analyzed: ca āgamaiḥ gamyam ādyam

original: gaccha prabho rakṣa cāsmān prapannān kalpe kalpe jāyamānaḥ svamūrtyā //
analyzed: gaccha prabho rakṣa ca asmān prapannān kalpe kalpe jāyamānaḥ sva mūrtyā

original: kālaḥ sa pacate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhuḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ sa pacate tatra na kālaḥ tatra vai prabhuḥ

original: iti / parasya brahmaṇo rūpavattvaṃ sūtrakāraś ca vadati antas taddharmopadeśād iti (134)
analyzed: iti parasya brahmaṇaḥ rūpavat tvam sūtrakāraḥ ca vadati antar tad dharma upadeśāt iti

original: yo 'sāv ādityamaṇḍalāntarvartī taptakārtasvaragirivaraprabhaḥ sahasrāṃśuśatasahasrakiraṇo
analyzed: sau āditya maṇḍala antarvartī tapta kārtasvara giri vara prabhaḥ sahasra aṃśu śata sahasra kiraṇaḥ

original: gambhīrāmbhaḥsamudbhūtasumṛṣṭanālavikaravikasitapuṇḍarīkadalāmalāyatekṣaṇaḥ subhrūlalāṭaḥ
analyzed: gambhīra ambhaḥ samudbhūta sumṛṣṭa nāla vikara vikasita puṇḍarīka dala amala āyata īkṣaṇaḥ su bhrū lalāṭaḥ

original: sunāsaḥ susmitādharavidrumaḥ surucirakomalagaṇḍaḥ kambugrīvaḥ samunnatāṃsavilambicārurūpadivyakarṇakisalayaḥ
analyzed: su nāsaḥ su smita adhara vidrumaḥ su rucira komala gaṇḍaḥ kambu grīvaḥ samunnata aṃsa vilambi cāru rūpa divya karṇa kisalayaḥ

original: pīnavṛttāyatabhujaś cārutarātamrakaratalānuraktāṅgulībhir alaṃkṛtas tanumadhyo viśālavakṣaḥsthalaḥ
analyzed: pīna vṛtta āyata bhujaḥ cārutara ātamra kara tala anurakta aṅgulībhiḥ alaṃkṛtaḥ tanu madhyaḥ viśāla vakṣaḥ sthalaḥ

original: samavibhaktasarvāṅgo 'nirdeśyadivyarūpasaṃhananaḥ snigdhavarṇaḥ prabuddhapuṇḍarīkacārucaraṇayugalaḥ
analyzed: sama vibhakta sarva aṅgaḥ nirdeśya divya rūpa saṃhananaḥ snigdha varṇaḥ prabuddha puṇḍarīka cāru caraṇa yugalaḥ

original: svānurūpapītāmbaradho 'malakirīṭakuṇḍalahārakaustubhakeyūrakaṭakanūpurodarabandhanādyaparimitāścaryānantadivyabhūṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sva anurūpa pīta ambara dhaḥ mala kirīṭa kuṇḍala hāra kaustubha keyūra kaṭaka nūpura udara bandhana ādi aparimita āścarya ananta divya bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: śaṅkhacakragadāsiśrīvatsavanamālālaṅkṛto 'navadhikātiśayasaundaryāhṛtāśeṣamanodṛṣṭivṛttir
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra gadā asi śrīvatsa vanamālā alaṅkṛtaḥ nava adhika atiśaya saundarya āhṛta aśeṣa manaḥ dṛṣṭi vṛttiḥ

original: lāvaṇyāmṛtapūritāśeṣacarācarabhūtajāto 'tyadbhutācintyanityayauvanaḥ puṣpahāsasukumāraḥ
analyzed: lāvaṇya amṛta pūrita aśeṣa carācara bhūta jātaḥ tyadbhuta acintya nitya yauvanaḥ puṣpa hāsa sukumāraḥ

original: puṇyagandhavāsitānantadigantarālas trailokyākramaṇapravṛttagambhīrabhāvaḥ karuṇānurāgamadhuralocanāvalokitāśritavargaḥ
analyzed: puṇya gandha vāsita ananta diś antarālaḥ trailokya ākramaṇa pravṛtta gambhīra bhāvaḥ karuṇa anurāga madhura locana avalokita āśrita vargaḥ

original: puruṣavaro darīdṛśyate /
analyzed: puruṣa varaḥ darīdṛśyate

original: sa ca nikhilajagadudayavibhavalayalīlo nirastasamastaheyaḥ samastakalyāṇaguṇagaṇanidhiḥ svetarasamastavastuvilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā paraṃ brahma  #
analyzed: sa ca nikhila jagat udaya vibhava laya līlaḥ nirasta samasta heyaḥ samasta kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa nidhiḥ sva itara samasta vastu vilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā param brahma

original: nārāyaṇa ity avagamyate /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ iti avagamyate

original: taddharmopadeśāt sa eṣa sarveṣāṃ lokānām īṣṭe sarveṣāṃ kāmānām sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpabhya udita ityādidarśanāt /
analyzed: tad dharma upadeśāt saḥ eṣa sarveṣām lokānām īṣṭe sarveṣām kāmānām saḥ eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpabhyaḥ uditaḥ ityādi darśanāt

original: tasyaite guṇāḥ sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ apahatapāpmā vijara ityādi satyasaṃkalpa ityantam viśvataḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim
analyzed: tasya ete guṇāḥ sarvasya vaśī sarvasya īśānaḥ apahata pāpmā vijaraḥ ityādi satya saṃkalpaḥ ityantam viśvatas paramam nityam viśvam nārāyaṇam harim

original: patiṃ viśvasyātmeśvaram ityādivākyapratipāditāḥ / (135)
analyzed: patim viśvasya ātma īśvaram ityādi vākya pratipāditāḥ

original: vākyakāraiś caitatsarvaṃ suspaṣṭam āha hiraṇyamayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyata iti prājñaḥ sarvāntaraḥ syāl lokakāmeśopadeśāt tathodayāt pāpmanām ityādinā
analyzed: vākya kāraiḥ ca etat sarvam su spaṣṭam āha hiraṇya mayaḥ puruṣaḥ dṛśyate iti prājñaḥ sarva antaraḥ syāt loka kāma īśa upadeśāt tathā udayāt pāpmanām ityādinā

original: tasya ca rūpasyānityatādi vākyakāreṇaiva pratiṣiddham syāt tadrūpaṃ kṛtakam anugrahārthaṃ
analyzed: tasya ca rūpasya anitya tā ādi vākyakāreṇa eva pratiṣiddham syāt tat rūpam kṛtakam anugraha artham

original: taccetanānām aiśvaryād ity upāsitur anugrahārthaḥ paramapuruṣasya rūpasaṃgraha iti pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā,
analyzed: tat cetanānām aiśvaryāt iti upāsituḥ anugraha arthaḥ paramapuruṣasya rūpa saṃgrahaḥ iti pūrvapakṣam kṛtvā

original: rūpaṃ vātīndriyam antaḥkaraṇapratyakṣaṃ tannirdeśād iti /
analyzed: rūpam vā atīndriyam antaḥkaraṇa pratyakṣam tad nirdeśāt iti

original: yathā jñānādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpatayā nirdeśāt svarūpabhūtaguṇās tathedam api rūpaṃ śrutyā svarūpatayā nirdeśāt svarūpabhūtam ityarthaḥ
analyzed: yathā jñāna ādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ sva rūpa tayā nirdeśāt sva rūpa bhūta guṇāḥ tathā idam api rūpam śrutyā sva rūpa tayā nirdeśāt sva rūpa bhūtam iti arthaḥ

original: bhāṣyakāreṇaitad vyākhyātam añjasaiva viśvasṛjo rūpaṃ tat tu na cakṣuṣā grāhyaṃ manasā tv akaluṣeṇa sādhanāntaravatā gṛhyate,
analyzed: bhāṣyakāreṇa etat vyākhyātam añjasā eva viśvasṛjaḥ rūpam tat tu na cakṣuṣā grāhyam manasā tu akaluṣeṇa sādhana antaravatā gṛhyate

original: na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā manasā tu viśuddheneti śruteḥ,
analyzed: na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate na api vācā manasā tu viśuddhena iti śruteḥ

original: na hy rūpāyā devatāyā rūpam upadiśyate,
analyzed: na hi rūpāyāḥ devatāyāḥ rūpam upadiśyate

original: yathābhūtavādi hi śāstram,
analyzed: yathābhūtavādi hi śāstram

original: mahārajanaṃ vāsaḥ vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastād iti prakaraṇāntaranirdeśāc ca sākṣiṇa ityādinā hiraṇyamaya iti  #
analyzed: mahārajanam vāsaḥ veda aham etam puruṣam mahāntam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt iti prakaraṇa antara nirdeśāt ca sākṣiṇaḥ ityādinā hiraṇya mayaḥ iti  /

original: rūpasāmānyāc candramukhavat,
analyzed: rūpa sāmānyāt candra mukha vat

original: na mayaḍ atra vikāram ādāya prayujyate,
analyzed: na mayaṭ atra vikāram ādāya prayujyate

original: anārabhyatvād ātmana iti /
analyzed: an ārabhya tvāt ātmanaḥ iti

original: yathā jñānādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇānantaryanirdeśād aparimitakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ paraṃ
analyzed: yathā jñāna ādi kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ānantarya nirdeśāt aparimita kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa viśiṣṭam param

original: brahmety avagamyata evam ādityavarṇaṃ puruṣam ityādinirdeśāt svābhimatasvānurūpakalyāṇatamarūpaḥ
analyzed: brahma iti avagamyate evam āditya varṇam puruṣam ityādi nirdeśāt sva abhimata sva anurūpa kalyāṇatama rūpaḥ

original: parabrahmabhūtaḥ puruṣottamo nārāyaṇa iti jñāyate /
analyzed: para brahma bhūtaḥ puruṣottamaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ iti jñāyate

original: tathāsyeśanā jagato viṣṇupatnī hrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyau sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ
analyzed: tathā asya īśanā jagataḥ viṣṇu patnī hrīḥ ca te lakṣmīḥ ca patnyau sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ

original: tamasaḥ parastāt kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāka ityādinā patnīparijanasthānādīnāṃ
analyzed: tamasaḥ parastāt kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parākaḥ ityādinā patnī parijana sthāna ādīnām

original: nirdeśād eva tathaiva santīty avagamyate /
analyzed: nirdeśāt eva tathā eva santi iti avagamyate

original: yathāha bhāṣyakāra yathābhūtavādi hi śāstram iti / (136)
analyzed: yathā āha bhāṣyakāra yathābhūtavādi hi śāstram iti

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati yathā satyaṃ jñānaṃ anantaṃ brahmeti nirdeśāt paramātmasvarūpaṃ
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yathā satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti nirdeśāt paramātma svarūpam

original: samastaheyapratyanīkānavadhikānantaikatānatayāparicchedyatayā ca sakaletaravilakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: samasta heya pratyanīka anavadhika ananta eka tāna tayā aparicchedya tayā ca sakala itara vilakṣaṇam

original: tathā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā
analyzed: tathā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vid parā asya śaktiḥ vividhā eva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñāna bala kriyā

original: ca tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhātītyādinirdeśān niratiśayāsaṃkhyeyāś
analyzed: ca tam eva anubhāti sarvam tasya bhāsā sarvam idam vibhāti ityādi nirdeśāt niratiśaya asaṃkhyeyāḥ

original: ca guṇāḥ sakaletaravilakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ca guṇāḥ sakala itara vilakṣaṇāḥ

original: tathādityavarṇam ityādinirdeśād rūpaparijanasthānādayaś ca sakaletaravilakṣaṇāḥ svāsādhāraṇā anirdeśyasvarūpasvabhāvā iti / (137)
analyzed: tathā āditya varṇam ityādi nirdeśāt rūpa parijana sthāna ādayaḥ ca sakala itara vilakṣaṇāḥ sva asādhāraṇāḥ anirdeśya svarūpa svabhāvāḥ iti

original: vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ ced vidhyarthavādamantragataṃ sarvam apūrvam aviruddham arthajātaṃ yathāvasthitam eva bodhayanti /
analyzed: vedāḥ pramāṇam ced vidhi arthavāda mantra gatam sarvam apūrvam aviruddham artha jātam yathā avasthitam eva bodhayanti

original: prāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānām autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandha ityuktam /
analyzed: prāmāṇyam ca vedānām autpattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ iti uktam

original: yathāgnijalādīnām auṣṇyādiśaktiyogaḥ svābhāvikaḥ,
analyzed: yathā agni jala ādīnām auṣṇya ādi śakti yogaḥ svābhāvikaḥ

original: yathā ca cakṣurādīnām indriyāṇāṃ buddhiviśeṣajanaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī tathā śabdasyāpi bodhanaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī /
analyzed: yathā ca cakṣuḥ ādīnām indriyāṇām buddhi viśeṣa jana śaktiḥ svābhāvikī tathā śabdasya api bodhana śaktiḥ svābhāvikī

original: na ca hastaceṣṭādivat saṃketamūlaṃ śabdasya bodhakatvam iti vaktuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na ca hasta ceṣṭā ādi vat saṃketa mūlam śabdasya bodhaka tvam iti vaktum śakyam

original: anādyanusaṃdhānāvicchede 'pi saṃketayitṛpuruṣājñānāt /
analyzed: anādi anusaṃdhāna avicchede pi saṃketayitṛ puruṣa ajñānāt

original: yāni saṃketamūlāni tāni sarvāṇi sākṣād vā paraṃparayā vā jñāyante /
analyzed: yāni saṃketa mūlāni tāni sarvāṇi sākṣāt vā paraṃparayā vā jñāyante

original: na ca devadattādiśabdavat kalpayituṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca devadatta ādi śabda vat kalpayitum yuktam

original: teṣu ca sākṣād vā paraṃparayā vā saṃketo jñāyate /
analyzed: teṣu ca sākṣāt vā paraṃparayā vā saṃketaḥ jñāyate

original: gavādiśabdānāṃ tv anādyanusaṃdhānāvicchede 'pi saṃketājñānād eva bodhakatvaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī /
analyzed: gavā ādi śabdānām tu anādi anusaṃdhāna avicchede pi saṃketa ajñānāt eva bodhaka tva śaktiḥ svābhāvikī

original: ato 'gnyādīnāṃ dāhakatvādiśaktivad indriyāṇāṃ bodhakatvaśaktivac ca śabdasyāpi bodhakatvaśaktir āśrayaṇīyā // (138)
analyzed: atas gni ādīnām dāhaka tva ādi śakti vat indriyāṇām bodhaka tva śakti vat ca śabdasya api bodhaka tva śaktiḥ āśrayaṇīyā

original: nanu cen indriyavac chabdasyāpi bodhakatvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ bodhakatvāya kim ity apekṣate,
analyzed: nanu ced indriya vat śabdasya api bodhaka tvam svābhāvikam saṃbandha grahaṇam bodhaka tvāya kim iti apekṣate

original: liṅgādivad iti ucyate yathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaṃ dhūmādyagnyādivijñānajanakaṃ tathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaḥ śabdo 'py arthaviśeṣabuddhijanakaḥ
analyzed: liṅga ādi vat iti ucyate yathā jñāta saṃbandha niyamam dhūma ādi agni ādi vijñāna janakam tathā jñāta saṃbandha niyamaḥ śabdaḥ api artha viśeṣa buddhi janakaḥ

original: evaṃ tarhi śabdo 'py arthaviśeṣasya liṅgam ity anumānaṃ syāt naivam /
analyzed: evam tarhi artha viśeṣasya liṅgam iti anumānam syāt na evam

original: śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho bodhyabodhkabhāva eva dhūmādīnāṃ tu saṃbandhāntara iti tasya saṃbandhasya jñānadvāreṇa buddhijanakatvam iti viśeṣaḥ
analyzed: śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ bodhya bodhka bhāvaḥ eva dhūma ādīnām tu saṃbandha antare iti tasya saṃbandhasya jñāna dvāreṇa buddhi janaka tvam iti viśeṣaḥ

original: evaṃ gṛhītasaṃbandhasya bodhakatvadarśanād anādyanusaṃdhānāvicchede 'pi saṃketājñānād bodhakatvaśaktir eveti niścīyate / (139)
analyzed: evam gṛhīta saṃbandhasya bodhaka tva darśanāt anādi anusaṃdhāna avicchede pi saṃketa ajñānāt bodhaka tva śaktiḥ evā iti niścīyate

original: evaṃ bodhakānāṃ padasaṃghātānāṃ saṃsargaviśeṣabodhakatvena vākyaśabdābhidheyānām uccāraṇakramo yatra puruṣabuddhipūrvakas te pauruṣeyāḥ śabdā  #
analyzed: evam bodhakānām pada saṃghātānām saṃsarga viśeṣa bodhaka tvena vākya śabda abhidheyānām uccāraṇa kramaḥ yatra puruṣa buddhi pūrvakaḥ te pauruṣeyāḥ śabdāḥ

original: ity ucyante /
analyzed: iti ucyante

original: yatra tu taduccāraṇakramaḥ pūrvapūrvoccaraṇakramajanitasaṃskārapūrvakaḥ sarvadāpauruṣeyās te ca vedā ity+ucyante /
analyzed: yatra tu tad uccāraṇa kramaḥ pūrva pūrva uccaraṇa krama janita saṃskāra pūrvakaḥ sarvadā apauruṣeyāḥ te ca vedāḥ iti ucyante

original: etad eva vedānām apauruṣeyatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca yatpūrvoccāraṇakramajanitasaṃskāreṇa tam eva kramaviśeṣaṃ smṛtvā tenaiva krameṇoccāryamāṇatvam
analyzed: etat eva vedānām apauruṣeya tvam nitya tvam ca yat pūrva uccāraṇa krama janita saṃskāreṇa tam eva krama viśeṣam smṛtvā tena eva krameṇa uccāryamāṇa tvam

original: te cānupūrvīviśeṣeṇa saṃsthitā akṣararāśayo vedā ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvabhedabhinnā anantaśākhā vartante /
analyzed: te ca ānupūrvī viśeṣeṇa saṃsthitāḥ akṣara rāśayaḥ vedāḥ ṛk yajuḥ sāma atharva bheda bhinnāḥ ananta śākhāḥ vartante

original: te ca vidhyarthavādamantrarūpā vedāḥ parabrahmabhūtanārāyaṇasvarūpaṃ tadārādhanaprakārādhitāt phalaviśeṣaṃ ca bodhayanti /
analyzed: te ca vidhi arthavāda mantra rūpāḥ vedāḥ para brahma bhūta nārāyaṇa svarūpam tad ārādhana prakāra ādhitāt phala viśeṣam ca bodhayanti

original: paramapuruṣavat tatsvarūpatadārādhanatatphalajñāpakavedākhyaśabdajātaṃ nityam eva /
analyzed: parama puruṣa vat tad svarūpa tad ārādhana tad phala jñāpaka veda ākhya śabda jātam nityam eva

original: vedānām anantatvād duravagāhatvāc ca paramapuruṣaniyuktāḥ paramarṣayaḥ kalpe kalpe
analyzed: vedānām ananta tvāt duravagāha tvāt ca parama puruṣa niyuktāḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ kalpe kalpe

original: nikhilajagadupakārārthaṃ vedārthaṃ smṛtvā vidhyarthavādamantramūlāni dharmaśāstrāṇītihāsapurāṇāni ca cakruḥ /
analyzed: nikhila jagat upakāra artham veda artham smṛtvā vidhi arthavāda mantra mūlāni dharma śāstrāṇi itihāsa purāṇāni ca cakruḥ

original: laukikāś ca śabdā vedarāśer uddhṛtyaiva tattadarthaviśeṣanāmatayā pūrvavat prayuktāḥ pāraṃparyeṇa prayujyante /
analyzed: laukikāḥ ca śabdāḥ vedarāśeḥ uddhṛtya eva tad tad artha viśeṣa nāmatayā pūrvavat prayuktāḥ pāraṃparyeṇa prayujyante

original: nanu ca vaidika eva sarve vācakāḥ śabdāś cec chandasyaivaṃ bhāṣāyām evam iti lakṣaṇabhedaḥ katham upapadyate /
analyzed: nanu ca vaidike eva sarve vācakāḥ śabdāḥ ced chandasya evam bhāṣāyām evam iti lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ katham upapadyate

original: ucyate teṣām eva śabdānāṃ tasyām evānupūrvyāṃ vartamānāṃ tathaiva prayogaḥ /
analyzed: ucyate teṣām eva śabdānām tasyām eva ānupūrvyām vartamānām tathā eva prayogaḥ

original: anyatra prayujyamānānām anyatheti na kaścid doṣaḥ / (140)
analyzed: anyatra prayujyamānānām anyathā iti na kaścid doṣaḥ

original: evam itihāsapurāṇadharmaśāstropabṛṃhitasāṅgavedavedyaḥ parabrahmabhūto nārāyaṇo nikhilaheyapratyanīkaḥ
analyzed: evam itihāsa purāṇa dharma śāstra upabṛṃhita sāṅga veda vedyaḥ para brahma bhūtaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ nikhila heya pratyanīkaḥ

original: sakaletaravilakṣaṇo 'paricchinnajñānānandaikasvarūpaḥ svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraḥ
svasaṃkalpānuvidhāyisvarūpasthitipravṛttibhedacidacidvastujāto 'paricchedyasvarūpasvabhāvānantamahāvibhūtir
analyzed: sva saṃkalpa anuvidhāyi svarūpa sthiti pravṛtti bheda cit acit vastu jātaḥ paricchedya sva rūpa svabhāva ananta mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: nānāvidhānantacetanācetanātmakaprapañcalīlopakaraṇa iti pratipāditam /
analyzed: nānāvidha ananta cetana acetana ātmaka prapañca līlā upakaraṇaḥ iti pratipāditam

original: sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tat tvam asi śvetaketo
analyzed: sarvam khalu idam brahma aitadātmyam idam sarvam tat tvam asi śvetaketo

original: enam eke vadanty agniṃ maruto 'nyo prajāpatim /
analyzed: enam eke vadanti agnim marutaḥ prajāpatim

original: indram eke pare prāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam //
analyzed: indram eke pare prāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam

original: jyotīṃṣi śuklāni ca yāni loke trayo lokā lokapālās trayī ca /
analyzed: jyotīṃṣi śuklāni ca yāni loke trayaḥ lokāḥ lokapālāḥ trayī ca

original: trayo 'gnayaś cāhutayaś ca pañca sarve deva devakīputra eva //
analyzed: trayaḥ gnayaḥ ca āhutayaḥ ca pañca sarve deva devakīputre eva

original: tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
analyzed: tvam yajñaḥ tvam vaṣaṭkāraḥ tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapaḥ

original: ṛtudhāmā vasuḥ pūrvo vasūnāṃ tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ //
analyzed: ṛtu dhāmā vasuḥ pūrvaḥ vasūnām tvam prajāpatiḥ

original: jagatsarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyaṃ te vasudhātalam /
analyzed: jagat sarvam śarīram te sthairyam te vasudhā talam

original: agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ kopaḥ prasādaḥ te somaḥ śrīvatsa lakṣaṇaḥ

original: jyotīṃṣi viṣṇur bhuvanāni viṣṇur vanāni viṣṇur girayo diśaś ca /
analyzed: jyotīṃṣi viṣṇuḥ bhuvanāni viṣṇuḥ vanāni viṣṇuḥ girayaḥ diśaḥ ca

original: nadyaḥ samudrāś ca sa eva sarvaṃ yad asti yan nāsti ca vipravarya //
analyzed: nadyaḥ samudrāḥ ca saḥ eva sarvam yat asti yat na asti ca vipra varya

original: ityādisāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogeṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivābhidhīyata iti coktam /
analyzed: ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇya prayogeṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sarva śarīra tayā sarva prakāram brahma eva abhidhīyate iti ca uktam

original: satyasaṃkalapaṃ paraṃ brahma svayam eva bahuprakāraṃ syām iti saṃkalpyācitsamaṣṭirūpamahābhūtasūkṣmavastu
analyzed: satya saṃkalapam param brahma svayam eva bahu prakāram syām iti saṃkalpya acit samaṣṭi rūpa mahābhūta sūkṣma vastu

original: bhoktṛvargasamūhaṃ ca svasmin pralīnaṃ svayam eva vibhajya tasmād bhūtasūkṣmād vāstuno
analyzed: bhoktṛ varga samūham ca svasmin pralīnam svayam eva vibhajya tasmāt bhūta sūkṣmāt

original: mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvā teṣu ca bhoktṛvargātmatayā praveśya taiścid adhiṣṭhitair mahābhūtair
analyzed: mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvā teṣu ca bhoktṛ varga ātma tayā praveśya taiḥ cit adhiṣṭhitaiḥ mahābhūtaiḥ

original: anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jagad vidhāya svayam api sarvasyātmatayā praviśya paramātmatvenāvasthitaṃ
analyzed: anyonya saṃsṛṣṭaiḥ kṛtsnam jagat vidhāya svayam api sarvasya ātma tayā praviśya paramātma tvena avasthitam

original: sarvaśarīraṃ bahuprakāram avatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: sarva śarīram bahu prakāram avatiṣṭhate

original: yad idaṃ mahābhūtasūkṣmaṃ vastu tad eva prakṛtiśabdenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: yat idam mahābhūta sūkṣmam vastu tat eva prakṛti śabdena abhidhīyate

original: bhoktṛvargasamūha eva puruṣaśabdena cocyate /
analyzed: bhoktṛ varga samūhaḥ eva puruṣa śabdena ca ucyate

original: tau ca prakṛtipuruṣau paramātmaśarīratayā paramātmaprakārabhūtau /
analyzed: tau ca prakṛti puruṣau paramātma śarīra tayā paramātma prakāra bhūtau

original: tatprakāraḥ paramātmaiva prakṛtipuruṣaśabdābhideyaḥ /
analyzed: tad prakāraḥ paramātmā eva prakṛti puruṣa śabda abhideyaḥ

original: so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tatsṛṣṭvā tad evānupraviśat tad anupraviśya sac
analyzed: sā u kāmayata bahu syām prajāyeya iti tat sṛṣṭvā tat eva anupraviśat tat anupraviśya sac

original: ca tyac cābhavan niruktaṃ cāniruktaṃ ca nilayanaṃ cānilayanaṃ ca vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ
analyzed: ca tyad ca abhavat niruktam ca a niruktam ca nilayanam ca a nilayanam ca vijñānam ca a vijñānam

original: ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca satyam abhavad iti pūrvoktaṃ sarvam anayaiva śrutyā vyaktam / (141)
analyzed: ca satyam ca anṛtam ca satyam abhavat iti pūrva uktam sarvam anayā eva śrutyā vyaktam  /

original: brahmaprāptyupāyaś ca śāstrādhigatatattvajñānapūrvakasvakarmānugṛhītabhaktiniṣṭhāsādhyānavadhikātiśayapriyaviśadatamapratyakṣatāpannānudhyānarūpaparabhaktir  #
analyzed: brahma prāpti upāyaḥ ca śāstra adhigata tattva jñāna pūrvaka sva karma anugṛhīta bhakti niṣṭhā sādhya anavadhika atiśaya priya viśadatama pratyakṣa tā āpanna anudhyāna rūpa para bhaktiḥ

original: evetyuktam /
analyzed: eva iti uktam

original: bhaktiśabdaś ca prītiviśeṣe vartate /
analyzed: bhakti śabdaḥ ca prīti viśeṣe vartate

original: prītiś ca jñānaviśeṣa eva /
analyzed: prītiḥ ca jñāna viśeṣaḥ eva

original: nanu ca sukhaṃ prītir ityanarthāntaram /
analyzed: nanu ca sukham prītiḥ iti anartha antaram

original: sukhaṃ ca jñānaviśeṣasādhyaṃ padārthāntaram iti hi laukikāḥ /
analyzed: sukham ca jñāna viśeṣa sādhyam padārtha antaram iti hi laukikāḥ

original: naivam /
analyzed: na evam

original: yena jñānaviśeṣeṇa tatsādhyam ity ucyate sa eva jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukham / (142)
analyzed: yena jñāna viśeṣeṇa tat sādhyam iti ucyate saḥ eva jñāna viśeṣaḥ sukham

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati viṣayajñānāni sukhaduḥkhamadhyasādhāraṇāni /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati viṣaya jñānāni sukha duḥkha madhya sādhāraṇāni

original: tāni ca viṣayādhīnaviśeṣāṇi tathā bhavanti /
analyzed: tāni ca viṣaya adhīna viśeṣāṇi tathā bhavanti

original: yena ca viṣayaviśeṣeṇa viśeṣitaṃ jñānaṃ sukhasya janakam ity abhimataṃ tadviṣayaṃ jñānam eva sukhaṃ,
analyzed: yena ca viṣaya viśeṣeṇa viśeṣitam jñānam sukhasya janakam iti abhimatam tad viṣayam jñānam eva sukham

original: tadatireki padārthāntaraṃ nopalabhyate /
analyzed: tad atireki padārtha antaram na upalabhyate

original: tenaiva sukhitvavyavahāropapatteś ca /
analyzed: tena eva sukhi tva vyavahāra upapatteḥ ca

original: evaṃvidhasukhasvarūpajñānasya viśeṣakatvaṃ brahmavyatiriktasya vastunaḥ sātiśayam asthiraṃ ca /
analyzed: evaṃvidha sukha sva rūpa jñānasya viśeṣaka tvam brahma vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ sa atiśayam asthiram ca

original: brahmaṇas tv anavadhikātiśayaṃ sthiraṃ ceti /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ tu anavadhika atiśayam sthiram ca iti

original: ānando brahmety ucyate /
analyzed: ānandaḥ brahma iti ucyate

original: viṣayāyattatvāj jñānasya sukhasvarūpatayā brahmaiva sukham /
analyzed: viṣaya āyatta tvāt jñānasya sukha svarūpa tayā brahmā eva sukham

original: tad idam āha raso vai saḥ rasaṃ he evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatīti brahmaiva sukham iti brahma labdhvā sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat idam āha rasaḥ vai saḥ rasam he eva ayam labdhvā ānandī bhavati iti brahma eva sukham iti brahma labdhvā sukhī bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: paramapuruṣaḥ svenaiva svayam anavadhikātiśayasukhaḥ san parasyāpi sukhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: paramapuruṣaḥ svena eva svayam anavadhika atiśaya sukhaḥ san parasya api sukham bhavati

original: sukhasvarūpatvāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: sukha svarūpa tva aviśeṣāt

original: brahma yasya jñānaviṣayo bhavati sa sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: brahma yasya jñāna viṣayaḥ bhavati sa sukhī bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: tad evaṃ parasya brahmaṇo 'navadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākarasya niravadyasyānantamahāvibhūter
analyzed: tat evam parasya brahmaṇaḥ nava adhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ākarasya niravadyasya ananta mahā vibhūteḥ

original: anavadhikātiśayasauśīlyasaundaryavātsalyajaladheḥ sarvaśeṣitvād ātmanaḥ śeṣatvāt
analyzed: anavadhika atiśaya sauśīlya saundarya vātsalya jaladheḥ sarva śeṣi tvāt ātmanaḥ śeṣa tvāt

original: pratibaṃdhitayānusaṃdhīyamānam anavadhikātiśayaprītiviṣayaṃ sat paraṃ brahmaivainam
analyzed: pratibaṃdhi tayā anusaṃdhīyamānam anavadhika atiśaya prīti viṣayam sat param brahma eva enam

original: ātmānaṃ prāpayatīti / (143)
analyzed: ātmānam prāpayati iti

original: nanu cātyantaśeṣataivātmano 'navadhikātiśayasukham ityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nanu ca atyanta śeṣatā eva ātmanaḥ na vadhika atiśaya sukham iti uktam bhavati

original: tad etat sarvalokaviruddham /
analyzed: tat etat sarva loka viruddham

original: tathā hi sarveṣām eva cetanānāṃ svātantryam eva iṣṭatamaṃ dṛśyate,
analyzed: tathā hi sarveṣām eva cetanānām svātantryam eva iṣṭatamam dṛśyate

original: pāratantryaṃ duḥkhataram / smṛtiś ca
analyzed: pāratantryam duḥkhataram smṛtiḥ ca

original: sarvaṃ paravaśam duḥkhaṃ sarvam ātmavaśaṃ sukham /
analyzed: sarvam para vaśam duḥkham sarvam ātma vaśam sukham

original: tathā hi
analyzed: tathā hi

original: sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātā tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet /
analyzed: sevā śvavṛttiḥ ākhyātā tasmāt tām parivarjayet

original: iti / tad idam anadhigatadehātiriktātmarūpāṇāṃ śarīrātmābhimānavijṛmbhitam /
analyzed: iti tat idam anadhigata deha atirikta ātma rūpāṇām śarīra ātma abhimāna vijṛmbhitam

original: tathā hi śarīraṃ hi manuṣyatvādijātiguṇāśrayapiṇḍabhūtaṃ svatantraṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: tathā hi śarīram hi manuṣya tva ādi jāti guṇa āśraya piṇḍa bhūtam svatantram pratīyate

original: tasminn evāham iti saṃsāriṇāṃ pratītiḥ /
analyzed: tasmin eva aham iti saṃsāriṇām pratītiḥ

original: ātmābhimāno yādṛśas tadanuguṇaiva puruṣārthapratītiḥ /
analyzed: ātma abhimānaḥ yādṛśaḥ tad anuguṇā eva puruṣa artha pratītiḥ

original: siṃhavyāghravarāhamanuṣyayakṣarakṣaḥpiśācadevadānavastrīpuṃsavyavasthitātmābhimānānāṃ sukhāni vyavasthitāni /
analyzed: siṃha vyāghra varāha manuṣya yakṣa rakṣaḥ piśāca deva dānava strīpuṃsa vyavasthita ātma abhimānānām sukhāni vyavasthitāni

original: tāni ca parasparaviruddhāni /
analyzed: tāni ca paraspara viruddhāni

original: tasmād ātmābhimānānuguṇapuruṣārthavyavasthayā sarvaṃ samāhitam /
analyzed: tasmāt ātma abhimāna anuguṇa puruṣa artha vyavasthayā sarvam samāhitam

original: ātmasvarūpaṃ tu devādidehavilakṣaṇaṃ jñānaikākāram /
analyzed: ātma svarūpam tu deva ādi deha vilakṣaṇam jñāna eka ākāram

original: tac ca paraśeṣataikasvarūpam /
analyzed: tat ca para śeṣa tā eka svarūpam

original: yathāvasthitātmābhimāne tadanuguṇaiva puruṣārthapratītiḥ /
analyzed: yathā avasthita ātma abhimāne tad anuguṇā eva puruṣa artha pratītiḥ

original: ātmā jñānamayo 'mala iti smṛter jñānaikākāratā pratipannā /
analyzed: ātmā jñāna mayaḥ malaḥ iti smṛteḥ jñāna eka ākāra tā pratipannā

original: patiṃ viśvasyetyādi śrutiguṇaiḥ paramātmaśeṣataikākāratā ca pratītā /
analyzed: patim viśvasya ityādi śruti guṇaiḥ paramātma śeṣa tā eka ākāra tā ca pratītā

original: ataḥ siṃhavyāghrādiśarīrātmābhimānavat svātantryābhimāno 'pi karmakṛtaviparītātmajñānarūpo veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: atas siṃha vyāghra ādi śarīra ātma abhimāna vat svātantrya abhimānaḥ pi karma kṛta viparīta ātma jñāna rūpaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: ataḥ karmakṛtam eva paramapuruṣavyatiriktaviṣayāṇāṃ sukhatvam /
analyzed: atas karma kṛtam eva parama puruṣa vyatirikta viṣayāṇām sukha tvam

original: ata eva teṣām alpatvam asthiratvaṃ ca paramapuruṣasyaiva svata eva sukhatvam /
analyzed: atas eva teṣām alpa tvam asthira tvam ca paramapuruṣasya eva svatas eva sukha tvam

original: atas tad eva sthiram anavadhikātiśayaṃ ca kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma ānando brahma satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmeti śruteḥ /
analyzed: atas tat eva sthiram anavadhika atiśayam ca kam brahma kham brahma ānandaḥ brahma satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti śruteḥ

original: brahmavyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya vastunaḥ svarūpeṇa sukhatvābhāvaḥ karmakṛtatvena cāsthiratvaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇoktam
analyzed: brahma vyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya vastunaḥ svarūpeṇa sukha tva abhāvaḥ karma kṛta tvena ca asthira tvam bhagavatā parāśareṇa uktam

original: narakasvargasaṃjñe vai pāpapuṇye dvijottama /
analyzed: naraka svarga saṃjñe vai pāpa puṇye dvijottama

original: vastv ekam eva duḥkhāya sukhāyerṣyāgamāya ca /
analyzed: vastu ekam eva duḥkhāya sukhāya īrṣyā āgamāya ca

original: kopāya ca yatas tasmād vastu vastvātmakaṃ kutaḥ //
analyzed: kopāya ca yatas tasmāt vastu vastu ātmakam kutas

original: sukhaduḥkhādyekāntarūpiṇo vastuno vastutvaṃ kutaḥ /
analyzed: sukha duḥkha ādi ekānta rūpiṇaḥ vastunaḥ vastu tvam kutas

original: tadekāntatā puṇyapāpakṛtetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad ekānta tā puṇya pāpa kṛtā iti arthaḥ

original: evam anekapuruṣāpekṣayā kasyacit sukham eva kasyacid duḥkhaṃ bhavatītyavasthāṃ pratipādya,
analyzed: evam aneka puruṣa apekṣayā kasyacid sukham eva kasyacid duḥkham bhavati iti avasthām pratipādya

original: ekasminn api puruṣe na vyavasthitam ityāha
analyzed: ekasmin api puruṣe na vyavasthitam iti āha

original: tad eva prīyate bhūtvā punarsuḥkhāya jāyate /
analyzed: tat eva prīyate bhūtvā punar suṣkhāya jāyate

original: tad eva kopāya yataḥ prasādāya ca jāyate //
analyzed: tat eva kopāya yatas prasādāya ca jāyate

original: tasmād duḥkhātmakaṃ nāsti na ca kiṃcit sukhātmakam /
analyzed: tasmāt duḥkha ātmakam nā asti na ca kiṃcid sukha ātmakam

original: iti sukhaduḥkhātmakatvaṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ karmakṛtaṃ na vastusvarūpakṛtam /
analyzed: iti sukha duḥkha ātmaka tvam sarvasya vastunaḥ karma kṛtam na vastu svarūpa kṛtam

original: ataḥ karmāvasāne tad apaitītyarthaḥ / (144)
analyzed: atas karma avasāne tat apaiti iti arthaḥ

original: yat tu sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥkham ityuktaṃ tatparamapuruṣavyatiriktānāṃ parasparaśeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāvāt tadvyatiriktaṃ prati śeṣatā duḥkham evetyuktam
analyzed: yat tu sarvam paravaśam duḥkham iti uktam tat paramapuruṣa vyatiriktānām paraspara śeṣa śeṣi bhāva abhāvāt tad vyatiriktam prati śeṣa tā duḥkham eva iti uktam

original: sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātety atrāpy asevyasevā śvavṛttir evetyuktam /
analyzed: sevā śvavṛttiḥ ākhyātā iti atra api asevya sevā śvavṛttiḥ evā iti uktam

original: sa hy āśramaiḥ sadopāsyaḥ samastair eka eva tv iti sarvair ātmayāthātmyavedibhiḥ sevyaḥ puruṣottama eka eva /
analyzed: sa hi āśramaiḥ sadā upāsyaḥ samastaiḥ ekaḥ eva tu iti sarvaiḥ ātma yāthātmya vedibhiḥ sevyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ekaḥ eva

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā

original: māṃ ca yo 'vyabhicāreṇa bhaktiyogena sevate /
analyzed: mām ca yaḥ vyabhicāreṇa bhakti yogena sevate

original: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahmabhūyāya kalpate //
analyzed: sa guṇān samatītya etān brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: itīyam eva bhaktirūpā sevā brahmavid āpnoti param tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatītyādiṣu vedanaśabdenābhidhīyata  #
analyzed: iti iyam eva bhakti rūpā sevā brahma vid āpnoti param tam evam vidvān amṛtaḥ iha bhavati brahma veda brahmā eva bhavati ityādiṣu vedana śabdena abhidhīyata

original: ityuktam /
analyzed: iti uktam

original: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhya iti viśeṣaṇād yam evaiṣa vṛṇuta iti bhavagatā varaṇīyatvaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: yam eva eṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ iti viśeṣaṇāt yam eva eṣa vṛṇute iti bhava gatā varaṇīya tvam pratīyate

original: varaṇīyaś ca priyatamaḥ /
analyzed: varaṇīyaḥ ca priyatamaḥ

original: yasya bhagavaty anavadhikātiśayā prītir jāyate sa eva bhagavataḥ priyatamaḥ /
analyzed: yasya bhagavati anavadhika atiśayā prītiḥ jāyate saḥ eva bhagavataḥ priyatamaḥ

original: tad uktaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: tat uktam bhagavatā

original: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ /
analyzed: priyaḥ hi jñāninaḥ tyartham aham sa ca mama priyaḥ

original: iti / tasmāt parabhaktirūpāpannam eva vedanaṃ tattvato bhagavatprāptisādhanam /
analyzed: iti tasmāt para bhakti rūpa āpannam eva vedanam tattvataḥ bhagavat prāpti sādhanam

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā dvaipāyanena mokṣadharme sarvopaniṣadvyākhyānarūpam
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā dvaipāyanena mokṣadharme sarva upaniṣad vyākhyāna rūpam

original: na saṃdṛśo tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam /
analyzed: na saṃdṛśaḥ tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścana enam

original: bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā ca samāhitātmā jñānasvarūpaṃ paripaśyatītīha //
analyzed: bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā ca samāhita ātmā jñāna sva rūpam paripaśyati iti iha

original: dhṛtyā samāhitātmā bhaktyā puruṣottamaṃ paśyati sākṣātkaroti prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛtyā samāhita ātmā bhaktyā puruṣottamam paśyati sākṣātkaroti prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: bhaktyā tv anannyayā śakya ityanenāikārthyāt /
analyzed: bhaktyā tu śakyaḥ iti anena aikārthyāt

original: bhaktiś ca jñānaviśeṣa eveti sarvam upapannam / (145)
analyzed: bhaktiḥ ca jñāna viśeṣaḥ eva iti sarvam upapannam

original: sārāsāravivekajñā garīyāṃso vimatsarāḥ /
analyzed: sāra asāra viveka jñāḥ garīyāṃsaḥ vimatsarāḥ

original: pramāṇatantrāḥ santīti kṛto vedārthasaṅgrahaḥ //
analyzed: pramāṇa tantrāḥ santi iti kṛtaḥ veda artha saṅgrahaḥ
